113a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kun la zhes pa brten pa'i stobs// gang phyir gang zag mchog ces pa// lha yi bu zhes pa yi mtshan// dper bya kun las 'das pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi ba'o// shes bya zhes pa nyi ma'i zhal// shes
113a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag po grol ba'i 'od// mchog ni tshul ni khrims 'od ces brjod// chos kyi sprin bdag ces pa ni// dka' thub rnam pa zhes pa'i mtshan// gtso be de bzhin rdul med pa'o// phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa'o// de bzhin
113a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i gsungs// bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog ces pa// mig sman zhes pa'i mtshan du brjod// 'gro ba zhes pa kun la rgyal// nges 'byung gsum ni sems can 'ong // bgrod rnams zhes pa dri ma med
113a6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i don zhes bya ba ni// dran pa'i dbang po zhes su brjod// rnam dag dpal ni zhal ris sdug/ 'jig rten gsum skal bzang zhes pa// rgyal mtshan mtha' yas zhes pa'i mtshan// chen po zhes pa blo mchog go// 'byor
113b1(rgyud 'grel): pa kun zhes bya ba ni// de bzhin dpung bzhi rab zhi'i mtshan// dpal ldan zhes pa rin chen 'dod// 'jam dpal zhes pa chos dbang phyug/ dbul dang ldan pa mchog gi ming // de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs lha// kun gyis tshig
113b2(rgyud 'grel): don brjod pa dag/ ming nyid sngags kyi mtshan dag ste// de dag ltar ne bu ga'i mnga'// sangs rgyas mtshan ni sbyor la skye// dkyil 'khor gcig gi dbus su yang // sngar bshad ltos pas bzhi pa'o// a ba dz+wA la brten rnal 'byor
113b3(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon gnyis la// nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'bab// dkyil 'khor r-i re dag la yang // dkyil 'khor bzhi bzhi dag tu brtags// yang ni dbugs ni gcig la yang // khyod
113b4(rgyud 'grel): par thams cad skye bar 'gyur// go rims ji ltar bzhi 'gyur gyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// de dag grangs pa'i yo na tan 'gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o// lhag ma brgya phrag drug po ni// drug dang brgyad kyi
113b5(rgyud 'grel): grangs 'gyur laso// stong phrag brgya dang drug brgya'o// re re la yang go rims bzhin// brgya phrag drug tu shes par bya// drug pa rgya dag gi yan tan ni// de kun ston pa'i grags zhes ni// khri phrag bzhi dang stong phrag sum//
113b6(rgyud 'grel): de ni brgya phrag gcig gi 'gyur// gnyis ka bsdom pa'i grangs nyid kyang // 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gsum mo// byo dang byed par gsungs pa ste// de ltar 'khor lo drug po la// dbugs rgyu ba ni lha rnams so// 'khor lo
114a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su bshad par bya// gcig ni nang du bsgom bya ste// spyi gtsug sogs nas gsang ba'i mthar// rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang du gsungs// gnyis pa rdo rje dbyings la sogs// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mthar
114a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag ji bzhin rim pa bzhin// mgrin pa spyi gtsug snying kha dpral// de bzhin gsang ba lte ba ru// yang ni ming gi rnam grangs ni// ngag gi dbang phyug chos dbyings kyis// ming can spyi gtsug 'khor lo'o// chos dbyings rnam
114a3(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa yi// ming ni mgrin par gsungs pa'o// me long ye shes sku yi ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor la 'dod pa'o// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni// lte bo'i 'khor lo'i ming can// dpral ba'i 'khor lor gsungs pa ni//
114a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyi// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni// gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid do// de ltar rnal 'byor rgyud kun la// ston pa'i rgyal po chen pos khyab// sna tshogs ye shes lnga bdag nyid// sangs rgyas lnga
114a5(rgyud 'grel): yi bdag nyid dngos// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// grong nas gong du brgyud pa'o// gzhan dag lhag mo gzhan kun ni// slob dpon la sogs bdag chen rnams// kun gyis bsgom par bya ba dang // klags
114a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur// nye bor bsdus pa las bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi 'khoro lo'i rnam par rtog go zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// // da ni rnal 'byor de dag gi/ ye shes lnga po brjod par bya// phyag
114b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal 'dud la sogs pa nas// ye shes sku nyid tshig gi mthar// gang phyir tshig su bcad pa'i tshig/ nyi shu bya dang byed pa ste// bdag nyid chen po'i tshigs bcad ni// dang po nyid du byed pa'i rgyu// lhag ma bzhi ni gsungs pa ni
114b2(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir bya ba ji ltar rim// de dag ye shes lnga nyid de// rgyu la sogs pa ji ltar rim// rgyu dang rkyen gyi ye shesau dang // gnas kyi ye shes de bzhin gzhan// sgom pa'i ye shes gsungs pa dang // lnga pa grol ba ye shes
114b3(rgyud 'grel): so/ rgyu ni me long yang dag bshad// rkyen ni chos kyi dbyi ngas nyid do// so sor rtog pa gnad kyi'o// mnyam pa nyid ni sgom pa'i mchog/ grol ba'i ye shes bya grub kyi'o// de ltar rims bzhin shes par bya/
114b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu yi ye shes rnam pa bzhi// phyi rol dang ni nang du 'dod// phyi rol dpe yi mtshan nyid de// nang nyid dpe yis mtshon pa'o// mchog sbyin rdo rje 'dud ces pa// dgo' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin nas// yang dag mtho' yi
114b5(rgyud 'grel): bar du ni// bde ba'i longs spyod bzhi yi mchog/ gang phyir stong pa nyid kyi tshig rtag tu gzhi la dran med thob// de bzhin snying po zhes pa'i tshig/ bde dang stong nyid dbyer med pa'o// sangs rgyas byang chub ces pa
114b6(rgyud 'grel): yang rnal 'byor dang ni sngon byang chub// de dag dpe tsamo gzhin yod min// bde yang gsungs shing bstod pa'i mchog/ phyag 'tshal 'dud pa rnam bzhi ste// mchod dong mchog bya'i rang bzhin cano// rtag tu mchod

115a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa mags// bcu drug po yi tshig rnams ni// de bzhin dgo ba bcu drug ste/ tshig ni re re'i mtha' nyid do// de la sangs rgyas rmugs pa'i tshig/ dge'i ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid de// rnal 'byor dbang po mdzad dus su// thog
115a4(rgyud 'grel): sa tha ma dbus nyid men// de yi chags chen zhes pa nis// gleng de bani tho zhes pa'i mthar// gang phyir rtag tu tshis dbyings s+ho// rdo rje mchog ces bya bar gsungs// spangs rgyas skye zhes bya ba'i bani// yang dag smiSh+NISha rU ga
115a5(rgyud 'grel): 'o// chos kyi sku nas gsungs pa ni// dga' bral ba ni pa ni pa'o// sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i tshig nyid ni// de bzhin spyod nyid snyid pa las// lhan cig skyes blo'i dus nyid du// gnyis spongs par ni gsungs pa'o// nga bzhin
115a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rkyen pan ni// dga' ba la sogs bzhi pa yi// lhag ma lhag ma'i bar du sti// gang phyir sangs rgyas mdzum pa'i tshig/ so sor rtog pa gsang ba'o// gnad kyi ye shes bshad
115b1(rgyud 'grel): yang / rApra d+ha gnyis dang po gnad kyi sgo// sangs rgyas bshad pa zhes pa'i tshig/ lan gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin can// rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bshad// phyi rol dang ni nang du 'dod// sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba'i mtshan// las kyi phyag
115b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya nyid kyis brdas// de la a ba d+hI tI gnas// srog dang rlung du rnam par gsungs// sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes pa'i tshig/ longs spyod du yang gsungs po'o// sprul pa dag ni ma lus dang // lhan cig skyes dang chos sku mchog/ de dag
115b3(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir med las byung // med pa rtag tu stong pa ste// ye shes 'byung ba nyid du bshad// sku bzhi po dag grangs med pa'i// de las gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'byung // rang bzhin nyid ni sku dang ldan// na mkha'o zhes pa'i
115b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ni// byin pa la ltos lnga pa'i// de yi rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid// nam mkha' las byung rang rtags pa// mkha' ni lhan cig skyes par bshad// rnal 'byor pa dang rang las skyes// ye shes las byung ba yi tshig/ ji ltar
115b5(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bzhi pa'i mtha'// yod dang med las rnam par 'das// rang rig pa'i sangs rgyas ma chog/ sgyu 'phrul zhes pa'i tshig nyid kyang // bshad pa nang gi bdog nyid 'dod// rnal 'byor ma rnams sgyu 'phral tshig/ dra ba mchog
115b6(rgyud 'grel): tu bde ba'o// sangs rgyas rol pa zhes pa'i tshul// rnal 'byor rgyud dang rnal 'byor mo'o// thams cad lhani cig skyes pa tsam// bsam gtan bzhi yi nang las skye// thams cad thams cad ces pa ni// bcu drug phyed phyed
116a1(rgyud 'grel): thig le can// shes dang shes bya nyid du gsungs// rdo rje snying po rtse mo can// dga' ba zhes pa'i ming nyid ni// gsang ba'i gnas su skye ba ste// bcu drug tshig tu shes par bya// dang po sogs nas gang ba'i
116a2(rgyud 'grel): mthar// dang po reg pa'i dga' ba'o// de bzhin gzhan yang chags pa'i dga'// 'dod pa'i dga' ba gsum po'ang // rus sbal dga' ba mchog tu 'dod// zla ba'i dga' ba de bzhini gshegs// keng rus dga' ba drug pa'o//
116a3(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa ru ni gsungs pa ni// sgra yi dga' ba ma lus pa'o// 'jigs pa'i dga' ba brgyad par gsungs// de bzhin gzhan yang sna tshogs dga'// bcu pa bcu yi dga' ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni nam mkha'i dga'// de dga'
116a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang mchog tu dga'// bco lnga par ni gsungs pa ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bar 'dod// bcu drug pa yi mtshan nyid ni// dga' bral du ni bshad pa yin// de dag dga' chen bcu drug ni// zla ba'i lta bu'i dbus
116a5(rgyud 'grel): na'o// dkar po phyogs la yang dag bshad// gang ba gsum gyi bye brag gis// go rims ji bzhin bshad pa yang // dga' ba gsum ste rtsa gsum pa'o// thams cad gzung bar ldan pa ni// go rims ji bzhin 'pho ba
116a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ shes rab de nyid khyad par ro// thabs ni bcu drug gsungs po yang // rtag tu stong pa nyid la bshad// dang po sogs nas gnam stong par// gang phyir phyag 'tshal ba'i tshig/ bcu drug pa yi ming can no// gnyis
116b1(rgyud 'grel): med rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs// dkar nag phyogs ni gnyis med 'dod// bdag nyid chen por gang spyod de// srid pa las ni rgal nas 'gro/ lhan cig skyes pa gtsang ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rtog pa'ang yin// lhan cig
116b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa zla ma na// mdzad pa gsu nga skyon cig stes/ dum khas pa da/ ma can rnam de / b+h+ri sman skyes gnyin med ni/ spyan dam ma/ spyan skyes tu thA ng+geSh+Ta /
116b3(rgyud 'grel): ldong dang nyal la sogs pa'ang de// ji srid lhan skyes tsam nyid la// sems nyid ngal so spyod yul lo// de la bya dang byed pa yi// gnyis po deg las gnyis med 'byung // de ni rtog med mtshan nyid de// rnal 'byor ma yi kho na
116b4(rgyud 'grel): las/ de dag de rnams gsum pa ni// bdag nyid 'ba' zhig dran pa'o// yang nA dad pa can dag gi/ rang gi slob mo rgyud pa las// mngon par dga' dang klags pa dang // mnyam pa dang ni sgom pa dang // gzhon dag gi ni bstan
116b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ skal dang skal med rnams dpyad na// de dag gsang ba'i 'khor lo yi// tshigs bcad dag la go rims bzhin// dgu pa dang ni bco lnga lnga// de bzhin du ni steng 'og gnyis// gcig pa nyid ni spyi gtsug dbus// kun bsdus
116b6(rgyud 'grel): sumi cu rtsa gnyis mchog/ nye bar bsdus pa las ye shes lnga'i bstod pa don bsdus pa rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// // de bzhin gzhan yang phan yon no// tshigs bcang sde yi nang du ste// 'di de
117a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa// bstod pa yis ni nang du gsungs// gzhan dag kyang ni rnyed smra bas// nye bar bsdus parlangs ma bshad// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // spangs rgyas gzugs ni grangs med rnams// byang chub sems
117a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i tshogs mchog nyid// ma lus bdag la bzod par gsol// sgyu 'phrul dra sogs mdor bsdus nas// glo dang gzhi mchog tu gsungs pa ste// bsod nams de yis 'jig rten pa// ji ltar de bzhin rol par smon// gnas ni phra
117a3(rgyud 'grel): ba phu ri ru// gzhan dag gis ni gsol btab nas// mtshan ma mtsholdog dge mthong gyur pas// gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje byasaM// nye bar bsdus pa las phan yin rtogs par sla ba rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o//
117a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon yang dag par brjod pa'i nye bar bsdus pa rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar
117a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi mkhan po chen po shrI badz+ra bo d+hi dang // shu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal ser rtse bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul gyi// gnas mchog sman
117a6(rgyud 'grel): lung gtsug lag khang // rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang ldan me// de dag don du legs par bsgyur// / dge'o// /
118a1(rgyud 'grel): nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdus don mtshan gyi sgron ma bzhugs//
118b1(rgyud 'grel): klu rigs mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang // kun tu gzigs pas 'dod byon pa// sangs rgyas kun bskyed yab 'gyur zhes// mtshan gsol 'jam dbyangs der btud nas// rnyed la gdung sogs da min gyi// mu
118b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dres mtshan la dad sems kyis// bdag dran phyir byas 'gal ba med// gzhan du gyur na'ang de mi 'gal// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig bdag gi/ mtshan rnams yang dge brjod pa la// spyi don bcu bzhi dreng bsdus
118b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi de la spyi don bcu bzhi yi// rnar dbye ba bya ba ni// zhus nas skor gsungs rigs drug gzigs// sgyu 'phrul mngon par byang chub dang // rdo rje 'chang chen dkyil 'khor dang // rnam par srung mdzad mi bskyod dang // tshe dpag ma de dang rin
118b4(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung // don yod 'khor lo dag bstod pa// phan yon dang ni sngags rings dang // bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o// zhus la tshigs bcad bcu drug ste// de la nang bsis rnam pa bdun// gang gis zhus la tshigs bcad
118b5(rgyud 'grel): ldalngalda gang ltar zhus la tshigs bcad gcig/ gang phyir zhus la gnyis su gnas// gang la zhus la gcig yin no// gang zhus pa la tshigs bcad bzhi// ji skad zhus pa'i don bzhin du// sgrub par khas blangs pa la gnyis// de phyir
118b6(rgyud 'grel): gug nyan tshigs bcad gcig/ slar gsungs pa lo tshigs bcad drug/ nang gi dbye ba rnam pa bdun// gang gis gsungs la tshigs rkang gnyis// gang ltar gsungs la shu log gnyis// gang la gsungs la shu log phyed// gong
119a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir gsungs lnga tshigs rkang gnyis// gang gsum pa la rgung pa gsum// rna gtod nyon cig 'doms pa la// tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis su gzhes// gnang nas btung rag phul rkang gcig/ rigs drug gzigs
119a2(rgyud 'grel): la tshigs bcad gnyis// 'dis gzigs dang blo tshig rkang gcig/ de 'og tshig gcig spyir gzigs pa// lha drug don yod rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod mtha' yas rin chen byung // rdo rje sems dang drug rims bzhin// gzhan lugs
119a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la gzhan du snang // de la gzigs nas 'di mdzad brjod// dkyil 'khor drug gi bstod pa dang // phan yon sngags rigs bsdus sogs kyi// gzhung tshad mtshan dron go rims bzhin// rang rang skabs su 'og nas 'chad//
119a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i don bzhi ri bzhag pa yin// rnam par dbye bar bya ba ni// zhus dang slar gsungs ris drug gzigs// dmigs pa'i yul du bzhag par bya// mngon rtogs dkyil 'khor drug dang bstod// sngags rangs dang
119a5(rgyud 'grel): dgus nyams blangs thabs// phan yon gyis ni bskyed pa dang // thob bya'i 'bras bu bstan pa yin// bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas// dmigs thabs 'bras bu gsum bsdus bstan// 'dis zhus 'dis gsungs 'dis gsungs
119a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang ston pa rnam pa gsum// mchog gsum rgyu 'bras thabs dang gsum// thob bya'i yul du bzhi rig pa yin// gzhan yang zhus lan gzigs pa gsum// thabs dang de bzhin shes rab dang // gnyis su med dang
119b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum du// nang gi tshe na bzhag pa yin// nyams su blang ba'i thabs dag ni// rnal 'byor gzhung gi 'khor lo ste// de yang phyi nang dbye ba yis// rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa yin// phyi rol la yang rnam gsum ste// snying kha shes rab
119b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang // pho brang lha yi 'khor lo dang // 'khrul 'khor las kyi 'khor lo'o// nang gi 'khor lo gcig nyid de// lus gnas rtsa yi 'khor lo'o// 'khor lo bzhi po de dag la// re re la yang bdun bdun no// de la shes rab
119b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ni// ji ltar rnam par bsam zhe na// dang por rang 'dod pa'i lha// sa bon mdog dang so so'i rgya// de thugs dang po'i sangs rgyas ni// zhal lnga phyag brgyad kun thun mong // de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni// rig drug dbye
119b4(rgyud 'grel): bas rnam pa drug/ bsdus pa dang ni bdun gyur te// lte ba rtsibs dang rtsibs rte na can+da// lta bA mu khyud gnyi si kyis bskor// rtsibs rten mu khyud gnyis yod pa// lte ba'i mu khyud nang ma la// sngags rings gnyis phyed rtsa ba
119b5(rgyud 'grel): dgod// phyi la A li rnams dgod de// rtsibs rteni mu khyud nang ma la// sngags rings gnyis phye phreng sngags dgod// phyi la kA li legs pA ra dgod// mu khyud sngags dang mdog dkar mtshungs// rtsibs grangaso so so'i
119b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po la// drug ste sngags drug mtshan raM dgod// mdog drug ldan par bsgom par bya// dbus su oM ni dkar por bkod// so sorare rtog pa'i rtsibs brgyad la// badz+ra tik+Sha la sogs dgod// yi ge 'bru re re kha dog dmar// dbus
120a1(rgyud 'grel): su hrIHyang kha dog mthun// me long lta bu'i yang brgyad pa// duHkhe ts+tshe da la sogs pa// 'bru re rI ste kha dog sngo// lte dbus hUM yang mdog mchog sngo// chos dbyings ye shes rtsi bus bcu pa// rtsibs
120a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun la dgod pa ni// pr-i dz+nyA dz+nyA na la sogs bcu// dbus kyi a dang do kun dkar// byi grub ye shes 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad dz+nyA na kA la sogs// rtsibs rI 'bru re lte pa ro a// shin tu mdzes pa'i ljang khu'o//
120a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// de la bA gi shwa ra sogs// 'bru re dgod cing kha dog ser// drug pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dgu pa// a ra pa tsa la sogs pa// yig dgu gcig la gnyis dgod bya// dbus su a
120a4(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu dkar// shes rab 'khor lo'i lte ba ru// dang po la ni ye shes sems// thun mong mtshan dang ldan par bsam// gzhan la mchin yang so so ste// so sor rtog la rdo rje rno// me long ral gri sdug bsngal gcod// chos dbyings
120a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ya shes so// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes sku// mnyam pa nyid la ngag dbang phyug/ rdo rje sems la mtshan mchog ni// a ra pa tsa na zhes bya// mdog dang phyag mchin so sor bsam// ma ngon rtogs la ni tshigs
120a6(rgyud 'grel): bcad gsum// tshigs bcad dngos gcig sngags la gnyis// de ltar shes rab 'khor lo ni// gzhung tshad bcad pa legs bstan nas// da ni pho brang lha 'khor lo// de yi dbye ba bstan par bya// rnam par snang mdzad
120b1(rgyud 'grel): che zhes pa// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje ni// lnga yi rang bzhin drug pa ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha dang mtshan// gtso bo'i thugs ka'i ye shes sems// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// mtshan rnams rnam pa gnyis bzhed//
120b2(rgyud 'grel): de yis thugs ka'i zla dkyil na// mtshan ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang a lAs byung // dri steng a lA rnam gsum ste/ a ni yig 'bru kun mchog dang // don chen zhes ni 'byung ba dang // yi ge dam
120b3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes pa gsum// dri ltar de dag gsum po ni// mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun du bzhed// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i rnams la ni// khong nas byung dang skye med gi nyes// satwa badz+ri mu yi mtshan// tshig tu brjed pa spangs
120b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu// rat+na badz+rI ma yi mtshan// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu mchog nyid// d+harma bA dzI ma yi mtshan// tshig kun shes ni 'byung ba dang // rab tu gsal byed ma dang gnyis// karma badz+ri ma yi mtshan// de dag la ni mtshan drug
120b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ dang po tha mi gnyis gnyis so// rgyal ba lnga la mtshan gsum gsum// tshig rkang dang po gnyis gnyis so// 'og ma 'og ma re re la// mchod pa chen po chags chen nas// khro ba chen po dgra cha'i mthar// rgyal rnams
120b6(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga yum bzhi drug/ nyi shu rtsa gcig dag tu bshad// 'dod pa che dang bde ba che// rdo rje sems dang rgyal po gnyis// dga' ba che dang mgu che gnyis// chags pa dang ni legs pa'i mtshan// tshig rkang gnyis la bzhir

121a2(rgyud 'grel): dag dbang bskur sems dpa' bzhi// shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba nas// snang ba chen po gsal tsho'i mthar// tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa la ni// sems dpa' bzhi ste mtshan mchog bdun// rkang pa dang po rdo rje chos
121a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mchog gcig tu shes par bya// rnon po la ni gnyis yin te// nyon mongs lcags kyu che dang mchog/ rgyu la grags chen snyan grags gnyis// sla la snang che gsal tshe gnyis// ye shes sems dpar grags pa
121a4(rgyud 'grel): yin/ mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul che 'chang nas// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul mthar// tshigs bcad gcig la sems dpa' bzhi// mtshan rnams drug tu bzhed pa yin// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul che 'chang gnyis// rdo rje las
121a5(rgyud 'grel): su shes par bya// sgyu 'phru la che dang don gru ba ba// rdo rje bsrung ba'i mtshan yin no// lhag ma gnyis lA re re'o// sems dpa' de drag bzhi po ni// las kyi sems dpa' rnamra sa yin no// sems dpa'

121b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i tshigs bcad gnyis// lha mo brgyad dang spro bar bzhed// sbyin bdag che dang gtso bo gnyis// sgeg mo yi ni mtshan yin no// tshul khrims chen dang 'chang mchog ni// phreng ba ma lA gnyis su bzhed// bzod chen 'chang dang brtan

121b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan bzang skyong gi/ shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ni// blo gros rgya mtsho'i mtshan yin no// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// blo gros mi bzad pa yi mtshan// spobs pa rtsegs pa zhes bya ba// stobs
122a1(rgyud 'grel): chen phra rol gnon cig pu// nub kyi phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi// srid pa'i ri bo che 'joms nas// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'i mthar// mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren// mya ngan 'joms dang

122a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba bzang // 'od zer can dang 'od 'phro bzang // mya ngon med dang de bzhin skags// 'od 'phro 'dzin dang yon tan 'od// der ston pa dang mar me ldan// rab bzang dang ni sman bzang po// dpar bo dang ni mdzod spu dang /
122b1(rgyud 'grel): brtan po dang ni dpal gyi lha// mthong bar dka' dang yon tan 'od// skra can dang ni grangs can dang // tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang brtan pa'i mtshams// rig pa dang ldan dang 'od mdzad pa// ri bo che dang rdo rje che// rgyal min+da dang ni 'jigs
122b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa// rin po che dang pad+ma dang // stobs sde can dang me tog 'od// ye shes 'od da nga lha chen po// tshig gi bdag dang snang mtha' yas// kus sbyin dang ni brtan po'i rim// don yod mthong dang dbang po sbyin// mi ltung ba dang
122b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal / rgya ni sa pa ste// dga' ba'i rgyam dang dan 'dang gi// dga' di mdzang da na y-i // seMn tan lag dang sgras/ den yang dngas dang sdigs bzang ba// zla ba da n-i shA rnam
122b4(rgyud 'grel): chen pa dang gtsug nor bu// drug po dang ni seng ge 'gros// dang pa dang ni rnam rgyal don// shes rab brtsegs drang legs gnas pa// blo gros dang ni yan lag skyes// bdud rtse bu dang gzugs bzang po// ye shes can
122b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'od zer can// dka' thub brtan dang bkra shis ldan// bde ba'i tog dang pad+ma dang // mi yi theg dang badre ba'i phyag/ ye shes mdzad blo dang 'od bral// tshangs pas byin dang rin chen mdzod// me tog lha dang legs pa'i
122b6(rgyud 'grel): don/ chos dbang phyug dang blo gros grags// rdo rje tig dang pad+ma sgrub// rnam par rol dang du ma'i lha// ri yi tog dang 'od kyi tshogs// mi zad po dang rin chen snying // bzod chen pa dang chos kyi zlo// yid kyi yul dang
123a1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan grags// zla ba'i 'od dang gsal ba'i ro// seng ge rtog dang lus las bzlog/ snying po dpal dang nges pa'i tog/ glog gi 'od dang gser sbyin cha// gzhan gyis mi thub tog gi rgyal// rab tu grags
123a2(rgyud 'grel): dang brtson 'grus brtan// dpe bral grags dang gshin rje 'jigs 'gyur// dgra bcom lha drang mar me che// 'jig rten 'od dang dri dang po// yon tan 'jigs dang mun bral 'gyur// seng ge sgra dang rin chen grags// skye rang
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dang yid skyes zla// legs par ston dang gzugs brnyan brgyan// nor bu bzang dang rin chen tog/ chos 'byung gnas dang rnam nges don// tshe ster ba dang rin chen gnas// rgyal dbang po dang rin chen mnan// gnas
123a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i blo dang bskamo bral gdugs// rnam snang dpal dang seng ge sgra// rnam par rol dang k+Sha yi 'ong // me tog ro dang klu dbang can// ri dbang phyug dang shin tu bsam// stobs kyi l+yA dang yon tan phreng // klu yi phyag dang gzug
123a5(rgyud 'grel): brnyan brgyan// rgyal ba'i blo dang ye shes khyab// bdud rtsi sgra dang bden par smra// rab ni blo dang mtha' yas gzugs// rnam snang mdzad deng rinI chen+da tig/ 'dod pa bral dang legs gzhibs pa// don yod sangs rgyas
123a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa 'chang // me tog dang ni rdor dbang rgyal// ga zi brjid can dang don ston pa// tshe dpag med dang khro dbang phyug/ do na gnas can dang mi shigs grags// mya ngan med dang dri ma bral// tsha ba'i lha zhes bya ba'o//
123b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di yi gzhung gi tshad dag kyang // tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lhur ni// tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba// rgyal ba lnga la rim bzhin du// sum cu rtsa drug rtsa drug mtshan// sdoms pas brgya dang brgyad cu gcig/ mi bskyod dkyil
123b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha rnams ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis// khro bo rnam rgyal sgyu 'phrul dra// phyag rdor dbang bskur rgyud las gnyis// rdo rje brgyan dang rig pa mchog/ bde mchog rgyun dang rdo 'dus// don yod zhags dang rdo tha~Mng / gas dpa 'dras

123b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang sa 'og rgyud// sgyu 'phrul dra dang bde mchog rgyud// khro bo bde mchog sarba dang ni// rgyud de rnams la mtshan re 'byung // khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud gnyis las// khro zla dang ni rta mchog rgyud// mtshan ni re rer
123b5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// mi mnyami mnyam dang gsang rgyu da de// rgyud de lus ni bzhi 'byung ngo // dpal mchog dang po gsang ba 'dus// gsung ba ma dzod dang gsang ba 'dus// rdo rje gsang rgya na nor bu gsal// de
123b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'dus po'i rgyud dang ni// rgyud de rnams las ma tshan re re// dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las gnyis// rnam snang mngon byang chub las gnyis// gnyis med mnyam dang khams gsum rgyal// rgyud de las ni re
124a1(rgyud 'grel): re'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis// phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i// rgyud las khro bo bzhi 'byung / rdo DI po'i rgyud sa sa gnyig/ rdo zeng phreng chud pas 9/ khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud las gnyis// dpung bzangs rgyud
124a2(rgyud 'grel): drang legs par grub// yi ge drug dung 'bum pa dang // 'jam dpal rgyud dang mngon dam rgyan// de bzhin khams gsum rnam rgyal dang // rgyud/ de rnams las re re'o// 'jom dpal rgyud las gnyis 'byung ngo // 'di
124a3(rgyud 'grel): yid gzhung tshad bstan pa ni// cha gas bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig/ mtshan rnams bdun cu rtsa gcig ste// rgyal ba lnga la bcu bzhi re// rgyud sde so sor lha dbye byas// pad+ma gur dbang de kyil 'khor gyi// lha rnams
124a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par brjod pa ni// ye shes grags dang de bzhin rgyal// yon tan 'od dang khyad par che// zla ba rgyal dang pad+ma'i 'od// dka' thub rgyal dang mar me bzang // glog gi tog dang 'od kyi rgyal// gsal ba pa dang dpe bral
124a5(rgyud 'grel): grags// pad+ma grags dang me tog mtshan// spyan bzang mchog dang grangs med don// drag po ste drang bsod nams 'od// khyad par can dang tshogs myed blo// rA hu lA dang ye shes 'od// grags dbang dang nI ye shes dbang // skar
124a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tog dang rI hu la// sman pa che dang sman pa'i rgyal// bsod nams dbang dang rgyu ba bo// skar ma'i rgyal dang rgyal ba pa// ni 'ong 'char dang chos kyi mdzod// blo gris legs dang rgyal dbang po// rdo rje sde dang rdo rje brtsegs// legs
124b1(rgyud 'grel): par gnas dang rgyal ba'i blo// tshungs pa'i dbyangs dang klu dbang po// g.yon gsal dbang dang mngon shes tog/ 'od kyi tog dang dga' tshangs pa// sgra mi snyan dang rol pa'i gar// mkhas dang gzhan gyis mi thub dbyangs// rin
124b2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'od dang gsungs dbyangs sbyin// seng gau dang ni nyi sna tshogs// ye shes dpal dang pad+ma phung po// me tog dang ni rnam mnan 'gro/ gsal ba dang ni zla mar me// mi bzad pa dang blo bzangs spyan// yan lag btsugs dang
124b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab yul// mchog tu gyur dang rab 'joms zer// shes rab sbyin dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs// tshigs med spyod dang mthu bo sbyin// dag pa dang ni ye shes gnam// bde gshegs 'od dang dbang po'o// thub pa 'chang
124b4(rgyud 'grel): dang lha zhes pa// 'od zer bzang dang gzugs bzang po// rgyal po dang ni dron grub mdzad// seng ge dang ni dri ldan dang // grags pa zhes dang rgyal ba'o// mchog snying dang ni bsod nams zer// mdog bzangs dang ni nyan
124b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa// mar me dang ni rin chen brtsegs// tshigs med lha dang dang ba'i bdag/ grol bar 'gro dang gser gtsug phud/ sgra gcan bzang dang mi thub pa// rang bzhin thub dang zla ba'i 'od// gser mdog bzang po dang dgen/
124b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dbang lha dang chos kyi gdugs// yon tan legs dang grol zhes pa// ye shes rdzogs dang zhib mo'i blo// 'od rab 'bar dang skyabs kyi sman// rnam grol tog dang shes rab mchog/ ye shes rgyal dang 'jigs pa'i
125a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// glo bur 'joms dang thogs med grags// bden par gsung dang ngag snyan pa// ri dbang grags dang chos brtsegs la// 'gro ba'i 'od dang legs par brgyan// rang gi lus dang ye shwe
125a2(rgyud 'grel): ngagra/ seng mche rno dang sel ba po// 'gro ba mchod dang seng ge grags// chos kyi mtshan dang skal pa bzang // mi bskyod mdog dang 'bar ba'i rgyal// rtogs pa dang ni spyan bzang po// don rig blo drang 'jigs med
125a3(rgyud 'grel): gser// dri yi 'od dang dga' ba'o// don yod 'gro dang khro thal mdog/ mchog gi gzugs dang nyan pa po// gtso bo grugs dang drag po sbyin// nyi ma'i lha dang gshon 'joms lhag/ shing rta'i 'gros dang blo gros
125a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang // gser btso ma dang skal ldan gtsug/ dbang phyug dang ni dga' ba bstan// mos pa 'joms dang ye shes mdzod// tshangs pa'i 'gros dang tsan dan dang // mya ngan med dang seng ge'o// tog gi yul
125a5(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma'i snying // 'od mtha' yas dang lha yi yul// bsod nams mye tog rig pa'i lha// ye shes dbang dang tshangs pa gsal// rin chen phyag dang dbang po ldan// dpe bral 'gros dang the tsom ldan// mchod pa
125a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni 'bar ba dang // sangs rgyas gdags dang 'dam gyi mchog/ yid 'ong ldan dang bya grub pa// rma bya dang ni chos ldan dang // phan ldan gzugs dang ye shes dang // grags pa dang ni 'od zer 'bar// ma lus
125b1(rgyud 'grel): phan dang be du'i snying // rgyu skar dang ni lha nyid lhan// ri bong can dang dra ba'i 'od // dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan zer// yid legs pa dang rigs kyi 'od// spyod pa po dang rigs kyi mtsho// chos dbang phyug dang sku yi lha// yon tan
125b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang 'khor lo dbang // legs pa'i dbyangs dang legs par reg/ don grub pa dang gzi brjid dpal// kun mnyam nyid dang bdud rtsi dbyangs// bde bar snang dang legs pa'i blo// rnam grol don dang khyad dbang phyug/
125b3(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i mchog dang lhag mthong gnas// nyes pa spangs dang nyi ma'i 'od// bkra rgyal blo dang pad+ma'i mchog/ nyi mAM'i 'od dang so sor gsungs// legs pa dang ni tshogs dbang po// 'jigs pa bral dang ye shes srid//
125b4(rgyud 'grel): spobs pa'i mtshan nyid dang blo mchog/ ri bong can dang rin chen zla// mi 'jigs pa dang me long che// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang snyan pa'i gsung // shes rab 'od dang kun mnyam blo// rdo rje blo dang blo dang ldan// nam
125b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i dbang dang ngag dbang phyug/ yon tan dpal dang gnas kyi dpal// 'phags pa'i 'od dang gsal ba'i shugaso// gsal ba'i ro dang dri dbang phyug/ 'dod can gdong dang ye shes gsung // rab tu 'dug dang
125b6(rgyud 'grel): chos rgyal mtshan// dri ma bral dang chos dbang phyug/ skal bral sgra dang gzi brjid 'od// drang srong dbang dang blo gros phan// spobs pa'i 'khor lo dang zla zhal// nyi zla'i 'od dang yon tan mtsho// yon tan gsung pad
126a1(rgyud 'grel): blo me tog/ bsod nams tog dang spobs pa'i yul// rigs pa bskyed dang rgyal rigs dang // rnam grol bsam dang dbang phyug dang // mchog ces pa dang ye shes dbyangs// na mkha'i mkha' dang
126a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang // dpung tshogs dpal dang yon tan zla// rA hu la dang bdud rtsi 'od// rin tshe na 'od dang zla ba'i 'od// ye shes stobs dang ye shes sku// 'di yi gzhung tshad bstan pa ni// tshigs bcang bzhi bcu rtsa
126a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis so// mtshan ni nyis brgya bdun cu lnga// ye shes lnga po re re la// lnga bcu rtsa ni lnga lnga'o// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor gyi// lha rnams me lus bstan pa ni// don grub dpal dang ye shes nyi ma// don yod
126a4(rgyud 'grel): grub dang ri dbang brtsegs// dgras sbyin dang ni pad+ma dang // dgra bcom grags dang ye shes tog/ nyon mongs 'joms dang me zhes pa// bde ba dri dang dpe bral 'od// rI bo grags dang srid mtha' ston// zla ba dang ni
126a5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen zla// seng ge rgyal dang bsam gtan 'dod// dpe dang brel dang rnam par rol// yon tan rin chen dang don grub// dgra bcom grags pa rin chen 'od// srid pa bcings dang spyod rnams 'phrul// mdzod spu dang
126a6(rgyud 'grel): ni spobs pa grags// rdor nor bu dang tshe dpag med// nor bu 'od dang ri bo grags// 'od zer bcu dang gnyis dang bral// klu yi stobs dang yid du 'ong // rin chen zla dang shugs can dang // / gsal ba dang ni dga' di bang
126b1(rgyud 'grel): phyug/ gtsug phud 'od dang 'jigs bral dang // yon snying po dang dri med grags// gzi brjid zhing dang gdang ba grags// sangs rgyas lnga 'dod rin chen gzugs// sangs rgyas stobs dang seng ge gshog/ grong che mtho dang blo//
126b2(rgyud 'grel): gros legs// 'jig rten 'od dang rin chen lha// skal ldan shing rta yang dag rgyal// dga' ba bkod dang 'od kyi mu// dka' thub che dang zla ba dang // chos bstan pa dang mi thub zla// ri bo 'od dang 'chang ba'i dbyangs// bden
126b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha dang yon tan brtsegs// seng ge lU dang nor go cha// zla ba dang ni sgra dang mtshungs// grags chen dang ni gzi brjid shugs// chos kyi grags dang dga' ba ldan// dri bzang po dang ri rgyal mtshan// dgo' ba'i 'od dang
126b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon can// srid mtha'i nor bu dang bden gsungs// rnam snang mdzad dang rnam par ngas// grags pa'i mtha' dang glog 'chang ba// seng ge 'od zer srog dang ldan// 'gro ba'i theg dang thun tshod dang // grags pa mchog
126b5(rgyud 'grel): blo bzang chub// nor zla 'od bsrang thub mi bzad// skar rgyal don byed dang nor 'khor// seng ge glang des yon tan brgyan// rin chen 'od sa bya ba ste// mnyam nyid ye shes 'khor lo la// gzhung ni tshigs bcad nyi
126b6(rgyud 'grel): shu bzhi// mtshan ni brgya dang rtsa bzhi'o// rigs re nyi shu ki shu ste// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtso bo la// go rims bzhin du brtag par bya// de phyir brgya dang rtsa bzhir nges// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor lho// nges par sbyar
127a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba ni// dbang byed rgyal dang bdud rab zhi// sangs rgyas mnyam dang rtog bral dang // dI rab zhi dang rmongs la ston// rol pa dang ni dge bzang po// ye shes thugs dang smra ba'i dbang // lha chen
127a2(rgyud 'grel): po dang blo gros bzang // tshe dpag meng dang chos kyi stobs// 'jig rten mchog dang sgra gcan nyi// rgyal mtshan grol dang sman pa mchog/ me tog dang ni dge gtsug bud // bdud rtsi 'ad dang bya nga sems rdor// rgya
127a3(rgyud 'grel): mtsho brtan dang rin chen dpung // rol pa'i stobs dang nyi ma'i dpung // dga' ba'i 'od dang rin tshug dang // rjes mthun dpal dang seng ge 'gros// gsungs pa po dang me tog sbyin// grol ba 'i 'od dang pad+ma dang // ye shwe
127a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang rol pa'i bkod// don yod gnas dang bstan pa'i 'od// rgyal mtshan tog dang bde ba'i ba sam// rnam grol rgyal dang sems tshul shes// rgya mtsho dga' dang rin chen 'dzin// mi thub pa dang 'gro ba mnyes// sgra
127a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po drang dul ba dang // dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs kun lha dang // srid dri spong dang mchog gi mu// lha mang sgra dang rin chen stobs// pad+ma'i phyag dong dga' yas rgyal// rtogs grub dang ni yul bzang po// me tog
127a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang seng ge sgra// zla ba smra dang rdul spangs pa// mi g.yo ba dang blo gros dang // bsod nams mar maM dang rtogs sgra// gzi brjid stobs dang blo gnas gzugs// zla ba gsang dang byang yon tan// ston pa dang ni gzi
127b1(rgyud 'grel): brjid bzang // ye shes gzi stobs dang dge 'od// brten pa'i stobs dang lha yi bu// rab zhi ba dang nyi ma'i zhal// grol ba'i 'od dang tshul khrims 'ong // dka' thub dang ni rdul med dang // rgya mtsho'i gsung dang mig sman dang // kun
127b2(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal dang sems can 'od// dri mang 'od dang dran pa po// zhal ras sdug dang rgyal mtha' yas// blo yi mchog dang dpung rab zhi// rin chen 'od dang chos dbang phyug/ sna tshegs lha zhes bya ba'o// bya ba grub ye shes
127b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la// tshigs bcad bco lnga gzhung tshad yin// mtshan ni dgu bcu dgu rtsa lnga ste// rigs re re la bcu dgu dgu'o// sgyu 'phrul mngon par byang chub pa// tshig gi badrig pos tshigs btsod nas// ya te ne ma'i mtha'
127b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig gsum// ma lus pa dang de bzhin du// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan nas// tshig kun gsal bar byed pa'i mthar// gnyis te lnga yis spyi gtsug 'khor// byams chen
127b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin zhes pa nas// theg pa chen po'i tshul mchog mthar// tshigs bcad bzhi dang pad+ma gshegs kyi// nyi shu rtsa lnga 'chang ba dang // me long rdo rje 'dzugs byed nas// glang chen ko rlon zhes pa'i mthur// tshigs bcad
127b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang rkang gcig ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis dpral 'khor lo// rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu yi// mchod pa chen po chags che nas// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i mthar// tshigs bcad brgyad kyis snying 'khor lo// me long lta bu'i
128a1(rgyud 'grel): ya shes kyi// drag chen ha ha zhes bsgrags nas// sgra dang ldan mthar tshigs bcad bdun// lte ba'i 'khor lo'i tshig du 'gyur// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'chang
128a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // mnyam nyid ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa nas// rnam pa kun rig sangs rgyas par// tshigs su bcad pa ba co lnga ste// spyi sdom drug cu rtsa bzhi yis// lte ba'i 'khor lor rab tu
128a3(rgyud 'grel): grags// mnyam nyid ye shes dgu las pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul sku nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin mthar// brgyad ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo raM bzhed// bye ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi// tshigs bcad
128a4(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga tshang ba la// mnyam nyid mtha' ma'i tshig bsnun pas// bcu drug gsang ba'i 'khor lo'o// sgyu 'phrul mngon par byang chub dang // rdo rje dbyings dang de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs
128a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang las rigs bdun// tshigs bcang brgya dang sum cu gsum// nang gi 'khor lo drug pa'o// 'das grangs tshigs bcad grangs kyang monyam// gnas lugs gong du bstan pa yin// las kyi
128a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul 'khor skabs 'dir bya// bstod pa'i rim par phe ba la// tshig rkang nyi shu tshigs bcad lnga// me long chos dbyings so sor rtog/ mnyam nyid bya grub go rims bzhin// byang sems rdo rje'i 'khor lo la//
128b1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad lnga po kun gyis bstod// lhag ma 'khor lo lnga la ni// bdud rtsi tshigs bcad re re dang // sbyar zhing so sor bstod par bya// rigs kun bsdus pa'i 'khor lo la// dang po'i sgo la kun gyis bstod// lhag ma sgo
128b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams so so la// tshigs bcad ye shes bstan zhing bstod// gsang ba lus kyi 'khor lo la// bstod pa dag dang ye shes su// sbyar tI dang po 'dud bzhi'o// mchog gi dga' bzhi me long ngo // lhag ma bzhi tshig bcu
128b3(rgyud 'grel): drug go/ dga' ba bcu drug rim pa bzhin// chos dbyings kun rtog mnyam nyid dang // bya grub rims bzhin 'dud bzhi bzhi// no nga gi rgyas bshad 'dir ma byas// gsang ba'i phyir dang mdor bsdus phyir// phan yon
128b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i gzhung tsha ni// brgya dang lnga bcur shes par bya// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // zhes pa bos nas gsungs bdun la// dang po gnyis kyi 'khor lo ni// dang po yi ni phon yon bstan// lha ga mau bzhi ni 'khor
128b5(rgyud 'grel): lo bzhi'i// rI me pa bzhin du phan yon yin// zhes pa rang l-i bsdus phan yon// yang na klog sems la sogs so// gsang sngags rim par dbye ba yis// gzhung tshad tshigs bcad phyed dang bzhi// de la dbye na rnam
128b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te// oM zhes pa nas aM aHmthar// rtsa ba'i sngags su shes par bya// pra kr-i ti nas a yi mthar// phreng ba'i sngags zhes bya ba yin// snying po la sogs sngags kun la// thun mong ming ni rnam bzhi ste// mgon
129a1(rgyud 'grel): med mtha' med bsdus pa sprul// 'di ni mtha' med ces bya yin// sgra kun bskyed pa'i sngon du ni// bzlas dang rgyun du bzlas pa dang // 'khor lo dgod par bya ba dang // bya ba thams cad 'dis byed de// sangs rgyas
129a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa kun byed phyir// bsdus bi'i tshigs su bcad pa la// tshigs rkang nyi shu tshogs bcang lde// 'od gshegs rnams kyi dri med shes rab skra// 'jam dbyangos mtshan go sol zab cing rgya che ba// nges lung mi 'gal bla
129a3(rgyud 'grel): mas man ngag rgyud// de la brten nas bdag don tsam brtsams te// bshad mdzad dgongs 'grel bdug gis 'gal ba med// nyes pa ci mthong ba dag blo dpya bi 'i rigs// bdag pas dman la phan pa 'ga' srid na// dge
129a4(rgyud 'grel): des 'gro kun mtshan mchog rtogs gyur cig// 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba khri drug stong pa tinge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa phan yon dang bcas pa'i bshad pa/ nor bu'i
129a5(rgyud 'grel): gling du 'khrungs pa dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal ba can/ pa la sna tshogs gzugs kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa/ sngags don rnam par gzigs pa dang / de'i rjes su 'breng ba slob dpon chen po
129a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad de/ nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdus don mtshan gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// prad+d+ha gu rus mdzad do// dge'o//
130a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs//
130b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI na ma saM gI tI TI kA sa ra no bi ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag pAr brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya
130b2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu ra gyur pa li phyag 'tshal laM// gzugs sogs dbang po'i yul las 'das pa yI// rnam dag 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku// dbang po'i gzhu 'dras sa lam rab grol zhing //
130b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu'i 'oms bu ltar gso mdzad lnga// dam pa'i skyes mchog nges ston mdzad pa yi// zhabs kyi mtsho skyes gnas der spyi btud nas// tshig rgyas pa yi las rab bsdus pa'i don// dpag med 'byung gnas thabs
130b4(rgyud 'grel): mang ston pa'o// blo ni rmongs 'gyur rig pa'i gnas mod kyang // rje btsun drin gyis rgyud rnams kun gyi bcung // rtogs shing gsung rab la sogs gzhung gzhan yang // mthong bas snying po'i mngon rtogs bshad par
130b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin pa'o// 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba lA sde// thig le bzhir 'gyur dgur bcas pa// mnga' gnyis rab tu phye ba la// ri ma gnyis rab tu sbyor ba ste// rgyud kyi rgyud nyid bshad kyi nyon// de la
130b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud 'di ni rin po che lta bu yin te/ dbang po bzhi dang shi na tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro// la la dag ni bya ba dang spyad pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi thabs dang / shes rab kyi rgyud kho na'o zhes zer te/ de
131a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag ni snying po la spyod pa'i gang zag ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin spros pa thams cad kyis dben zhing brtags pa'i rtog pa gang gis kyang ma gos par gcig pas du ma mi
131a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyis kyang gdul bya'i blo'i khyad par gyis du mar snang zhing rang rang gi rtog pa las bden par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'ga' zhig tu// yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs par// chos kyi char
131a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis tshim mdzad pa// sems can gzhug pa'i ched du gnas// zhes gsungs pas so// de bas na kho bo ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni gtso bor ston te/ gzhan gyi rig pa ma yin pa yang // chos kyi dbyings la dbyer
131a4(rgyud 'grel): med phyir// gtso bos thag dbye ma ma chos kyang // gang gis theg pa gsum bstan pa// nga ni thabs la mkhas pa'i dngos// zhes gsungs pas ni/ dman pa dang 'bring dang rab kyi khyad par gyis nyan thos dang // ring
131a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang / theg pa che na po bstan pa yin no// rgyud du ston pa nyid du yang rigs te/ sngon du byung bas yang rgyud gcig nyid la du mAr bzhag pa nyid de/ de ltar yang rgyud gcig nyid la du mar go ba'o//
131a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i gur lis// skyes bu bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pha yi rgyud bshad do// btsun mo bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do// dman pa las ni las kyi rgyud//
131b1(rgyud 'grel): lalus kyi rnal 'byor de lhag pa// sems can mchog la lhag rnal 'byor// bla med rnal 'byor de lhag la// zhes gsungs pas na/ rten la sogs pa'i khyad par du shes par bya'o// gleng ga ni bstan pa nyid kyis chog pa ma yin
131b2(rgyud 'grel): twetesngar bzhin no// dbang po rab dang yang rab tu gyur pa la/ u baM mA ya shru ta sa ma ya a ka/ zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis snying po la 'gro ba brtson par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang ldan pa yin te/ chos kyi phung po brgyad
131b3(rgyud 'grel): khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi// kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma ni// yi ge gnyis su yang dag bstan// yi ge e ni mar gyur la// baM ni pha zhes bya bAr grangs// thig le de gnyis sbyor ba ste// sbyor de shin tu rmad du 'gyu
131b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pas so// thams cad du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ thabs dang shes rab 'dus byas pa'i sbyor ba las na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gsungs par gyur to// de bas na skyes pa dang bud med gnyis
131b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ni ma ning ste/ de 'jug pa'i khyad par gcig pu pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po brjod pa ni nges pa ste/ de bsta na/ gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa ste// kun tu 'gro ba shin tu phra/ zhes gsungs
131b6(rgyud 'grel): bo dang / gzhung gzhan gyis kyang shes par bya'o// de ltar don gyi rang bzhin gtan la phab nas/ tshig gi tshogs blo la rab tu sbyor ba'i dgos pas don bsdus nas bstan par bya ste/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /
132a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor bstan te/ khra gnyer rim par ldan la sogs/ zhes pa nas/ lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// zhes pa'i
132a2(rgyud 'grel): bubar gyis thun mong gi 'khor bstan to// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas/ spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis mchod par brjod pa bstan to// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang
132a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bstan nas// byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod/ ces pa'i bar gyis bdag gi don du gsol ba bstan to// nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing // zhes pa nas/ bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i bar gyis gzhin gyi don
132a4(rgyud 'grel): du gsol ba bstan to// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ zhes pa nas/ dbang po'i bsam pa mkhyen mtshe gas/ zhes pa'i bar gyis spangs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs ba'i gnas su bstan to//
132a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku zhes pa nas/ glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol// zhes bya ba'i bar gyis yang dag pa'i mtshan gyi don gsol bar bstan to// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi/ zhes pa nas/
132a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal zhes pa'i bar gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o don gyi gsol pa'o// de dag ni gleng gzhi'i don gleng bslang ba dang 'brel bar bstan pa ste 'khor phun sum tshogs pa
132b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// // gsad dbang lag na rdo rje yis// zhes pa nas lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ ces pa rgyud nyan pa la gus pa'i sbyor ba bstan to// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub ces pa nas/ sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum
132b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan nas/ shes pa'i bar gyis ljags byin gyis brlabs bdud mthar byed pa'i sbyor ba bstan to// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/ zhes pa nas/ legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // zhes pa'i bar gyis tshangs pa'i
132b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung gis 'khor la ched du brjod pa bston to// lag na rdo rje khyod legaso so zhes pa nas/ khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ zhes pa'i bar gyis nyan pa po thos pa dang sbyar bar bstan to// rkang pa ya gcig gis mtshams
132b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bstan te/ 'di dag ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub bo/ ces pa nas/ rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas/ zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs la gzigs pa bstan to// tshig gis
132b5(rgyud 'grel): bodag pos tshigs su bcad ces pa nas/ sde tshun bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i mtha' byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin bstan cing bshad do// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ zhes pa nas/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar
132b6(rgyud 'grel): byed ces pa'i bar gyis/ chos thams cad yi ge gcig gi lus la gnas par bstan to// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che zhes pa nas/ chags pa thams cad sel bar byed ces pa'i bar gyis nyon mongs pa dang rigs rnam pa
133a1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i mchod pa bstan to// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che zhes pa nas/ sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul che/ zhes pa'i bar gyis khams dang che ba bcu drug gi rnam dag bstan to// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo che
133a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ bsam pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam shes tshogs dang lha mo'i rnami ngag bstan to// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med pa ces nas/ theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ces pa'i bar gyis
133a3(rgyud 'grel): sa dang skal bzangs bcu drug gi rnam dag bstan te/ de dag ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam dag de kho na nyid kyis snying po bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ zhes pa nas gsang sngags tshul chen
133a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid can zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin bstan to// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ zhes pa nas rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// zhes pa'i bar gyis lam gyi yon tan rdzogs pa bstod pa bstan to// thog ma med
133a5(rgyud 'grel): spros med bdag ces pa nas/ yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas/ zhes pa'i bar gyis thugs kyi byin burlabs la bstod pa bstan to// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/ zhes pa nas/ 'khor los bsgyur pa stobs po
133a6(rgyud 'grel): che zhes pa'i bar gyis gsung gi byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi po ngag ces pa nas/ tshul che ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog ces pa'i ber gyis sku'i byin rlabs la bstodas pa'o// tshig rje
133b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig bdag smra mkhas pa// zhes pa nas/ bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba'i 'dren sngon du gyur pa bstan to// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong // zhes pa nas/ bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog/ ces
133b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar gyi sa theg pa gsum gyi lus ye shes su bstan to// bdag gir mi 'dzin dar mi 'dzin pa zhis pa nas/ 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog/ ces pa'i bar gyis 'jam dpal ye shrIs snyems dpa'i ye shes
133b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// zhes pa nas/ bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan bdag ces pa'i bar gyis de thams cad rnal 'byor gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bstan to// so so rang rig mi g.yo ba zhes pa
133b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog ces pa'i byar gyis rang rig tu gzhi go cog par bstan to// shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med/ ces pa nas/ gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid
133b5(rgyud 'grel): la brnyog pa bcus me gos par bstan to// sngags mchog mda' bdag rig sngags rgyal// zhes pa nas/ drang srong tshi gus mchod cing brjod// ces pa'i bar gyis sku'i 'khor lo bstan to// rigs gsum 'chad pa gas
133b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'chang // zhes pa nas/ theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po zhes pa'i bar gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bstan to// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ zhes pa nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs kyi
134a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bstan to// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed ces pa nas/ sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchog/ ces pa'i bar gyis me long lta bu'i ye shes la bstod pa bstan to// yang dag bdag
134a2(rgyud 'grel): med la sogs pa'i rkang pa gnyis kyis don gyis rgyud la bstod pa bstan to// stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ zhes pa nas/ chos kyi gaN+DI sgra po che/ zhes pa'i bar gyis tshig gi rgyud bstan to// mi gnas pa la sogs
134a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rkang pa gnyis kyis rab tu byed pa'i rgyud bstan to// gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste/ zhes pa na swA/ gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po zhes pa'i bar gyis badre ba chen po'i rgyud bstan to// mtshungs pa
134a4(rgyud 'grel): med cing che bur grags/ zhes pa nas/ dar ba chen po chos kyi rtogs/ ces pa'i bar gyis bsam gyis mi khyab po'i rgyud bstan to// 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig/ ces pa nas/ sdug gu 'jig rten
134a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum na mdzes/ zhes pa'i bar gyis 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan to// 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te/ zhes pa nas/ skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med/ ces pa'i bar gyis thabs kyi rgyud bstan to// na mkha'i mtha' la
134a6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod pa zhes pa nas/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin zhes pa'i bar gyis thabs ye shes sems dpa'i rgyud bstan to// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can zhes pa nas/ gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum
134b1(rgyud 'grel): thob ces pa'i bar gyis dri ma rnam par dag pa'i rgyud bstan to// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol zhes pa nas/ lus kun las ni rnam par gnas// zhes pa'i bar gyis bya ba bral ba'i rgyud bstan to// nam mkha'i mtha' la rab
134b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa zhes pa nas/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes// zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to// chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung zhes pa nas/ bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs zhes
134b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i bar gyis rang don bkra shis rgyud la skye bar bstan to// mchog tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten sgra ste rab kyi mchog ces bya ba'i bar gyis rang bzhin brtags pas dben pa bstan to// 'jig
134b4(rgyud 'grel): popa ma lus sel ba po zhes pa nas/ gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan zhes pa'i bar gyis dge ba phyag rgya chen por bstan to// zur phud lnga pa me tog thod ces pa nas/ dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che zhes pa'i bar gyis
134b5(rgyud 'grel): bar du dge ba chos kyi phyag rgya bstan to// gtsang gre nas dam pa gau te mA zhes pa nas grol ba thar po rnam grol lus zhes pa'i bar gyis tha mer dge ba las kyi phyag rgya bstan to// rnam grol zhi bzhi pa nyid ces pa nas/ ye shes
134b6(rgyud 'grel): lus can de bzhin gshegs/ zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bde ba chen po'i lus lhan cig skyes pa bstan to// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// zhes pa nas/ smra ba seng gi tshugs pa med/ ces bya ba'i bar gyis tshigs la
135a1(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas pa'i tshig gi gnas su bstan to// kun tu dga' ba mchog tu dga'/ zhes pa nas/ lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po zhes pa'i bar gyis sgra dang ye shes la sogs pa'i snang ba bstan to// sman pa
135a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gtso bo ste/ zhes pa nas/ nang do cog gi sgra che ba/ zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba la sman par snang ba bstan to// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ ces pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/ zhes pa'i bar
135a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan du snang ba bstan to// 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/ zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ ces pa'i bar gyis rim pa gnyis su bstan to// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal zhes
135a4(rgyud 'grel): ba nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs su snang ba bstan to// rdo rje'i nyi ma nas rkang pa gnyis kyis bklag pa'i thabs dang mi gnas pa bstan to// chags bral la sogs chags pa che zhes
135a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nas/ yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag/ ces pa'i bar gyis lam gyi ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to// thug pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod ces pa nas/ rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ ces pa'i bar gyis ye shes lhun
135a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub pa bstan to// rdo rje gdan ni lus ldan zhes pa nas/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang zhes pa'i bar gyis gsing don lhun gyis grub pa bstan te// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ ces pa nas/ ye
135b1(rgyud 'grel): me lce 'od rab gsal zhes pa'i bar gyis ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ zhes pa nas/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed ces pa'i bAr g+his mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes mdor bstan to//
135b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ zhes pa nas/ tshangs pa'i g.yul sa rtse nas gnon/ zhes pa'i bar gyis las kyi phyag rgya bstan to// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don zhes pa nas/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes
135b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i bar gyis dpe don gyi 'brel pa bstan to// sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/ zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud dang ldan/ zhes pa'i bar gyis mtshan dpe bstan to// 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyed pa
135b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa/ zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi lam rdzogs par bstan to// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// zhes pa nas/ bya ba dpag med 'gyed pa po zhes pa'i bar gyis spangs
135b5(rgyud 'grel): pa phun sum tshogs pa bsten to// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs/ zhes pa nas// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// zhes pa'i bar gyis skad cig gi ye shes bstan to// nyon mongs khams rnams dag
135b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag/ ces pa nas/ sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba/ zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsang sngags mtha'i don du bstan to// nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis 'khor ba'i sa bon dang bral bar bstan
136a1(rgyud 'grel): to snying rje chen po shes rab thabs/ zhes pa nas/ nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs/ zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan don mdzad pa bstan to// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo zhes pa nas/ sangs
136a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid kyi 'thad pa bstan to// lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ ces pa nas/ nor bu chen po rin chen tog ces pa'i bar gyis ye shes kyi lus kyi mdzad pa bstan to//
136a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mdor bstan to// gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ ces pa nas/ thig le stong pa yi ge brgya/ zhes pa'i bar gyis yi ge thams cad tshogs
136a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa'i stong par bstan to// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med ces pa nas/ bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can// zhus pa'i bar gyis e baM gyis dbugs dbyung ba bstan to// bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // zhes pa
136a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ ces pa'i bar gyis sku gsum du bstan to// de bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// zhes pa nas/ srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal// zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba gsum gyi gtso
136a6(rgyud 'grel): bopo snang po bstan to// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla/ zhes pa nas/ bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa/ zhes pa'o bar gyis bdud pham par byed pa bstan to// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren ces pa
136b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ phyag byar 'os pa bla mA'i rab ces pa'i bar gyis bsnyen bkur gyis gnas su bstan to// 'jig rten gsum po gom cig bzod ces pa nas// sa dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ ces pa'i bar gyis 'jig rten
136b2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa mnga' bar bstan te// gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste/ zhes pa nas/ 'jam dpal dpal da ldan pa'i mchog/ ces pa'i bar gyis mjug bsdu bstan te// de dag gis ni byang
136b3(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi rdo rje sems rdo rje zhes pa ba'i snang ba ye shes lngar bstod pa'o// mtshog sprin rdo DI mchog khyod 'dud/ ces pa nas/ yi ge re re zhes chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa la bstod pa bstan to// rigs kyi bdag po
136b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sa gzung ste/ aM shwA na dang / ush+ma Shi'i gnyis pa dang / bzhi pa'i bar gyi ye shes sngags kyi rang bzhin du bstan to// rigs kyi bdag po nas bcu drug pa'i bar gyis de yang 'jam dpal ye shes sems
136b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i sngags kyi rang bzhin du bstan to// de dag ni don gyi snying po yon tan bsdus pa'i don gyi bstod pa'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes pa nas/ rdzogs sengs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ shes pa'i bar gyis 'kho
136b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchod pa brjod par bstan to// de ni mgon po gsang po'i bdag ces pa ni sa/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/ ces pa'i bar gyis ched de brjod pa'i bstod pa bstan to// de dag ni ye shes kyi rjes su
137a1(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'o// mtshan nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa ni sgro lnga'i khyad par shes par bya'o// de ltar bsdus pa'i don yongs su shes shing / don lhag par rnyed pa'i gang zag gis rgyud kyi rab tu
137a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i don 'di nyid kyang bde blag tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// // da ni tshig gi don gsal bar dbye bar bya ste/ de ni sa dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mchog dang thun mo ngas gi dngos
137a3(rgyud 'grel): grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas mtshon pa la gang gnas she nu/ man tra'i rang bzhin shes shing skyob pa'o// des spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ngo // gdul dka'
137a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni theg pa gsum ste/ sprul pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang / longs rdo spyod rdzogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams so// kyi zhes pa ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
137a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dgra ba'i theg pa'i yang rnam par dag pa ste/ bde ba dang / stong pa dang / gnyis su me da pas na mchog go/ dpa' bo ni 'jigs shing thub pa med pa ste/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi khyed par gyis su
137a6(rgyud 'grel): 'og dang sa steng dang / sa bla las rgyal ba'o// rdo rje ni stong pa nyid bde ba chen po'i snying po can te/ gang la yod pa na dbang phyug go/ de lnga'i gsang ba las thob pa'i ni rgyal ba'o// pad+ma dkar po ni dkar po la sogs pa'i
137b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'dir rnam par rtog bzhi pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o// ye shes la ched du brjod pa ni rang las te/ 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i don gyis na yang zhes sbyar ro// khro gnyer dang sku dang / og spu ser la brdzes
137b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / mig dmar ba dang / lce 'dril zhing ya sos ma mchu mnan pa dang / thung zhing gel pa dang / gsus pa che ba dang / yan lag rab tu bgrad pa dang / nying lag rdo rje rtse me lta bu dang / dung khrod dang / gdug pa'i rgyan gyi
137b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa dang / mtshon cha 'bar zhing 'phro ba dang / mgo bo'i do bral dang / me 'bar ba'i gnas ni rim par ldan pa la sogs pa ste/ lag na rdo rje dang mtshungs par mtha' yas pa la yod pa ni ma rig la sogs pa rten
137b4(rgyud 'grel): cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis zade pa'i don to// de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung nas 'phro ba yang rdo rje rtse mo ste khro bo'i gzugs so// rang gi lag gis gsor bar byed pa ni snga ma bzhin te/ de'i don kyang snying rje chen po dang
137b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang zhes pa'o// thabs ni sngon rang gi don du gyur pa ji ltar de nyid kyi gzhan don du 'gyur ba'o// de ltar sprul pa dang yang sbrul gyi gzugs thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin lus ngag yid
137b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi mchod pa'i phyir/ dga' dgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can no// khro bo 'ba' zhig mi rigs pa ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems kyi mgon du gyur pas so// de dang lhan cig pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o// thams
138a1(rgyud 'grel): cad bsam pa mthun par zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid smyung ba med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pas so// shes rab kyis bcom pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
138a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas mi gnas pa brnyes pas na bcom ldan 'das so// dri bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni byang chub sems dpa' la yang gsungs shing bshad pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs
138a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i yon tan ni bde ba chen po'i thob pa 'ba' zhig la'o// khyab bdag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes thams cad la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do// yang na sems can thams cad kyi snying por gnas pa
138a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang nas por byung ba'i byed pa po nyid kyis 'gro ba bzhi'i dbang po lo khyab pa'i bdag nyid do// bdag ni bdag nyid kho na'o// smin pa ni tshig dang
138a5(rgyud 'grel): don dang spobs pa'i gzugs kyis so// bdag don ni mthar thugs pa'i don to// phyir ni dgros pa'o// thabs khyad par can gyi sgyu ma dang 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta bu ste/ nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sbyor bas bde
138a6(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i dra bas kun la yog par bya ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bor ro// ci nas zhes pa ni/ non tan du bye ba po'i tha tshig go// theg pa chen por 'gyur ba nyid yin te/ dper na sa bon gyi ma gtogs
138b1(rgyud 'grel): bApAr myu gu la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byin par grwa la nus/ de bas na ma rdzogs rdzogs pararu byed mda' yin no zhes gsungs pas/ rgyu'i gnas skabs thabs kyi sbyor ba la yang bkag na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i
138b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dang por nang gi bdag nyid la bzhag cing sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ rgyal bas kyang ni ma gsung sa na/ bdag 'dra ngan pa smos ci dgos// de bas 'jig rten
138b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa btang // zhes gsungs pa'i don kyang de'o// rgyu 'bras rjes su mi mthun pa yin te/ byams pa dang snying rje sngon du stong ba'i byang chub kyi sems smos pa dang 'jug pa dang / shin tu 'jug pa la sogs pas sems
138b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi don gyi phyir nang du bzhag pa'o// de bas na rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis// gang gang blo ni bsgoms pa dang // sgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa dang // bde gsal mi rtogs blo 'bras can// zhes pas kyang shes par
138b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// nyon mongs pa ni thams cad rang bzhin dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang // btang snyoms kyi rnyog pas sems dkrugs pa'o// mi shes pa ni rgyud pa'i gzhung lugs dang bral bas don ma phrad de smig rgyu la chur
138b6(rgyud 'grel): bzung bas ngal zhing gdungs pa bzhin/ 'dir yang brtags pa'i rnyog pa'i 'dam du bying bar gyur pa rnams so// sman pa ni gzhan gyis shes rab gsu ma la sbyar ro// nang gi bdag nyid la 'jug pa'i dgos pas na phyir/
139a1(rgyud 'grel): ro// bla ni 'bras bu ster ba'i don gyis so// ston pa ni log rtog bzlog pa'o// dam tshig ni sdom pa ste// bde ba dang stong pa'i dra ba phyed pa de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o// de nyid kyi
139a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ e baM las ni rab tu zhugs/ zhes gsungs so// dbang po gdul bya'i rgyud mkhyen pa'o// bsam pa ni gdul byi'o 'dod pa mkhyen pa'o// de dag ni gnas su gyur pas mchog go//
139a3(rgyud 'grel): gi ni drug pa'i don gyis gnyis pa'o// ye shes sku ni ye shes phung po can ste/ bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sa rtag pa nyid rtag tu 'byung ba'o// de bos na/ gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong // gang gis nga la sgrar
139a4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa// log par rtogs pa spong ba ste// skye bo de yis nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni// de ni rnam par shes mi nus// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// gtsug tor ni
139a5(rgyud 'grel): bltar mi mngon pa ste/ de nyid zil gyis mi non pa'i rtags yin pas na gtsug tor chen po'o// tshig gis brjod pas byed pa ste/ mi zad pa'i gsung mnga' bas bdag po'o// ye shes ni mtha' dang bral ba ste mi
139a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas na sku'o// de'i mtshan nyid ni rang 'byung ba ste/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan gyi don brjod pa'o// 'brel pa gcig pas mchog go/ don zab pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o// don rgya che ba ni blo'i
139b1(rgyud 'grel): yul ma yin pas so// don chen po ni rang gzhan grub pas so// mtshungs pa med pa ni gcig pur gyur pas so// zhi ba ni glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bas so// dag pa gsum ni skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'gag pa dben pa'o//
139b2(rgyud 'grel): yang nu lus dang ngag dang / yid gsum las 'byung ba gsum mo// yang na dus gsum du gsungs pa dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dang gsungs pa'o// de nyid ni yang dag pa'i shes par sgrub par byed par yang sbyar bar bya'o//
139b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ni tshig dang don to// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu chen po ste/ de rab tu rgyas par gsal bar byed pas tshig la yang ngo // thabs kyi rgyud sgra 'phral dra ba mtshon pas btags pa ste/ lha sbyin zhang po can zhes bya ba lta
139b4(rgyud 'grel): bu'o// las ni skal pa'i rgyud de gong du bstan zin to// rdo rje 'chang chen ni grags chen la// gsang sngags 'chang ni snying po don gyi sa ngas rgyas so// ji snyed pa ni dpag med rnams kyis so// dgyes bzhin du
139b5(rgyud 'grel): glur blangs pa bshad du ga sol// zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to// gsang 'dzin ni rgyud 'di nyid sngar bshad pa'i don yang ngo // phyir ni gtso bor gyur pa gzhan med pa'o// nges pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
139b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa ste/ der ma byung gi bar las 'byung gi bar zhes bya'o// gzung ba ni bdag don du'o// gsal ba spang ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir ro// bsam pa'i khyad par ni dbang po'i bye brag la'o// bshad par
140a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'tshal ba ni de kho na nyid bcu dang / rim pa gnyis dang zung du 'jug pa'o// gsang dbang ni dug bcom pa'i de nyid la dbang ba'i lag na rdo rjes so// de skad du// zhes pa ni lnga'i gsol ba gdab bo// spyod
140a2(rgyud 'grel): lam ni gus pa'i rtags so// de nas de ma thag tu'o// rigs dang stobs mtshon pas shAkya thub pa'o// rkang gnyis ni lha dang mi yi ste/ de'i mchog tu gyur pa'o// bzang ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs phun sum tshogs
140a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ring zhing yangs pa ni chu dang zhang ngo // brkyang ba dang / 'od phyung ba dang / 'dzum pa bstan pa'i bdud btul ba dang / 'khor bag dang ldan pa la dgod pa dang / thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi yid dang mthun
140a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bstan pa'o// tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs ni yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa ste/ 'dir snyan pa dang / che ba dang gsal ba dang / de ni go bar nus pa 'dus pa ston pa'o// bkang ba ni grags pa'o// gsang ba ni
140a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba chen po la'o// slar gsungs pa ni zhus pa'i lan no// snying rje chen po ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'o// dag par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa dag par byed pa ste/ bkra shis par ro// sdig sel ba ni rdul dang
140a6(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'o// brtson pa ni mi yengs par rtse gcig pa'o// rang don nyid kyis legs so zhes pa'o// gnyis pas gzhan don bzung ba'o// legs par bstan pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lam du'o// nyon zhes pa ni/
140b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin du lta ba dang rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sra brtan 'bar ba lta bur blta ba dang / thun mong gi 'khor rin po che lta bu'i gang zag tu blta ba dang / bshad
140b2(rgyud 'grel): bya sems kyi rang bzhin shes rab dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed par blta ba dang / gsung dri ma med pa'i bdud rtsis dbang po che zhing khyab par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu lha'i 'khor lo
140b3(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / rig sngags rnams la thams cad ces bya'o// de dag ni rdo rje da byings la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo gzung ngo // de nyid kyi rigs shes par yang ba'o// rigs chen ni rnam par
140b4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhini lnga dung drug pa'o// kho bo ni rigs 'phro bar 'dod pa ste/ dam pa'i zhal las 'ongs pa ni rgyas btab gsum gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te mdor bstan pa'o// gsang sngags rig
140b5(rgyud 'grel): sdigs 'chang ba'i rigs/ zhes pa ni gi sang sngags la sogs pa ni rig sngags kyi lngas byed cing / don bsgrubs pas na 'tshang ba ste las kyi rigs so// yang nr-i thams cad shes rab kyi rtags su shes par byas
140b6(rgyud 'grel): la des de la nan tan du byas pas de 'grub ces pa'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rigs gsum ste/ la ni de nyid gzhir byas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni zhes bya ba la snang bar gzigs po ni ska
141a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten ni log pa'i shes pas brtags pa'i 'khor ba ste/ de nyid rang gi ngo bo rnam par dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la/ 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pas na pad+ma'i rigs so//
141a2(rgyud 'grel): de bas na/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gti mug la sogs kyis mi 'ching / ra di rang nyid ni rdzogs byang chub ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro// 'jig rten gzugs la sogs pa ste// snang ba'i dbang po'i yul du 'gyur ba'o// de'i
141a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa d+he ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rin pa tshwa rig sA la phyogs med pas na chen po'o// phyogaso rgya ni khyab cing mi 'da' bi'i'o don gyis te/ 'dra sA bu 'ba' zhig byas chen po'o// rigs mchog ces pa nI/ rigs lnga
141a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyer mi phyed pas rtsod 'das kyi rigs so// rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po ste/ rigs bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'khor rnams la zil gyis mi non pa'i skye mched yod pa dang / nyid kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i mched kyis
141a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams ris drug gi rgyud du mkhyen pas gtsug tro rA cher gzigs nas zhes pa'o// gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug la dgongs pa dang / 'bras bu khro na lam du bya ba'i phyir/ rigs drug gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bde
141a6(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po nyid bshad par bya ste/ tshig gi zhes pa ni tshig gi rgyud do// bdag po ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste rdo rje 'chang ngo // tshigs su bcod pa ni brkyang pa bsdus pa'o// bka' stsal pa shugs kyis shes
141b1(rgyud 'grel): babar bya ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / bstan pa'i bdag pos so// gsang sngags ni skye ba med pa'i snying po can yi ge A'o// rgyal po ni thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas so// drug ni sde
141b2(rgyud 'grel): tshan shes rab kyi yi ge'o// ldan pa ni sde tshan bdun pa'i thabs kyi yi ge'o// de mtshon byed du gyur cing / thun mong dang mchog gi nus pa 'byung zhing shes par bya'o// gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang / zhes bya ba ni
141b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ning gri yI ge'i rang bzhin mtshon par bya'o// mi skye ba ni ngo bo ste chos so// chos ni rkyeno las smras pa ste rnaMs can no// can ni thA mI dang bI'i rang bzhin 'di gsungs pa'o// de ltar gnyis su mung ba'i ye shes yongs
141b4(rgyud 'grel): su dag cing dri ma med pa ji ltar gnas she no// ring thung gi bye brag gis rigs dang rigs kyang ye shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'khor lor snang bu dang /

141b6(rgyud 'grel): ti thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang po'i longs spyod du gyur pa dang / thun mong gi dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur pa ni gdul ba'i dbang po'i khyad par te/ rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas mtha' gzhi la mi gnas pa ni oM
142a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/ khro bo dang mnyam pa dang zhi ba'i khyad par gyis rigs bsdus rgyas bye brag du snang ba dang / rnam shes skye ba'i sgo tha dad par snang ba ni gdul bya'i

142a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skus rigs so so'i 'phrin las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa dang / dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid rang dang mthun pa'i don byed 'dul bya'i snang ba'i khyad por te/ rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas

142b1(rgyud 'grel): zug rngu gang gis kyang ma gos pa'i ye shes snang ba med pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i lus brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rang grol bas dbang po rang zhi zhing ming gis dben pa'i zung 'jug rgyud las skyes

142b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug ste/ s+thi to hr-i di zhes bya ba ni re shig pa'i gnas mtshon pa ste/ snying khA tshis kyo 'khor lo la sogs pa'o// dz+nyA na zhes bya ba na dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' bral dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i

144a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi zhi ba bde// ri bsnams pa yi bde ba che// skyes nas reg pa'i bde ba che// bcud len rab tu sbyor ba yis// bde ba su zhig 'gog par byed// ces gsungs pas na/ shes rab dang thabs tha

144a4(rgyud 'grel): gcod par byed do// gti mug dang gzugs dang / sa'i khams rnam par dag pa ni gnyis med de/ gti mug chen po'i mchod pa'o// de mi shes shing shes pa med pas na gti mug blo ste ma rig pa'i rtsa ba can gyi gti mug
