205a4(rgyud 'grel): bo ma yin te/ pha rol smra ba po'i ngor rnam par gcad pa dang / yongs su gcad pas bzhag pa'i phyir ro// 'dir ni nyams su myong ba'i yul du gyur pa la de med pas rang lnga snang ba'i mkha' khyab bo// sprul pa ni rten 'brel
205a5(rgyud 'grel): las byung bas so// tshogs ni de'i bdag med pa'i lha tshogs rnams so// 'di ji ltar mi 'gal zhe na/ ma skyes mi 'gag ces bya ba ni/ gang skye ba'i zlas drang ba 'gag pa yin/ 'di ma skyes pa'i chos rna mas la 'gag pa
205a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas gang skye ba med pa la gang du gang gnas pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzugaso ni gang nas kyang ma byung gang du yang mi gnas/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med
205b1(rgyud 'grel): do zhes gsungs so// de'i phyir ma skyes pa nyid mi 'gag pas 'byung ba de'i skye ba dang / 'gag pa nyid ma yin pa'o// de bas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang gsum bsdus pa'i tshig dgu yin no// de yang sems dang
205b2(rgyud 'grel): sems las byung ba sgyu mo nyid du 'phrul ba dang / sgyu ma nyid du gtogs pa'i dra ba ni bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa'o// de ltar rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas/ da ni bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'o// rdo rje mig gis
205b3(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba ma gsal bai ra du blta zhes bya ba la/ 'de lta bu'i rdo rje'i mig gis yul yin pas rdo rje'i mig ste/ ye shes kyi mig gis blta bar 'dod do// gzung ba'i chos rnams ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyar
205b4(rgyud 'grel): blta'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi bskyod pa yongs su grub pa'i me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar blta'o// mi bskyod pa sems dang sems las byung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i mig gis blta ba'i phyir yul yin pas rdo rje sems
205b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ste/ de ltar blta ba'i yul can la yang ming de ska da ces grags so// de yang ye shes mig gcig dri mo mang // ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs zhes bya ba las dang / stong pa nyid lo stong nyid mthong // mig ni mi
205b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bstan pa'o// zhes bya'o// snang gsal bar du blta zhes bya ba ni/ don de dag la dang po rnal 'byor bstan pas/ yid ches pa sngon du song bas/ zag pa med pa'i 'dud rtsir gyur pas bdag 'dres pa'i bar de srid du shes rab kyi
206a1(rgyud 'grel): blta zhing bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba don to// ji skad du/ mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtogs med ldan gyis grub/ ces gsungs so// de nas 'bad pa med pa'i mtshan
206a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa ni/ sgyu ma brag cha na mkha'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba la/ ji skad bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor na sgyu ma yin pas phyi dang nang dang bral ba'i snang bar mthong ba dang / mtshan gyi sngags bzlas pa rnams ni/ byed pa po la sogs pa
206a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum med pas phyi dang nang du gsal ba'i breg che'o// 'di gnyis ni gzugs dang sgra'i rnam pa ste/ mtshan mi'o rang bzhin du gyur pa ste/ ji skad du/ sbyor ba'i lam pa ni/ sprul sku'i yul gsung gi longs spyod dang / mi g.yo
206a4(rgyud 'grel): ba la gnas pa'i ni sgo'i yul lo// de ltar na dbyibs dang sngags kyis ni 'di drag la thugs rje'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes dngos su skyed par byed pas/ spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bde ga nyid can la sogs pa kun 'dir ldan pa'o// de
206a5(rgyud 'grel): bas na yongs su shes nas ni khong du chud par byas nas so// de yang sems kyis te/ ye shes las byung bas ye shes ye shes mtshon pa'i borda'i mtshan gdags pa sa bya ba ni rlag ces pa'i don to// gang gi phyir sems dang
206a6(rgyud 'grel): sems las byung ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad bshad ce na/ de'i phyir gsang sngags lam ni rnal 'byor tshul 'dis byed ces pa la/ gsang ba ni sngar bston pa'i zab pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor te/ nyan thos la
206b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la med pa'i phyir ro// 'di nyid myur ba nyid du dman pa las skyob pas na sngags yin te/ gang gi phyir 'dir ni 'bras bu yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa de yang phun sum tshogs pa
206b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'bru sngo bus rlob nas/ chos bdag med pa dang bsres nas tshogs bdud rtsi rdzogs par gyur pas/ 'jig rten pa'i zhen pa dang snang ba myur du nyams pa yin no// de yang rgyun mi 'chad bar 'byung bas rnal 'byor
206b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba la dgongs pa'i ye shes khyad par can des ldog pa yin pas/ tshul 'dis byed pa yin par 'dod do// de yang gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byedade ces bya bas ni/ gsang sngags kyi lam de gsungs so// rnal 'byor bsgom
206b4(rgyud 'grel): pa las byung ba zhes pas/ lam de'i rgyun gsungs pa yin no// byed pa sems can kun don byed ces bya bas 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no// 'di skad stonr-i tAM/ yid dong ba 'am/ mthun pa'i gnas su snga dro la sogs pa'i dus gsum
206b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dam tshig nyams pa med par gdong bkru ba la sogs po byas la/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ byang chub dang sems can la dmigs pa blos rang nyid kyi rgyun bshags bya'o// 'di nyid la 'khor gsum dmigs pa med par chos
206b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad lhag par mos par bya'o// de nas ring nyid dam tshig dang dbyibs su langs la/ hri dang hU~M las lce rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par bya'o// oM hUM a oM AHzhes bya bas/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun
207a1(rgyud 'grel): bdug dbang phyug che// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chung ba kun gyi rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chu ba zhes bya bar byin gyis brlab bo// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ mthe bo mthe'u chung
207a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer smral// rdo rje 'khor lo'i ming brjod cing // dkyil 'khor thams cad slong ba'o// de'i mtha' namakha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston ces gsungs paso sems dang sems las byung ba'i dbyings dang rigs bsdus pa'i nges po
207a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ting nge 'dzin sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad dang / mthong ba dang bsgom pa ni ngo bo nyid do// de nas rim pa phyi ma la/ dri ma dang dral ba'i sangs rgyas ral gri dang 'khor lo can/ bdud 'dul bar ral gri
207a4(rgyud 'grel): drung rdo rje can dang / 'dod tshogs la ral gri dang pad+ma tsi no dang / spel du yod par ral gri dang / rin po che dang / sna tshogs par ral gri dang / sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa dang / bla ma dang slob dpon rnams dang / dam tshig
207a5(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgyas btab pa pos gdul bya gnas gsum+bi pa blta bar bya'o// de nas brda rnams ni sgra rdo rjer blta'o// mtshon cha rnams ni gsung rdo rjer blta'o// bdag nyid ni thugs su bsdu bar bya'o// de la brda ni ngo bo nyid //
207a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon po ni mtshan nyid do// bdag ni rang bzhin gyis stong bskul bar byed pas na skad cig mi dang por rnal 'byor rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid la de dag nges par bsgom mo// chos thams cad rtogs pa'i mchog skyes nas
207b1(rgyud 'grel): slob rnams la bdag gi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ dad pa dang mos pa dang / nges par mtshon pa brjod par bya'o// de nas bstod pa dang spro bsdu dang don rtogs pa rnams yin te/ de nas mthar yang rigs drug gi bdag nyid la rang la
207b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la ji skad bshad pa'i nang gi rna lo 'byor ye shes gnas par byed pa rtag tu bsgom par bya'o// de yang chos kyi dbyings dang sems can gyi don gyi phyir ro// de ltar thabs brjod nas/ lAm 'di'i sa'i ngo bo brjod pas
207b3(rgyud 'grel): dumi nA pa dag pa ni// mkha' la dngos rnams ji ltar gnas bzhin du zhes bya ba ni dpe brjod pa ste/ 'o byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po zhes gsungs pas sa la dang de'i khyab pa ni/ na mkhas khyab cing de las ma g.yos pa'i phyir ro//
207b4(rgyud 'grel): rten cing 'brel pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnams ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes las byung zhing ma g.yos pas bems po dngos por thang chad pas ma yin no// de skad du yang / lus med lus
207b5(rgyud 'grel): te lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston// zhes gsungs so// 'di nyid dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor yang yin la/ phyag rgya chen po yang yin pas na/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
207b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ brda dang mtshon pa'i phyir ro// de yang snying po len pa'i dkyil 'khor ni phyag rgya chen por gnas pas/ gzhan du mi 'byung gzhan la mi gnas te/ phyogs gzhan ni chad pa dang nges pa po med pa'i phyir ro// ji skad du dpas
208a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro mgur las kyang / thabs ni stong bar ma bshad do// gal te stong yul thabs yin na// 'bras bu rgyu las mi gzhan phyir// de ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// des na dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang //
208a2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i thabs su sdom pa'o// zhes gsungs so// nges pa med par yang 'byung ba ma yin te/ dpal dam tshig bkod pa las kyang / sems ni dri med par rtogs na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung 'gyur gyi// mkha' la
208a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i dri mar bcas// de srid bar du de mi snang zhes gsungs so// de ltar na 'gyur gyi phyogs gzhan yang mi 'gog ste/ nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba zhes gsungs pas dkyil 'khor bdag med pa la thang chad pa ma
208a4(rgyud 'grel): yin zhe na/ don de mi shes dka' ba'i lam g.yeng bas 'khor ba'i dri gsum dag las g.yo ba min zhes bya ba ni/ grang yang rgyu 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun par 'jug pa las thabs su 'os na ni 'dir mthun pa'i
208a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// de ltar ma yin na ni re shig dbugs dbyung bar dgongs kyi/ bdag med pa la sogs pa las ldog pa ni nges pa'i lung dang rigs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro// gang 'dra ltar snang ba ni bag chags kyi tshogs las byung
208a6(rgyud 'grel): go/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas dang sems can 'dra ba nyid du thal zhes bya'o// ji skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa las kyang shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs kyi yul ni bcings pa'o// thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab kyang
208b1(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa'o// de yang yod pa dang med pa ni rtag pa dang chad par 'gyur bas/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po zhes bya ba yang mi 'grub pas/ don de mi shes pa ni sngar bstan pa dag mi shes pa'o// dka' ba'i lam ni g.yeng bas na yun
208b2(rgyud 'grel): rIring ba nyid 'dod pa brtags pa la zhen pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa dang mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'o// de nyid kyi phyir yul dman pa dang zhen pa'i tshogs kyis gnas gyi 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis las mi g.yo ba dag go//
208b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni de gnyis nyams pa'i thabs dang shes rab phul du phyin pa dang / 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun byas lam chen po yin no// de yang snying rje yi ni ya lung bgos// shes rab ral gri mnga' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul
208b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo sel zhe'o// de'i phyir rtogs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni/ de lta'i don shes rab rang bzhin nyes pa'i tshogs bcom spos kyi glang po kr-i ta ka zos bzhin bcom ldan 'das gzhung tshogs yon tan thob/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal blor
208b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ de lta'i don shes pa ni sngar bstan pa dang rtogs pa'o// rang bzhin nyes pa ni ma rig pa'i yul lo// de'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pas drang las dang srid pa'i tshe'o// de 'joms pa na dpe'i brjod pa'o// de yang gi no gcig
208b6(rgyud 'grel): la rtogs pas rdzas mi 'ching ba'o// 'di ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ rtogs pa'i yul gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyen po bcom pa'o// gnyen po dang mi mthun pa ni nus pa mnyam du zin pas// thog ma dang mthar yul yod pa dang med pas phye bas
209a1(rgyud 'grel): yul can yang 'thad pa'o// nga'i tshogs ni rgyu med pa'i phyir mi skye ba'o// gnyis pa ni de'i thabs med par mi rung ba'i phyir ro// 'dir ni 'phags pa dang mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba la grags pa
209a2(rgyud 'grel): dang sems las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob 'joms pa'o// gzhung tshogs yon tan thob ces bya ba ni/ gdul bya 'jug pas gnas skabs pa'o// de'i mthar thug pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i nges pa la nam yang 'jug
209a3(rgyud 'grel): pabar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa nas/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba mthar thug pa ste/ dpal mchog dang po'i ngo bo nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin ma
209a4(rgyud 'grel): bcos pa nyid la bshad kyi/ gzhan du skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa ni byas pa can nyid du 'gyur ro// de'i phyir 'di la rgyu'i rim pas byas pa med pas mthar 'gag pa yang med do// de skad du yang / sangs rgyas thog ma tha mA
209a5(rgyud 'grel): medapa dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// zhes gsungs pa yin no// gang yong dus kyi mtha'i skad cig la chos thams cad khong du chud po ni rgyu yin la/ de'i rgyu ni sangs rgyas yin pas/ sangs rgyas thog ma dang ldan la mtha' ni med
209a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yin te/ de lta ma yin na lam la sogs pa'i 'bad pa bya mi dgos par 'gyur ro// snyam na ni/ de yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ sangs rgyas ni dbyings dang ye shes bya ba yin gyi/ dbyings dang bral ba'i ye shes ni gang gis
209b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyang ma yin pas// dbyings ni sngar brjod pa yin te/ gnas skabs kyi ye shes ni rtogs pa'i nges pa ste/ de ni thog ma tha ma gnyis par yang gyur pas lam yang dgos par smra ba de'i mthong bar byas pa ni thog ma'o// de'i yul
209b2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dang bral bas yul yong mtha' med par rigs pa yin no// de'i phyir 'dir tha snyad gnyis kyis 'jug ste/ rgyu'i tha snyad ni ngo bo nyid de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sogs pa mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin no// de'i rkyen ni thos pa la
209b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i de dang mthun par rjes su zhugs pa yin no// de dang de'i bdag nyid phrad pa ni/ 'bras bur yang tha dad btags kyang de'i yul las nges pa po gzhan na med pa'i phyir ro// gal te gzhan du gyur pa ni nam yang de bzhin gabye
209b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin te/ kun tu btags pa'i phyir ro// de bas na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad ni rkyen gyis rnam par bzhag/ de la 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i chos gang yang yod pa ma yin no// 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam de las
209b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba gzhung tshogs du ma bshad pa'i mthar 'byung bas/ phyogs bcur dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i chos kyi rgyal por zhes bya ba dpal mchog dang po'i yul thog ma dang tha ma med pas yul can la dgongs
209b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ma 'gags pa'i ni 'bad pa ni bral ba'i rang bzhin gyi dbang gis 'byung ba ni rgyun chad pa yin pas/ rang gi dag pa'i ye shes mi 'gags pas 'di'i snang ba dang mdzad pa de 'dra'o// 'di ni mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// phyogs
210a1(rgyud 'grel): chu chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po zhes gsungs pa yin no// de ltar lam gyi che ba brjod nas/ brjod du
210a2(rgyud 'grel): dang brjod pa'i khyab pa bstan pa'i phyir/ thugs kyi gsang mdzod gtsug na rin po che// 'gyi kun+ta sems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya bas rim pa bzhin du 'bras bu dang las dang ngo bo nyid la khyab par bstan to// thugs ni chos kyi dbyings la nges
210a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid du thugs rdo rje'o// de ni gsang ba nyan thos la sogs pas mi rdzogs pa'i don to// 'di las dkyil 'khor lo sogs pa'i sgor gyur pas mdzod yin te/ ji skad du/ kun mkhyen ye shes mdzad 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu
210a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul sna tsho'achang / zhes gsungs so// de nyid gtsug na gnas pa'i rin po che ste/ lam gyi mthar thug pa'i skad cig ma lus byung zhing de'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// lam de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyams su
210a5(rgyud 'grel): myong ba ste/ ji skad du/ tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad // gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing zhes gsungs pas rtogs so// lam de nyid gang gis 'grib pa ni/ 'gro kun zhes po ste/ 'gro ba ni nyon mongs pas der 'gro ba ste/
210a6(rgyud 'grel): gong gi phyir rang bzhin zhes bya bas/ ngo bo nyid du gyur pas 'di rgyu'i don du bstan te// rang bzhin de yang gnas skabs gsum du rgyun mi 'chad pas sems zhes bya'o// de yang dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// sangs rgyas thog ma
210b1(rgyud 'grel): tha ma med ces gsungs so// de ltar brjod bya'i khyab pa bstan nas brjod pa'i khyab pa ni/ chos rnams lung zhes bya ba dang / rgyud kun zhes bya'o// chos rnams ni rnam par bkod pa'i chos rnams te/ bstan pa'i chos da zhan pa'o//
210b2(rgyud 'grel): la bstan pa'i chos gsung rab yan lag rnams so// de las gzhan pa ni sngar bstan pa dang bsgrub pa la sogs pa'o// de skad du/ dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchosas da par phyag chos kyis
210b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal// lags pa'i lam ni ston pa po zhes pa dang / 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas// dar ba chen po chos kyi tog/ ces bya ba dang / pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan// rnams nga dag pa bdag med
210b4(rgyud 'grel): chos zhes bshad pa'o// rgyu dri kun gyi ni byA ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang bla ma'i rgyud do// ji skad du/ brtson chen skyo 'phrul dra ba che// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ ces bya bas/ bdag po ni de'i nges pa'i ye shes so// de
210b5(rgyud 'grel): bas de rnams kyi dbang po ni nges pa'o// rdo rje tshig tu bzhag ces bya ba ni/ gang mi gsal ba dang / tshig rnams kyi dgos pa rgya tsha ba de la de skad ces bya'o// 'o na de rnams gang las rtogs te ba ma pa ni/ zang ting rgya che rgyud kyi
210b6(rgyud 'grel): dgongs 'grel dang / de'i man ngag nye bar bsdus nas bshad ces bya ba la/ zab cing rgya che'i rgyud ni gsung rab 'di nyid do// de'i dgongs pa'i don 'grel ba ni de'i man ngag las byung ba dang / don nye bar bsdus te bshad pa ni
211a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir nye bar bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar mdzad pa'o// tshul gang gis ched du gang brjod pa ni// de lta'i lam ni mkhan po'i rjes 'brangs pas nye bar spyod pa rnams la ni bsdus don byas pa yin zhes bya ba la/ de ltar
211a2(rgyud 'grel): lam zhes pa ni/ sngar bstan pa'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i don bsdus par gyur pa des so// de yang gang zhig 'grel pa rtsom pa por gyur pas de dang mthun par dbyibs dang ming rnams so// rim par bkod nas byas pa ni/ mkhan
211a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i rjes 'brangs pa'o// nyer 'byor rnams la zhes bya ba ni/ rgyud 'di la nus pa'i sgo nas nyams pa med par tshig dang don 'chad pa dang / bsam pa dang / bklag par 'dod pa'i don du'o// bsdus te byas pa yino zhes bya ba ni/ da
211a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dam tshig mad po'i sgo na so spangs par gyur nas bsdus pa bam/ yang na dngos grub nye bar 'dod pa la sogs pa dang / das tshig dang ldan par sgrub pa'i las rnams thams cing 'dis 'grub par 'gyur byas/ zab pa dang
211a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya che ba ni theg pa chen po'i 'jug pa ste/ de dag bsdus pa'i dngos grub ni zab cing rgya che bi'i yul der bsdus pa'i don gyi sgrub thubs pa mams pa yi na no// zab cing rgya che grang gis rtogs 'gyur ba// mgrin por po la gnas
211a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi zer dbang // mkhan po'i rjes mthun nye bar bsdus pa sbyar// dgos den de yi man ngag shin tu bsdus// shing rta chen po rgya mtsho chen po nas// blo yul man ngag chu yis snyim pa gang // rnyed pa cung zad rna bkrol ba yis//
211b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i don rtogs ldan par shog/ dpal mai tri pas mdzad pa nye bar bsdus shing / zab cing rgya che ba'i 'grel pa/ mkhas pa chen po dril bu bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan
211b2(rgyud 'grel): po many+dzu shrI satwa dang / dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
212a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
212b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+tha many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sAd+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpalnga ye shes sems dpa' la phyag
212b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// yon tan ye shes mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i// bde ba'i stobasuM kyis badre ba'i ro myong ba'i// rang gi rgyud gsum dag pa'i 'jam dpal de la b+hU dang / 'jam dpal mtshan ni brjod pa yaMs// bzung lcags
212b3(rgyud 'grel): thob par gyur pa yi// yongs bsdus sgrub thabs gsal bar bsdebs// de'i gzhung bdag gis bshad bar bya// shes rab snying rjer ldan pa yi// zab mo'i don la dgongs pa yis// theg chen sngags pa'i rnal
212b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas// ying dga' ba yi gnas nyid du// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// snying khar nyi dkyil a bsams lo// 'od phyung 'phags pa bla mar bcas// yid kyi mdun du spyan drangs yA// maN+Dal mchod pa phul
212b5(rgyud 'grel): byas la// gsum la skyabs su gsol ba dang // sdig pa ma lus bshags pa dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// de yang rgyud las/ dpal ldan pad+ma sangs rgyas skyes// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa
212b6(rgyud 'grel): po rtag pa kun rgyal rnol 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog/ rdo rje drigos pa rdo rje'i snying // rdo rje nyi mo snang ba che// rje rje zla ba dri med 'od// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung bdon sna tshogs 'bar ba'i
213a1(rgyud 'grel): 'ong/ 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ sems can kun gyi yid ltar 'gyogs// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// mchod cing brjed pa drang srong che// gtse bre dgen
213a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum 'dzin pa// dag par byed pa sdig sel ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla ni med// ces gsungs so// de nas skad cig ma laM bdag nyid 'jam dpal du bsgoms la// de'i thugs ka nas a las// rdo rje shugs can 'jigs
213a3(rgyud 'grel): bar byed// ha lu ha la gdong brgya po// dang ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// gdung ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'o// oM man+d+ha shri kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ b+he ro ha na ra da ha ra/ pa tsa ra sarba/
213a4(rgyud 'grel): mu ka badz+ra khaD+ga tshe da rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces brjod pas mtshon cha dpag tu med pas mtshams bcad do// de nas oM shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bA at+ma ko&haM zhes brjod pas steng par bsam/ snying kha'i sa bon las byung ba'i
213a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba lnga'i yi ge rang bzhin ched do// e/ yaM bAM/ r-I laM/ na mkha' rlung chu ri rab ma dang bcas// de stengs pad+ma'i lte ba la// b+h+rUM las ye shes gzhal yis khang // pho brang pad+ma 'khor ler bcas// gru chang sgo ba ni mu khyud ldan//
213a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo// rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba// phra zhing zag med sa bon bral// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas gdan sgom ste// baM las
213b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma zla ba'i gdan// a dang ma las nyi ma'i gdan// de stengs a yi 'phro 'du las// a las 'jam dbyangs rdo rjer gyur// sku mdog dmar ser gdong lnga pa// dkar sngo dmar ljang dmar ser ro// zur phud lnga ldan cod pan can// me tog
213b2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen phreng bas brgyan// phyag brgyad rim par bsnams pa ni// ril gri mda' dang lcags kyu rdo rje g.yas// po tI gzhu dang zhags pa pad+ma g.yon// gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan// kha dog lnga ldan 'od kyi dbus// rdo rje skyil
213b3(rgyud 'grel): kruklung bzhugs pa la// thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo'i dbus// nyi ma'i steng na ral gri a yis mtshan// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gsang sngags dgod// yang na gnas bzhir 'khor lo bsam// de ltar bsam gtan ting 'dzin dben
213b4(rgyud 'grel): de yang rgyud las/ dadal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'ong // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung // gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// gdong lnga zur phung lnga dang rdzun/ zhung brud rtswa ba mi rtog stsos/ ga pa @
213b5(rgyud 'grel): po kun skyod cing // shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag/ dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag/ 'jig rten gsum ni gzhon lus gcig/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od
213b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // nyi ma 'char kha'i dkyil lhor mdzes// gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas de'i thugs ka ru// oM las gyur pa'i
214a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku mdog dkar ba'i rang bzhin la// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dang po ral gri po ti'o// tha ma byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas de yi thugs ka ru// ye shes sems dpa'
214a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon gang ba// sku mdog dmar ser gser mdog la// shes rab ral gri mda' gnu bsnams// sangaso rgyas de'i mdun nyid du// pad+ma'i gdan la sh+loka thub bsgom// pheM brang pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// shar du hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje mi bskyob
214a3(rgyud 'grel): ba sku mdog sde sku'i rang bzhin la// dang po gnyis ni po ti ral gri bsnams// tha ma gsang ba swa gnon la// g.yon pa mnyam gzhag rdo rje bsnams// lho ru traM las rin chen 'byung ldan ni// ser po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// g.yos
214a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon kun gyi dang po 'dre// tha ma mchog sbyin rin po che// nub tu hrIHlIs snang ba mtha' yas ni// dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// mnyami gzhag phyag rgya pad+ma bsdams// byang du ha las gyur pa'i don yod grub pa ni// ljang khu
214a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// khu tshur phyag na rgya gram bsnams// kun la rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// gnas gsum 'bru gsum byin gyis brlab// zhabs ni rdo rje skyil me krung du bzhugs// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
214a6(rgyud 'grel): la A li yongs su gyur pa las// nyi zla pad+ma'i bdan stengs su// yab kyi thugs ka a yi 'phro 'du las// i I u U/ oM au o oM 'phros// dbyangs yig bong du zhu ba las// chos 'khor rim bzhin bskor bar bya// kun
214b1(rgyud 'grel): tu bzung po nu mkha' snying po dang // 'jam dpal sa yi snying po dang // spyan ras gzigs dang sgrib pa sal// phyag na rdo rje byams pa'o// 'khor lo pi wa da ut+pa la// dung phor pad+ma rin chen dang // myu gu rdo rje bum pa'o// g.yon pa thams cad mchog
214b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin no// rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan// gdan la bzhugs shing 'gying ba'i tshul// rgyud las gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rnam shis brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // kha dog sna tshogs
214b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i 'od// dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan zhes gsungs so// phyogs kyi sgo bzhir bsgom pa ni// gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'phro 'du las/ dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi 'phros pas/ 'od zhu 'phros zhing 'dus pa las// lcags kyu zhags pa lhag sa/
214b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dril// sku mdog rang rang phyogs dang mthun// rgyud las// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje'i zhags// 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba// zhes gsungs so// de nas thugs ka'i sa bon a las 'od 'phros ye shes
214b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dgug gzhug bya// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la// a A sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM trAM hri taM oM/ zhes dbang bskur bar bya/ rgyud las/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// ye shes dbang bskur cod
214b6(rgyud 'grel): pan can zhes gsungs// de nas snying po bzlas pa bya// thugs ka shes rab 'khor lo la// de de bus ste ba'i 'khor lo la// sngags 'phreng me tig dkyus pa ltar// de la dmigs te bzlas par bya// oM bA gI shwa ri mu/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na/
215a1(rgyud 'grel): duHkha tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa na yA twe na maHa A sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i dA ya/ ha ra ha rA/ oM hUM hI b+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pA tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la
215a2(rgyud 'grel): su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyI na gan+d+ha AH/ de yang rgyud las/ 'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/ 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// gzi brjid phreng ba blta na sdug/ gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// zhes gsungs pas
215a3(rgyud 'grel): so// de nas mchod pa rgyus pa dbul/ a A sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+phu ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ puSh+pa/ A lai ke/ gno d+he/ nAM bri t+ye/ shab+da/ rgyud las/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga'
215a4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed/ ces pa la sogs pa dug lnga rang grol gyi mchod pa 'o// oM badz+ra gI ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra ne t+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra mA le tri/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye hI/ de yang rgyud las/ mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che// zhes gsungs so// dri nas mchod 'os
215a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod 'os phyug gi gnas// zhes pas bstod de/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// gdong lnga zur phyeng lnga dang ldan// lag pa brgya pos kun bskyod cing // sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs
215a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang // go mos pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// rnam snang gtso la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rigs lnga la 'dud kyi bstod pa bya'o// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'jam dpal ye shes
215b1(rgyud 'grel): ses dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa sna chog/ 'jam dang lnga de la byug 'tshalU 'dud// gzhon nu'i sgra lus 'chang ba po// ye shes sgron mes rab gsal zhing // jig rten gsus shrI sun sel pa// 'jam dpal del phyag brtul 'drung //
215b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi 'dab bzangs tshogs kyis ni// zla ba rgyas pa zil gnon cing // rig pa rnam par gsal bsgyur la// 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ma bgyis zur phud gsal ba la// nor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' zhing // nyid
215b3(rgyud 'grel): ni kun tu dga' ba'i sku// 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bdud// bdud rtsi 'dra zhing 'jam la zab// yid dang gsung gi sgra sgrogs pa// dam pa chos kyi rin tshan mdzod// 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal bdud// gangs kyi chu ltar gdangs
215b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba// 'jig rten khams na rnam par bzhugs// nyon mongs dri me rab spangs pa// 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud// mche ba gtsigs dang bsgyings pa yis// 'jigs pa'i sku yis tshul gyis ni// la ma'i dregs pa
215b5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms mdzad pa// 'jam dpal de la phyag 'a tshal 'dud// rang gri sman dang mdangs 'dra ba// ut+pal sngon po rab mdzes pa// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu 'dzin// 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i
215b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la// rgya cher bstod pa rab po stong pa// 'gro ba'i lam ni ston pa po// 'jam dpal daM la phyag 'tshal 'dud// de nas sems dpa' brgyad la bstod// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang
216a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa// kun tu bzang po khyod la 'dud// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen ldan// na mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// na mkha' las byung rang byung ba// na mkha'i snying po khyod la bdud// shes
216a2(rgyud 'grel): rab chen po blo chen ldan// shes rab ye shes me bo che// shes rab chen po skad cig la// 'dzem dpal shes rab khyud la 'dud// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs dang ldan// sa yI snying po 'gro ba 'dzin+te// sa yi
216a3(rgyud 'grel): snying po khyod la 'dud// snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ snying rje che dang shes rab dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// spyan ras gzigs dbang khyod la 'dud// shugs chen 'gyogs pa chen po ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar
216a4(rgyud 'grel): mgyogs// rgyal ba rnam rgyal dgra las rgyal// sgrib pa sel ba khyod la 'dud// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// phyag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud// byams chen rang bzhin dpag
216a5(rgyud 'grel): tu med// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan byams pa khyod la 'dud// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags// 'jam dbyangs chen po sku che ba// ye shes sgo ma
216a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dodud// rdo rje satwa satwa che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang // phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o// rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje lcags kyi de bzhin gshegs// nges par
216b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la'o// rdo rje chags pa bde bA sa// rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa// bdud N+DI 'dod pa rdo rje che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o// rdo rje legs pa bde bya ste// rdo rje mgu ba dga' ban+d+he// rAbyu d+ha gyes
216b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba bud d+ha mchog/ phyag 'tshul rdo rje dgyes pa lo// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje'i don// rdo rje na mkha' nor bu che// na mo khwa'i snying po rdo rje phyug/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje rin chen la'o// rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od// rdo rje gzi brjod
216b3(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la'o// rdo rje don rab rdo rje dpral// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rdo rje chen po rin chen tog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la'o// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhud pa che// rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che// dga' zhing rab
216b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' rdo rje ston// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba lnga'o// rdo rje chos rab de bzhin doni// rdo rje pad+ma rab dga' byed// rdo rje dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan// phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la'o// rdo rje rno ba theg pa che// rdo rje ral gri mtshan chen po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab
216b5(rgyud 'grel): tu zab// phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo sas la'o// rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po// rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la'o// rdo rje gsung ba rang gi mchog/ rdo rje bzlas pa rab 'grub phyir// mi gsung rdo rje/
216b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog bsgrubs pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o// rdo rje las rab rdo rje bka'// las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro/ rdo rje nges pa rgya che ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje rgya gram la'o// rdo rje sku ni brtan pa che// rdo rje go che sra bo ste// brtson 'grus
217a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ste dka' thub che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje mi zad pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la'o// rdo rje mtshams
217a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor rab tu 'dud// rdo rje bcings pa rab grol cing // phyog 'tshal rdo rje gnyis med la'o// lhag chad yi ge brgya pas bshags// a ti gats+tsha muM bshags// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis// 'gro ba ma lus 'dren par shog/ 'jam
217a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhi ba 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam/ lo tsA ba dang ma b+his bsgyur ba'o//
218a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam ma rga ba'i sgrub thams zhugs /
218b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mas+t+ra shrI kro d+ha sA d+hA nA ma khod skad du/ 'jam dpal grwa a bya bya/ ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad 'joms mdzad du/
218b2(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi snying khar zhabs kyis gnon mdzod de/ bcom ldan gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs bshad/ po'i stobs pang ldan pa yis// rten gyi gang zag tho rangs longs// snying khar nyi dkyil hUM bsams te// de las 'od zer lcags kyu 'phros
218b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed nyid dang // bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs la// maN+Dal mchod pas mnyes par byas// yan lag bdun pas mchod pa bya// thugs kar hUM gi 'phro 'du las// rdo rje shugs can spros te mtshams kyang bcad// de nas
218b4(rgyud 'grel): oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod stong po'i ngad las ni// hUM nyid na mkha'i dbyings su bsgom// da las byung ba'i yig 'bru chad// stang b+h+r-i gyis 'phro 'du las// pho brang rgya gram 'khor lhor bcas// gzhal yas sgo bzhi rdzogs
218b5(rgyud 'grel): par bskyed// a yaM baM laM raM bruM zhes pa'o// de steng nyi zla pad+ma dang // dregs pa ma he'i gdan la bzhugs// hUM las 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsam// de zhu gshin rjegashed du gyur// zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis// sku mdog nag po na mkha'i mdangs//
218b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dud kha'o// steng du zhal nyid ser po'o// g.yas pa gri gug ral gri mnga'// 'khor li tri shA rtse gsum mdung // g.yon na thod pa phub dang gzhu// bai con mgo bo sdigs mdzub zhags// glang stag zhing chen sbrul gyis brgyan//
219a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal thong bram snyan rje 'gur rmang rigs lcug/ thod skam dbu brgyan thod rlon do shal byas// skra khram rno sdug mche ba rab gtsigs shing // zhal nas ha la'i sgra sgrogs 'jigs par bye bskal pa'i me dpung dus mtha'i me ltar
219a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gyad kyi dor stabs bzhugs// nyi zla pad+ma dregs pa pho mo dang // ma he sngo nag brjidapa'i gdan la 'jigs tshul bzhugs// paM las bskyed pa'i yum nyid ni// g.yas pa gri gug yapa la 'khyud/ na la 'od
219a3(rgyud 'grel): khrag gtso la stobs// gnyis med 'khyil ba'i tshul du gnas// pho brang rdo rje rgya gram la// yab yum gnyis med sbyor mtshams nas// shar du k+She las gyur pas dgapa/ lho ru ma las byung bse rtswa phye gyur bas da8// byang du nga las gyur pas ljang thams
219a4(rgyud 'grel): cad zhal gsum phyag kyang drug/ gti mug nga rgyal gshin rje gshed// 'dod chags phra dogs gshin rje gshed // rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// phyi rol gyi ni rtsibs bcu las// sbyor ba'i mtshams nas hUM bcu 'phros// 'phros shing
219a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pas hUM btsur gyur// shar du shes rab mthar byed la// lho ru gshin rje mthar byed do// nub tu pad+ma mthar byed do// byang du bgegs ni mthar byed do// shar ldor dbyug pa sngon po la// lho nub mi g.yo mgon po'o// nub 'ang 'dod pa'i
219a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ste// byang shar khro bo gnod mdzes so// stang du hUM mdzad 'og tu stobs po che// zhal gcig phyag gnyis thams cad mthing // g.yas pa sna tshogs g.yon pa/ sa mdzub bslang // brkyang bskum dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// bskal pa'i
219b1(rgyud 'grel): me 'bar dregs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// sbyor mtshams dzaHhUM baM hoHlasaHsgo ba bzhi rnams rims bzhin bskyed// thugs khar shes rab 'khor lo hUM// ye shes gsum gyis gnas gsum brlab// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa/ ye shes khro bo gug gzhug
219b2(rgyud 'grel): byad/ de nas bzlas pa'i rim pa ni// oM ya ma rA dza sa do mai ya ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ ya ta ya ta/ rtsa sngags so// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHb+hUM kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT/ snying po'o// oM ya mAts+tshe ka hUM phaT/
219b3(rgyud 'grel): song snying ngo // oM dwe Sha ra ti mu ta hUM dzaHswA hA// rje btsun ma'i 'o// de yang rgyud las/ khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// rkeng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// sku yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste// mig brgya pa
219b4(rgyud 'grel): ste rdo rje'i mig/ lus ni rdo rje'i baM spu can// khro bo'i lus kyis gzugs ldan pa// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don// khro gnyer rim pa ldan la sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// 'jigs pa chen po rdo rje zhags// 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra
219b5(rgyud 'grel): nga gad chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa// glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal// rigs gsum 'chang pa gsang sngags 'chang zhes gsungs so// de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni// yaM dang r-i gyis me rlung
219b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// kaM gsum skyed po aM las thod pa'i snod// go ku da ha na bi mu ra su khaM/ dam rdzas bcu sbyar a las zla ba'i khams/ hUM dzaH'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtsi bsrubs// oM sarba d+harmA b+hA ba swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ zhes brjod pas skyon rnams
220a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par bsam// 'bru gsum pa yis byin gyis brlab// a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha rA ha ra/ oM hU~M hrIHb+ha ga bAM/ dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+he i daM ba liM grih+Na gri h+Na/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ de
220a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bstod de/ hUM chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo'i gzugasu bstan// bai DUr+ya yi mngag 'dra sku mnga' zhing // gdug pa 'dul phyir 'jigs byed sku la bstod// shin tu khro zhing gnag pa ma he'i
220a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang gaMyas dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi 'jigs pa'i zhal// steng zhal gtsigs pa'i zhal ni shin tu 'khrug/ zhal drug spyan gsum 'dzegs byed zhal la 'dud// g.yos kyi phyag drug mtshan cha gri gug dang // ral gri mda' dang 'khor lo
220a4(rgyud 'grel): tri shul mdung // g.yon na thod pa phub gzhu be con mgo bo bsnams// bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod// brkyang bsgom tshul gyis zhabs bzhi thur du bgrang // ma he sngo nag brdzis pa'i gdan lnga bzhugs//
220a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed stobs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// glang stag zhing chen sbrul gyis rgyan gyis brgyano// rus pa'i rgyan cha drug ni dbang du 'khrol// thod skams dbu brgyan thed rlon do shal byas// rdo rje 'jigs byed rkyen la rab
220a6(rgyud 'grel): tu bstod// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes// rno gdug mche ba rab tu gtsigs// ha ha zhes bzhad srid gsum zil gyis gnon// pheM gyis sgra sgrogs rgyal po khyed la bstod// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// zhe
220b1(rgyud 'grel): sngang rdo rje'i 'od zer tsha tsha 'phro// bdud dang dgra bgegs ma lus bsgrag par byed// ma lus dbang du bdud la phyag 'tshal bstod// mun nag lta bu'i sku brjid cing // nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can// gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams
220b2(rgyud 'grel): bdud bdal khro bo'i rgyal po khyed la bstod// hUM dmar nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdzes pa'i sku// g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa thod khrag gtso la stobs// spyan gsum me stag rib tu 'phro// zhil
220b3(rgyud 'grel): na saM ha ha nges par sgrogs// dbu skra dmar sar rab tu 'bar// phagra mo yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM gti mug nga rgyal gshin rje gshed// 'dod chags phyag dog gshin rje gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang//
220b4(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i mtshon tshwa sna tshogs 'dzin// glung stag zhing chen rgyun gyis brgyan// thod pa'i do shal rgyun drug ldan// sbru la me 'a bar gdug pa 'dul// gshed po bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi dge bcu spangs sa bcu bgrod// phyogs
220b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i bdud 'dul khro bo bcu// zhal gcig phyug gnyis sku mdog mthing // gdug pa'i mtshon chu sna tshogs 'dzi ni// g.yon pa sdigs mdzu bzhags pa bsnams// lha dang lha min thams cing 'dul// rgyan drug thod pa'i D+yan gyis brgyan//
220b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byeng bcu la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM ye shas rnam pani yang dag rtogs// g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ rgyan dang lnga bcus sku la brgyan// brkyang bsgrim pa pha zil gyis mnano// lcags kye ma dang zhigs pa mo// lu gu rgyud
221a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs pa mo// mkha' 'gro bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// lhag chung yi ge brgya pas bshags// de nas mjug bsdu ba ni// hUM zhes pa yi sgra brjod de// gcig gi ngang la yab la bsdu// yab nyid 'ong du zhu las
221a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ 8hUM da rim gyis zhu ba las// zag med bde ba'i ngang la gnos// rtag pa'i mtha' las grol bar 'gyur// rdo rje skad cig lhar bsgoms la// sngags kyi 'khor lo rab brjod pas// chad pa'i mtha' las grol bar 'gyur// de nas
221a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam ci bder gnas// 'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ bla ma sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam/ bla ma le tsa ba dar ma d+hi yis bsgyur ba'o//
222a1(rgyud 'grel): skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbang bzhi'i gdams pa slob papon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so//
222b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya thub pas gsungs pa'i 'jam dpal mtshan brjod 'di la zab pa da rgya che ba gnyis las/ 'di rgya che ba'i man ngag go// don brgyad las 'di man ngag gi sa'o// de la rim gyis pa
222b2(rgyud 'grel): dang cig car ba las 'di rim gyis pa'i sa'o// de la bum pa'i dbang gi dus su// rdul mtshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas/ de yang / sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon zer// de la brten nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan te/ smon 'jug
222b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis slob ma las la 'jug pa'i dus su/ ri yi phug gram chu 'gram mam// lha khang mchod rten dben sa dang // dur khrod gnas dang shing drung du// de la sogs te gnas yid du 'ong bar/ slob dpon bstan bde ba la 'dug ste/ bsam
222b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan lA gnas par bya'o// rgyud nas/ bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas gsung ngo // de nas rang 'jam dpal du bsgoms ya/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ de'i rjes la/ a A sar+b+ba ta thA ga hr-i da ya/ hi ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn
222b5(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na murti/ bA gI shwa rau/ ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHzhes pas bdag dang snang srid stong par bsam/ de'i ngang las bdag gshin rje gshed du bsgoms la/ sa snang ba la bslang ba dang / mi snang ba
222b6(rgyud 'grel): 'i bsgreng ba dang // bgegs bskrad pa dang / sa sbyang ba dang / sa gzung ba'i dang / mchod gtor gyis mnyes par bya ba dang / klog 'don bya ba dang / sngon 'gro rnams bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sta go ni ni bdud rtsi chus chag chag btab
223a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ gnam thig gdab pa dang / sa thig gdab pa dang / tshon byin gyis brlab pa dang / bri ba la 'jug par bya'o// de nas lha dang bum pa'i sta gon brA ste/ bum pa dkar po nag po rA ri spangs pa la ras kha tshar ma nyams pa mang
223a2(rgyud 'grel): chings byas la phyag rgya lha yang gdags// de la sogs pa'i yo byad rgyas pa rab sog/ de ni bum bi'i sta yin no// de nas rnal 'byor pa ste gon la gnas par bya ste/ sbyor khrus dang ldan par bya// sdig bshags bya skyabs 'gro byas la/ slob dpon
223a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam ngo pa sa yo shes sems da 'dzin la gnas par bya'o// de ni slob dpon gyi sta gon no// slob ma'i sta gon ni phyir khrus byas la/ sdig pa bshags pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bar chod bsrung ba'i phyir srung srung gdags pa dang
223a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo 'bru gsam gyis byin gyis brlab pa'o// de ni slob mi'i sta gon no// bar der zhi ba'i sbyin sreg rgyas par bya'o// dbang thob pa dang me thob pa gnyis su shes par bya'o// dbang thob na sems bsgreng bya mi dgos/ ba na sems
223a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed bya/ gnyis pa la 'jug/ gsum pa la rdzogs par bya'o// de yang gsum rigs gcing ma dag pa ste gsung / dbang thob pa yin na bum pa gcag la dbang bzhi ston thog tu bskur/ byin brlabs brtan par bya ba'i phyir sgo
223a6(rgyud 'grel): sa yin dngul lo// de'i cho ga ni dang po kha nas sa brlang ste/ sa bdag lha klu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// sa yi dmigs dang ne'u gsing lu ma rnams// rdzing dang ltang ka so so'i gnas rnams nas/ sa bdag klu gnyan sde dang 'khor du
223b1(rgyud 'grel): sa yi lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa bslang phyir// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la// rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi bslang du gsol// lag pa g.yas
223b2(rgyud 'grel): sa la brdabs pas/ sa gas pa'i ser gnas sa'i lha mo ro stod snyengs der byung nas/ lag pa g.yas pa khas len gyi phyag/ g.yon pa bum pa bsnams pa de ltar byon par bsam/ de la gtor ma dang me tog dri zhim pos mchod la/ 'dod pa'i
223b3(rgyud 'grel): don la gsol ba btab ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas srong la bdud btul/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs por sangs rgyas la/ yang sa gzhi rin po che 'di'i steng du mdzad pa lags pas/ rnal 'byor pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba la
223b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yang / tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rten 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i pho brang 'debs par 'tshal bas sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pas sa bdag klu gnyen kun/ sa rin du rin po ches brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ dang
223b5(rgyud 'grel): po dge sbyor dbu bzung ba nas/ tha ma rdzogs pa mthar phyin phyin du sa gnas 'di bdag gi yar lags pas/ sa 'di brtan pa dang bkra shis par mdzad du gsol lo zhes brjod la gtor ma sbyin no// de'i cho ga 'di skad do// hUM skyob pa
223b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rin po che// sa dang pha rol phyin pa las// lho mo 'khor dang bcas dbang du gyur// shAkya thub pa skyob pa yis// bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar// de bzhin bdag gis bdud rnams gzhom// pham par byed de dkyil 'khor
224a1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+rUM/ lha mo da de nyid du bim par bsam mo// de ni sa bslang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas bdag cing 'jam dpal du gsal bar bsgoms la/ de nas rdo rje gsar dril bu gsalnga zhing // rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor zhongs gzhi gzung ngo // de nas
224a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dkyil 'khor kyi dbus su bsdad de/ las thams cad pa'i sngags brjod cing snang mig phyogs bcur blta// rdo rje na mkha' la gsor zhing mtshams bcad do// nga nas dri sna tshogs dang spos kyi chu sbyar la lag tu thogs la/ pus
224a3(rgyud 'grel): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la 'di skad do// hUM bcom ldan ye shes sems dpa' ni/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po ste// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // dkyil 'khor thigs rje'i bdag nyid can// de dag slob mar bcas pa
224a4(rgyud 'grel): dpang mgon po bdag ni 'byung bar 'tshal// las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi dri'i chus byug go// bdag gi thugs kar thig skud kyi sna gcig gzung // slob ma de phyag na rdo rjer gsal btab pa/ this skud de lte ba'i khung du gzung la/ hUM
224a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' gang bya'i bcom ldan 'das/ khyed kyis sems can 'gro don mdzad// las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis thig gdab bo// thig skud kyi sgra yis bde bar gshegs pa' thugs dam bskul nas sems can gyi don mdzad par bsam
224a6(rgyud 'grel): med ni sa tshon byin gyis brlab ste/ oM hUM sa hri ha bris la rigs lnga'i dgug gzhug bya'o// de zhu bas rin po che lnga'i phye mar gyur nas/ des bris te g.yon pas nga nas pad+ma'i gdan la e re dgod/ de las lha'i 'phro du dang bskyed pa
224b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan nas gsal lo// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bla ma sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / da ni smon 'jug gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed bya ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag
224b2(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba skye ba nas da ltar lus 'di blangs pa tshun chad mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba rnams/ bla ma dkon mchog yi dam mkha' 'gro'i spyan sngar mthol lo bshag so//
224b3(rgyud 'grel): da ni skyabs su 'gro ba ste// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// chos la skyabs su mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// da ni sdom pa bzung
224b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bla ma dkon mchog gi spyan sngar/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / dge pa'i chos ni sdud pa dang / sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis rtag par gzung bar bgyi// de ni smon
224b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems bskyed do// da ni 'jug par bya ste/ dang por bshags pa bya ste/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba thog ma med pa nas da lta'i lus 'di blangs pa yan chad
224b6(rgyud 'grel): du mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba rnams/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so// bdog ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du
225a1(rgyud 'grel): bla mu la skyabs su mchi'o// yi dam la skyabs su mchi'o// mkha' 'gro la skyabs su mchi'o// da ni sdom pa bzung bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum// deng nas brtsams te gzung
225a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi// nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yasi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yis// dam tshig yid du
225a3(rgyud 'grel): 'ong ba la// nyin ri bzhin du dus drug du// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs tshon dag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po
225a4(rgyud 'grel): yis sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung por bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis
225a5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa me lus bzung // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// ces 'jug go// nub dang po la smon 'jug gi
225a6(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed do// so shing dor la rang re'i rmi lam brtag go/ de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i dus su bzlas pa bya ba ni/ oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ oM badz+ra tik+Sha duHkha ts+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ya/ d+hI na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra btsa
225b1(rgyud 'grel): nA ya twe nA muHa A sarba tA thA la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya'o// nub gnyis pa la byang chub lam du drang ba ni/ mig ras kyis bkab la lag tu me tog thogs la/ sgo'i phyi logs su bzhag la/ slob dpon nyid kyis 'di
225b2(rgyud 'grel): snying brjod do// skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyed// ngang dang mos pa tsi la dga' zhes lan gsum brjod paso// slob mas 'di skad brjod do// bdag cag 'khor pA las bsgral phyir// kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can// srid pa'i 'khor lo gnas
225b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ba// de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis// gtso bos bdag la bka' drin gsol zhes lan no// yang slob dpon gyis/ ma rig rmongs pa'i bu mchog khyod// rdo rje byang lam drangos nas ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// bla med byang
225b4(rgyud 'grel): tshub lam nas drang bar bya'o// badz+ra ku sha dzaHzhes brjod pas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad do// de nas las kyi slob dpon lag tu rdo rje gtad la/ lag pa nas drangs nas gral so sor bya'o// rang gi gdong g.yogs
225b5(rgyud 'grel): byas la bzhag go// yang slob dpon khong rang gris// skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyed// las dang spyod pa ci la dga'/ byas pas/ yang slob mas/ bdag ni skal ldan bde chen la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dngos grub gsol/ zhes so// de nas
225b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog lag tu thogs la/ thal mo sbyar la 'di skad brjod do// byang chub rdo rje 'jam dpal la// rin chen me tog dam pa 'bul// bdag kyang 'jam dpal skur gyur cig/ 'jam dpal sku yi rdo rje gsol// pra tIts+tsha ho zhes me tog dbul lo// me tog lha
226a1(rgyud 'grel): la tshung na des chog go// ma tshung na lan gsum bsgyur ro// de yang ma tshud na las thams cad bskur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod do// de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan par bya/
226a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs// dam tshig mchog tu gyur par byed// badz+ra tsak+Shu pra be shra phaT/ ces mig dbye'o// de nas dbang bskur te/ dang po bum pa'i dbang bskur te bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas bum pa
226a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od du zhu ba las de 'khor lor gyur// 'khor lo 'od du zhu/ hU~M du gyur/ de la rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i dbang ngo // de spyid po'i thog tu bzhag la mchod pa dbul te/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' ba
226a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun+da gyi sgra che baM// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro bo che// khro ba chen po sgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa
226a5(rgyud 'grel): thothams cad sel bar byed// oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ d+hU baM/ I lo ke/ gAn d+he/ ne wi t+ye/ shab+de/ hU~M/ oM badz+re tik+Sha duHkhets+tshe dA/ prad+d+hi dz+nyA na murta ye dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa na ya te na maHa A i I u U e ai o au/ aM
226a6(rgyud 'grel): s+thi to hri ti/ dz+nyA na murto ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA ni e A sarba ta thA ga ta la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i sngags bting / di ni bum debang bskur ro// de nas dbu rkyen dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur te/ dbu rgyan dang cod pan mdun du bzhag la/
226b1(rgyud 'grel): das go thugs gnas 'o dog s+t+ya 'byos te// dAbu rgyan dang stong pan 'od du bu/ rlon pa che'i sul srungs pa cig tu gyur// na pa che 'od du rgyu bas/ rin nen+d+ha yang ldan papa da// slob ma'i mug la skyon la/ nang gi mchod pa sa mchad do// de nas rdo rje
226b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur te rdo rje las 'od 'bros pas rdo rje 'od du zhu nus pad+ma dmar bi gcig tu gyur/ pad+mA de nu bAs aM duM g+hur/ oM b+hu bas snang hUM mtha' yas kyis debang+ge bsgyur ro// de slob ma'i lag tu bzhag byas mchod bstong gong ban+thi du byA /
226b3(rgyud 'grel): nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te/ sgrib dpon gyi mdun du dril bu bzhig la thugs ka nas 'di 'phros pas dril bu thu/ b+hu ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du ha cig tu gyur/ di las don yod grub pa'i dbang ngo // dril bu slo
226b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lag tu bzhag la mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o// / de nas ming gi dbang bskur te/ slob dpon gyi phyag g.yas pa'i steng du thugs ka nas a de 'od du zhu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur/ zla ba 'od du khu oM du
226b5(rgyud 'grel): grung de las rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang ngo // skyob dpon gyi phyug slob ma'i spyi bo'i steng du be nag ste/ mchod bstod gong buzhin du bya'o// de ltar dbang bskur ba ni phung po ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi/ ye shes lnga'i dbang po'i
226b6(rgyud 'grel): bitso nges ni bum pa'i dbang ngo // gsang ba'i dbang ni/ bdag sgo'i rnal 'byor dri byas la/ de'i spyi gtsug tu bla ma bsgom// de'i spyi gtsug tu gau shin rje gshi nga yab yum bsgrim/ der spyi gtsug tu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs
227a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams bsgom mo// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems/ gshin rje gsheng yab yum la thim par bsam/ gshin rje gshed yab yum snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems
227a2(rgyud 'grel): la babs nas/ bla ma yab yum la thim par bsam/ bla ma yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems de dag gi lam du zhugs nas lce stangs su sbyar la/ ar+g+ha drang bsres la slob ma'i lce stengs su bzhag la slob me'i ngag skyon
227a3(rgyud 'grel): dag par bsam/ de mgrin par/ de snying khar/ de lte ba pade rim gyis yar drangs pas ngag gi lom du zhugs/ sna bug g.yas su zhugs te/ g.yon du zhugs/ ngag gi rlung ni 'gro 'ong bzlas pa byas pas sgra ngos gzung med pas ngag
227a4(rgyud 'grel): sgra grag stong du 'gro ste ji sprad ngo // shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni/ rnal 'byor pa g.yas su gzhag/ rnal 'byor ma g.yon du bzhag/ de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang dril bu mdun du bzhag le/ gshin rje gshed yab yum du bskyed do// rdo rje
227a5(rgyud 'grel): de la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ slar 'dus pas yi ge hUM gcig tu gyur/ hUM 'od du zhu ba las 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal gcig
227a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas dbyug tho/ g.yon sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa bcas pa/ glang chen stod g.yogs/ zhing chen g.yang gzhi stag gi sham thabs dang / sbrul gyi chun po dang thod pa'i phreng ba dang / dur khrod kyi ches can du bskyed la
227b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i thugs kar bzhag la/ ye shes sems dpa' gug gzhug bya'o// de nas rdo rje de slob ma'i lag tu gtang thabs kyi rang bzhin du dbang bskur ro// rdo rje la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas dril bu 'od du zhu/ dril bu'i 'od zer gyis/
227b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ tshur 'dus pas yi ge a cig tu gyur/ a de 'od du zhu ba las rdo dz+haiM phag mo sku mdog dmar mo// g.yas gri gug/ g.yon thod pa bsnams pa gcig tu bskyed pa slob
227b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i spyi bo thog tu bzhag la ye shes dgug gzhug bya'o// de nas mo'i lag pa g.yon du bzhag/ drangos kyi rigs ma med na dril bu'i 'od kyi rig mar bsgom mo// de ltar shes rab kyi rim par dbang bskur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis
227b4(rgyud 'grel): mkha'o gsang byin gyis brlab/ slob dpon gyis gsong ba'i gnas nas hUM cig 'phros pas slob ma'i gsang bar thim// rdo rje rtsi lnga pa phyed ma cig tu gyur/ rdo rje'i bum par oM gyis mthun pa cig tu gyur par bsgom/ yum g+hi mkha'
227b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang byin gyis brlab ste/ bdag gi yum gyi mkha' las ma dmar mo cig 'phros pas slob ma'i yum gyi gsang bar thA mi/ ma de zhu ba las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ze 'bru dang bcas pa cig bsgom/ de nas slob dpon gyis hUM zhes brjod
227b6(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje bskul/ e shis dril bu bskul/ a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hr-iHb+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na murti bA gI shwa raM/ ma hA pa tsi/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+he aHzhes pas skad cig ma la
228a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de/ bde ba ngos gzung ngo // de ni bde ba bskur ba'i rim pa'o// // dbang gi don lam du bslang ba ni/ de'i dus lngas ma g.yos par yab yum gnyis kyis bsrubs pas rlung me'i drod can gyi me lce a ba d+hu
228a2(rgyud 'grel): tI na yar zhugs te/ spyi bo gtsug tor gyi zhu ba las/ klad rgyas 'debs pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrol// de la bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems babs te dga' ba'o// byang chub kyi sems dri mgrin pa longs spyod
228a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor bsgril bas rtsa 'dab ma bcu drug grol te mchog dga'/ de chos kyi 'khor lor bskyil bas rtsa 'dab brgyad grol te dga' bral/ de lto ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du babs rtsa 'ong ba drug cu rtsa bzhi grol te/ de lhan cig skyes
228a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dga' ba'o// de la bla nas su 'phangs te hA he zhes pas lte ba nas snying khar drang / hI hi zhes pos snying kha nas mgrin par drang / hUM hUM zhes pas mgrin pa nas klad pa bde chen du drangs pas gtsug te ra chen po'i haM las spur len la sbur
228a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'am/ khab len la lcags 'dus pa bzhin du khubs kyis 'dus so// de la seng ge rnam par rol gyis khyab par bsgom me// de ltar yang drang ma dbang byed yin pa de stong gi nyi mas ngos zin par bya'o// / dbang bzhi
228a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni bzhi par ming btags kyang gsum pa las bskur bar mi 'dod do// gong ma'i nyams de sems nyid la ngo spyod pa la bzhi las shes zer ro// de la bzhi pa dbong gis po spyad de/ gdams ngag ngo spyad kyis sems nges thung shig byA/ dar cig
228b1(rgyud 'grel): lon pa dang / de ka rang yin byas la/ lag pa na mkha' la yug byas la/ bzhi pa bde ba'i don no// phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de gzugs dang khwa dog tu ma grub pas na mkha' la ngo spyad do// gsum pa'i nyams de ngos gzung dang bral bas
228b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu ma'i bde ba nyams su myong du yod pa la dbang po mngon sum du bstan du med/ de ka la ngo sprad pas dbang bzhi po'i gdams ngag go// lta stangs bzhis rig pa spros dang bral bar ngo sprad do// bum pa'i dbang gis dus su rigs lnga'i dkra
228b3(rgyud 'grel): shishes gsol zhing dbang bskur// gsang dbang man chod dbang bzhi pa rdzogs nas bkra shis kyi dbang bskur te dngos grub blang ngo // bkra shis gsol ba ni/ rgyud las/ bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa bkra shis stan grags pag
228b4(rgyud 'grel): dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ zhes so// rdzas la brten pa'i bkra shis kyi ston mo nr-i/ 'brang rgyas dang / mar dang / thud dang // zho dang / mngar gsum dang / khur ba dang / la phug dang / zas sna mang du thigs la rigs lnga'i bkra shis pa
228b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ bkra shos dam pa chos dbyings bskyod pa med mod kyang // rgyal ba rigs lha'i bkra shis bde lags shog/ bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ dbus phyogs sangs rgyas rigs kyi zhing khams nas/
228b6(rgyud 'grel): sprospos dang bral ba'i bkra shis gang lags pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bde legs shog/ bkra shis 'gre/ shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ rdo rje rigs kyi bkra shis skye mtsho med// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde
229a1(rgyud 'grel): legs shog/ bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi zhing khams nas// rin chen rigs kyi bkra shis dgos 'dreng 'byung // bkra shis ngam pa des kyang dang
229a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir bde legs shog/ bkra shis kun gyis bkra shris pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dag/ nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ skyon med pad+ma lta bu'i bkra shis nges// bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bde lags
229a3(rgyud 'grel): shog/ bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dag/ byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi zhing khams nas// las rnams grub pa'i bkra shisaM gang lags pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/
229a4(rgyud 'grel): oM bud+d+ha ka la sha AM b+hi Shiny+tsa AM/ oM badz+ra kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na ka la sha oM b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ oM pad+ma kA la shra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hriH/ oM karma ka la sha a b+hi ShAny+tsa aH/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyi brgyan pra rgyal pra
229a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i bkra shis pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag dpon sleb bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyi bkra shis ni// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shaMs pa// chos kyi rgyal mtshan lags par 'dzugs// sangs rgyas sku yi bkra shis
229a6(rgyud 'grel): shog chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan// bud+d+ha gsung gi bkra shis sheg/ 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi ba'u// bud+d+ha thugs kyi bkra shis shog/ khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// bud+d+ha da bu yi bkra shis shog/ spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang
229b1(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha spyan gyi bkra shis shog/ bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ bud+d+ha mgul gyi bkra shis shog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba// bud+d+ha ljags kyi bkra shis shog/ bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ sprul pa'i

229b5(rgyud 'grel): na hUM bde ba'i don rtogs/ te nA hUM bde ba'i lam rnyed tI twe te na hUM go&saM su med pa'i bde ba thob pa'o// ye te na maHtheg chen ma ni raM blo yin no// baR+Sha du dge bya'i don ni/ longs sgyu lam du bying pa rdo rje'irI g+hA ne/ oM skr-i to d+haM de chos tham
229b6(rgyud 'grel): cad rang bzhin skye ming kyi ngo bor gnas/ dz+nyA na mur+t+tir tsaM/ ye shes kyi bde ba rang la yod/ bud+d+ho bud+d+hA naM/ sangs rgyas sems can ye nas gnyis su med/ t+ye d+hI birti nAM/ dus gsum gyi don brjod po las 'das pa'i gnas yin/ bang pa'i don sto/
230a1(rgyud 'grel): twe na hUM/ bde ba'i lam rnyed/ te twe te na hUM thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob po// mthar thug pa'i don ni/ chos sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni/ oM sarba d+har+m+ma A A/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa
230a2(rgyud 'grel): nyida.oM sarba d+harma i I skye bu med pa nyid du snang / oM sarba d+har+m+ma u U/ ma skyes chos rnams dus gsum yid kyis dran/ oM sarba d+harmA e ai/ chos rnams skye med mi 'da' dam tshig nyid/ oM sarba d+harmA a o au/ chos rnams

231b2(rgyud 'grel): mi gr-i hA gr-ih+Na khA hi khA hi zhes ldan gsum gyis bla ma dam pa rnams dang yi dam gyi lha tshogs rnams dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams dang / chos skyong ba'i srungs ma thugs ngam can rnams phyi'i mchod pa nang gi mchod pa/

233a1(rgyud 'grel): de 'jam dpal gyi thugs kar 'phang ngo // de nas byang bu mar me la bsreg// tha ma la tsha tsha gdab// tshe 'das pa'i don du smon lam rgya chen po gdab bo// sdom pa bzung blos mdzad pa 'byo lo tsA ba d+harmA b+his bsgyur
233a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ro'i rab gnas cho ga rdzogs so// / sa ma ya// 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// shrI ba lA pha ni gdags pa ro bsreg pa/ maN+Dal drug gi cho ga tu/ de nas ro khang bur bcug la/ sa

233b6(rgyud 'grel): babs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ pad+ma can gyi mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten gshegs su gso la/ rang bzhin mchod rten gshegs su
234a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ ka ni ka'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ bkra shis sgo mangs mchod rten gshegasu gsol/ ye shes blo rtag mchod rten gshegasu gsol/ chos kyi
234a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol/ dregs pa'i phung po dur khrod brgyad kyi rten// mkha' 'gro'i gnas dang dngos grub kun gyi gzhi// bde gshegs rten dang ri bo la
234a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// sgrub pa'i mchod rten brgyad po gshegs su gsol// de dag kun dang theg pa so so yis// tha snyad rnams dang mthun par rten bzhengs pa'i// sprul pa'i mchod rten mtha' dag dang // 'gro ba'i don phyir gshegasu gsol
234a4(rgyud 'grel): e h+ye hi d+harma kA ya kha da la b+h+yo bruM/ dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa mA ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de nas gdun 'bul ba ni/ dag pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dang / rin chen sna tshogs 'bru nyid dang / thabs dang shes rab tsau zla'i gdan// pad+ma'i
234a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ oM pad+ma ka ma la ya hUM/ nas phyag bya ba ni/ mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i byin brlabs las byung ba'i// shar nas byams ldan mthar legs rdo rje rdzogs// lho nas yid bzhin lhun grub ka ni ka/ nub nas
234a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam 'das bde byed pad+ma brtsegs// byang nas khams gsum rmad grags bde rgyas sgron// byin brlabs mchod rten brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bskor ba byas/ me tog gtir la/ de nas mchod pa rnams gzhung bzhin
234b1(rgyud 'grel): du bya/ de nas smon lam gdab ste/ bdag cag gi dge sbyor du bya ba ni/ sems dang mthun pa bskyed nas sna gzhi legs par bsnams nas chag chag btab pas/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems su mnyam par gyur cig/ rlangs bting

234b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhung bzhin bgyis pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la mos pa'i ting 'dzin gyis spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems la spyod pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi
