327a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon na tshe yi bum pa 'dzin// tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang // tshe dbang thams cad 'dir gsol cig/ sngags ni gtso bo mi bskyod pa'o// lho phyogs rin
327a2(rgyud 'grel): chen sems dpa' bzhi// btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// g.yon pas tshe yis bum pa 'dzin// tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang // tshe dbang thams cad 'dir gsol
327a3(rgyud 'grel): cig/ nub phyogs pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// phyag g.yas chu skyes 'dab lnga bsnams// g.yon pas tshe yi bum pa bsnams// tshe dang bdud rtsis bkad nas kyang // tshe dbang thams
327a4(rgyud 'grel): cad 'dir gsol cig/ byang phyogs 'phrin las sems dpa' bzhi// in+d+ra nI l+ya'i mdog 'dra ba// phyag giyas rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin// g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa bsnams// tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas
327a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // tshe dbang thams cad 'dir gsol cig/ de nas 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob pa yin snyam pa'i ngos shes bskyed do// des ni gsang ba sems dpa' bcu drug gi dbang bstan to// de nas de kho na nyid
327a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya ste/ rang dang slob ma'i snying kha'i hrIHdang dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs nas lha mo lcags kyu ma dkar mi gcig las bcu/ bcu las brgya la sogs pa mang po dpag tu med pa spros nas rang
327b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan thams cad kyi nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas khyad par du shar dri zu'i lag nas rang gi tshe nyams pa 'gribs pa zad pa rnams bkug nas slob ma la bstim pas nad gdon thams cad zhi nas
327b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe rgyas par bas mus la spyi thog tu bum pa bzhag nas// shar phyogs dkar mo zhi mdzad lha// dri za'i lug nas tshe khug la// nad dang gdon rnams zhi mdzad pa'i// dbang bskur dang
327b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir bdag la gsol// dzaHhUM bi hoHA pa ra mi ta A yur+N+Na na su bi ni swA hA// de nas rang dkyil 'khor gyi lho nas zhags pa ma ser mo spros la tshe dang ljongs spyod la sogs pa rgyas pa'i las byas
327b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug la bstim nas/ lho phyeg s+ya ser mo rgyas mdzad mu// gshin rje'i lag nas tshe khug la// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa yi// dbang bskur bdagAM la deng 'dir
327b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol// yang sa bon+da dang nu ba nas lcags sgrog ma nub tu smos chu lci'o lag nas tshe khug la// srid gsum dbang du byas par bsams nas/ nub phyogs dmar mo dbang gi lha// chu lha'i
327b6(rgyud 'grel): lag nas tshe khug la// srid gsum dbang du bsdus mdzad pa'i// dbang bskur dang 'dir bdag la gsol// yang sa bon dang byang phyogs nas dril bu ma mang po spros nas nad gdon tshar gtsad nas/
328a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi lag nas tshe bkug la bstims te// byang phyogs ljang khu drag po'i lha// gdon sbyin lag nas tshe khug la// nad gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa'i// dbang bskur
328a2(rgyud 'grel): deng 'dir bdag la gsol// des yum bzhi pho nya mor byas nas dbang bskur ba'o// de ltar dbang bzhi po de rnams bskur bas nyon mongs ngag 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub thob pa de'i ngang las bdag nyid go
328a3(rgyud 'grel): bo yab yum du bsam mo// de nas de nyid brtan par bya zhing dbang rtagasu rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bya ste/ de yang bum pa spyi bor bzhag ste gtso bo yab yum du bskyed/ de las 'od zer dmar po
328a4(rgyud 'grel): lus la thim pas 'dod chags dag nas so sor kun rtog chud la skyes nas 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan par bsams nas// 'dod chags rnam par dag nas ni// 'od dpag med pas dbu brgyan te//
328a5(rgyud 'grel): so sor kun rtog don rtogs nas// mdzes shing pad+ma'i lus thob shog/ oM hrIHbruM pad+ma ka ma la a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM// yang bum pa mi bskyod par bsams nas dpral bar bzhag 'od 'phros pas/ zhe
328a6(rgyud 'grel): sdang dag nas me long ye shes skyes te/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ zhe sdang rnam par dag nas ni// bcom ldan mi bskyod dbu brgyan te// me long ye shes don rtogs shing // 'gyur med
328b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i lus thob shog/ oM hU~M bruM badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ yang bum pa rna ba g.yas kyi steng du bzhag nas rin 'byung du bsdam/ de'i 'od kyis nga rgyal dag nas mnyam nyid ye shes rgyud la skyes
328b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ rin 'byung gis dbu brgyan par bsams nas// nga rgyal rnam par dag nas ni// rin 'byung ldan dbu brgyan pas// mnyam nyid ye shes don rtogs nas// bde chen lhun grub don rtogs shog/ oM
328b3(rgyud 'grel): sa buM rat+na kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM// yang lag par bum pa bzhag nas rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed/ de'i 'od kyis gti mug dag ste chos dbyings ye shes rgyud la skyes des dbu brgyan par bsams
328b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ gti mug rnam par dag nas ni// sangs rgyas rigs kyis dbu brgyan te/ chos dbyings ye sheso don rtogs nas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog/ oM bru~M bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM// yang
328b5(rgyud 'grel): rna ba g.yon par bum pa bzhag/ don yod grub par bskyed/ de'i 'od kyis phrag dog dag/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyes/ de dbu brgyan par bsams nas// phrag dog rnam par dag nas ni// don
328b6(rgyud 'grel): grub rigs kyis dbu brgyan te// bya grub ye shes don rtogs nas// ci bsams ma lus 'grub por shog/ oM a bAM ka la shau a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu m+l-i/ zhes rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ bkra shis
328a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs su bcad pa brjod cing me tog 'thor ro// bdag kho na mgon po che dpag med kho na bdag yin snyam pa'i nga rgyal brtan pos gnas par bya'o// de rnams kyis thun mongs ma yin pa khyad par gyi
328a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bstan no// de nas rjes gnang bshad par bya ste dang po gtso bo yab yum bstan nas 'di kho na ltar yid la byos shig byas la// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi// khams gsum na ni sdig myed do// de bas 'dod lo chags
328a3(rgyud 'grel): bral ba lta bu yi// khams gsum na ni sdig med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral byar// khyod kyis nam du 'ang ma byed cig/ ces brjod/ sngags kyi rjes gnang ni/ pad+ma'i phreng ba la gtso bo'i sngags bzlas sangs te/ bcom
328a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'di la sprul lags kyis// 'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes pas gsol ba godab bo// de nas slob mos phreng ba snying khar bzung ste/ bcom ldan bdag gis stsol lags kyis// bdag la 'gro bar mdzad
328a5(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ zhes gtso bo yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags lan lngar rjes zlos bya'o// de nas mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum du gus pas phul cig ces pa'i rjes su gnang bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig
328a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi dbang bsgyur bar bya ste/ de yang slob ma dang rdo rje hUM las rdo rje sems dpar bskyed de/ gzhan don bsam pas/ thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun
328b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ bcom ldan dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// zhes rdo rje lag phya gA ya swA su gtad de snying khar bzung nas thugs gnyis med pa'i ye shes rtogs par gyis
328b2(rgyud 'grel): shig pa'o// de nas dril bu snang ba mtha' yas gsung gi rang bzhin du bskyed nas// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis bdag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas// rang bzhin dge pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa'i
328b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni byed pa po// sgra thams cad chos kyi rang sgrar rtogs par gyis shog ba'o// de nas rang gi snying khar gtso bo yab yum bsams nas// yi dam gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir// dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu
328b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod// dam tshig 'di la rtag gnas pas// lha'i sbyor ba rab tu grags// zhes pa sna lha sku snang stong sgyu ma'i skur blta bar bya'o// de nas spyi dang bye brag gi dbang bshad por bya ste// dang po slob mo skyil krung
328b5(rgyud 'grel): du 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i bar du chos kyi 'khor lo lag po g.yasu dang / g.yon du glegs baM/ snying du gdugs phu ba la/ deng nos brtsams te soms skyed pa// tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// di ring phan
328b6(rgyud 'grel): chang 'jig rten la// skyob pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi dung ni bla na meng // kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis// som nyi yid gnyis ma za cig/ dog pa med pa'i sems kyis su// gsang sngags
329a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs// de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la// phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang // kun tu khyod la bsrung
329a2(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis zhes pa'o// de nas bye brag tu bskur ba ni// rang dang slob ma gnyis ka rnam snang du bskyed la rigs lnga'i sgo nas don bya snyam du bsams nas// 'jig rten kun la thams cad du// sems can kun la
329a3(rgyud 'grel): phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// zhes brjod la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis 'dul bya gti mug can gyis gdul bya don bya snyam du bsum mo// de bzhin
329a4(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje dang nor bu dad pad+ma dang // rgya gram pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor ba rnams la cho ga gong bzhin spel bar bya'o// de nas rjes kyi cho ga bstan par bya ste/ de yang lung bston pa ni/ khyod kyi phung po lnga
329a5(rgyud 'grel): khams lnga tshe dpag med yab yum yin pa'i bdag gis lung bstan gyis// deng 'dir ngas khyod lung bstan bya// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegaso// srid pa rang bzhin rnam dag pas// lha yi 'khor lo/
329a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o zhes brjod pa'o// de nas gzengs bstod pa ni// yi dam lha dang mnyam par ni// dus 'di nyid nas 'gyur ba ste// dga' zhing spro ba chen po yis// phyi rol mi bsams nang du'o// zhes brjod do//
329b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dbugs dbyung ba ni// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// slan chad 'chi ba yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mI sod pas// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// zhes brjod do// de rnams brtan pa'i ya
329b2(rgyud 'grel): lak+ka tu brtul zhugs kyi dpung sbyin pa ni// sbrang dang bdud rtsi bsres la// 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la slob ma la byin te/ 'di ni 'chi mad ye shes chu// gang gis reg dang 'thungs
329b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kun// thams cad da lta mngon du 'gyur// bgegs dang lag 'dren kun 'joms shing // gzhon gyis rdzi bar mi nus pa'i// mo shigs rdo rje pha lam 'gyur//
329b4(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub bde ba chen po'o// zhes ldan gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogasu pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du tshe dpag meng yab yum zhal sbyor du bsam/ de la ye shes pa
329b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhug sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs nas/ mchod pa dang bstod pa byas nas gsang sgrub ltar zlas pa byas/ rang yang gtso bo yab yum du bsams nas snyoms par 'jug pas byang sems
329b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar dam ra gsang gnas nas don/ yab yum rnams kyang snyoms 'jug byas nas gsang gnas byang sems dkar dmar na ra ra byung bar bsam/ de nas ka pA lar sbrang dang bu ram bdud rtsi
330a1(rgyud 'grel): bsres la/ der byung sems dkar dmar bstim pa dang ka pA la 'chi med ye shes kyi bdud rtsi byang sams dkar por mar gyis khengs par bsam mo// de nas maN+Dal stang
330a2(rgyud 'grel): du bla ma dang gtso bo yab yum gnyisu med pa'i gsang gnas nas sems kyi rgyun byung ste/ slob ma'i lce thog tu thim pas bde stong gi nyams rgyud la skyes pa dang / lus byang sems dmar pos khengs
330a3(rgyud 'grel): par bsams nas ka pA la'i bdud rtsi byin la// phyogs bcu rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi// gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yi// nga yi byang chub sems kyi rgyun// ngi ring khyod la bskur bar bya// zhes brjod/
330a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// shas rab ye shes kyi dbang ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogasu pad+ma 'dab ma brgyang phyogs tshon gyi steng du slob ma yab yum du bskyed/ de nas yum+b+ha gros dka re mo dang gnyisu med
330a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba byas byas/ yum gyi byang sems dmar pos rtsa gsum 'khor lo rims kyis ngomar mer gyis khengs par bsams la// gzhon nu yid 'ong bde ba'i mchog/ the tsom spangs nas
330a6(rgyud 'grel): brten por bya// brjod bral lhan cig skyes dga' ba// dus 'di nyid du mngon du 'gyur zhes dngos sam/ yid kyis brten par bya'o// de nas dbang bzhi pa byang du ras dkar po'i steng du bskur bar

330b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// /

331b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a pa ri mi tA yur+N+Na nA sA d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
331b2(rgyud 'grel): ba lnga phyag 'tshal lo// rigs drug sems can thams cad sbyi/ 'i tshe nyams pa la gso ba'i phyir// bcom ldan ye shes tshe dpag myod // sgrub thabs yang dag byeshad par bya// dang brtson dbang tho
331b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ldan// tshe nyams pa rnams gso 'dod pas// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas 'dug nas// bsod nams tshogs kyi sngon 'gro ni// bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnamaso// nA ma khar spyan drangs
331b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal nas// mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya// rang gi snying khar hrIHdmar la// ye shes me 'bar rnam smin sregs// sngags kyi don la stong nyid
331b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud+d+ho haM/ stong pa'i dang las sems nyid ni/ hrIHdra mar tsheg brag thig le las// dbang chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// spyan gsum khro gnyer ljags 'dril
331b6(rgyud 'grel): bsteng zhal rta mgo ljang khu la/ drag pos rta skad rab tu 'tsher// dbyug pa'i sdig mdzub me ltar 'bar// thugs kar pad+ma rgyas pa yi// steng du ba nyi ma la// hrIHlas 'od zer 'phros pa yis// e
332a1(rgyud 'grel): lus rgyas byung yang smra bya // mA las na ng+ga ra las sa/ dzA lA s+yA dang la gas sa// dz+wa las ra rab ldan pa dang // skang dubyu las gzhal yas khang // grwa zan spro ban rnababs
332a2(rgyud 'grel): brtan// 'dod yon pa gu dra phyed mdzes// khor yug chu skyes sna tshogs dang // rdo rje me ri thogs pa med// pho byang chu skyes 'phang rim gnyis// 'dab ma bzhi dang brkyang pa la// s+yA khyung pad+mas mdzes pa
332a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // lha snum pa na reg lnga dang ldan// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba las// a las chu shel dkyil 'khor dang // raM las rta bdun dag tu gyur// steng du pad+ma hI/ yis mtshan// de las 'od 'phros don gnyis
332a4(rgyud 'grel): byas// tshur 'dus hrIHla thim pa yi// lI khri lta bu'i thig le las// bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni// 'gying bcas 'od 'khrug skyil krung bzhugs// phyag gnyis pad+ma rA ga yis// bum pa 'chi med bdud rtsis
332a5(rgyud 'grel): gang / 'gro rnams re skong dpag bsam shing // bum pa'i kha rgyan thugs khar 'dzin// yum la 'khyud cing gnyisu med// paM las yum mchog gos dkor mo// li khri lta bur 'dzum zhing sgeg/ g.yas pa pad+ma
332a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa ni// bum pa yongs su 'dzin pa la// yab la gnyis med legs par 'khril// ngar dang nor bu du mas brgyan// chu skyes brkyang dang lha rnams la// pad+ma zla ba nyi ma'i gdan// mtshams bzhi'i sgo ba ni zla ba'i
332b1(rgyud 'grel): gragladan// shar du rdo rje hU~M gis brgyan// de las mi bskyod che dpag med// lho ru rin chen traM gis mtshan// rin chen rigs kyi tshe dpag med// nub tu 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan// rnam par snang mdzad tshe dpag med// byang du ral
332b2(rgyud 'grel): gri a yis mtshan// don yod grub pa che dpag mong // shwar lhor maM las mA ma ki/ lho nub taM las lha mo sgrol// nub byang laM las sangs rgyas spyan// byang shar tAM las dam tshig sgrol// rigs bzhi mnyam gzhas
332b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya las// shel dang bai TuR+Ya gser dang ni// in+d+ra nI la'i bum pa 'dzin// yum lnga g.yas pa rang rtags dang // g.yon pa bum pa 'dzin pa'o// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi// lho ru rin tshun sems
332b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bzhi// nub tu rnam snang sems dpa' bzhi// byang du las kyi sems dpa' bzhi// g.yas par rang rtags 'dzin pa las// g.yon pas tshe'i bum pa 'dzin// thams cad ngar dang nor bus brgyan// rdo rje dkyil
332b5(rgyud 'grel): krung bzhugs pa'o// mtshams bzhi la ni mchod pa yos// bdug spos mAr me me tog ma// dri chab ma dang lha mo bzhi// sna tshogs khyod kyis bskor ba'o// shar sgor dzaHlas lcags kyu dkar/ lho sgor hUM
332b6(rgyud 'grel): les zhags pa ser// nub sgor baM las lcags sgrogs dmar// byang sgor hrIHlas dril bu ljang // skor ba bzhi po de dag ni// 'khril ldem bzhengs nas bzhugs pa'o// de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis
333a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa// tshig 'dris spyan ni drung bar bya// gdong nas rang bzhin na mkha' lngar// thugs rje 'ja' tshon skur ston pa'i// bcom ldan gsung mchog tshe dpag med// rang
333a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas nas// ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir// 'gro ba'i don phyir spyan 'dren na// tshe zang tshe nyams gso ba'i phyir// 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol// rdo rje rin chen rnam
333a3(rgyud 'grel): snang dang // las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med// yum bzhi mchod pa'i lha mo dang // sems dpa'o bcu drug sgo mar bcas// rang bzhin bong chen dkyil 'khor na// ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/
333a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang ye shes rgyas pa dang // thugs mchog ye shes thob bya'i phyir// 'di nyid du ni spyan 'dren ni/ byin gyis rlob cing gshegs gsol// dzaHhUM baM ho/ sa dgug gzhug bya// sku gsung thugs ni byin
333a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur nas// rigaso bdago rnams kyis dbu brgyan tAM// mnyes par gyur la mchod pa dang // bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus pa bya// de nas bying rgod rab sbyangs nas/
333a6(rgyud 'grel): ma yangs lha rnams gsal stong sgom// de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni// lha rnams thugs kha'i bum pa ru// hrIHhUM traM bruM a las ni// rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// oM hrIHbru~M badz+ra dz+nyA na a
333b1(rgyud 'grel): yu Sh+ye swA hA/ oM hUM b+h+rUM badz+ra dz+nyA na A She swA hA/ oM swa b+h+rUM badz+ra dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ oM oM b+h+rUM badz+nyA dz+nyA na A yu She swA hA/ oM u b+h+rUM badz+ra dz+nyA nA U yu She swA hA/ de rnams yab kyi snying po'i sngags so// yum gyi bum par
333b2(rgyud 'grel): paM mo trai l-i tAM rnams li sngags kyis bskor/ oM b+h+yAM a pa ra myi ta A yuMr+d+ha nA su bi ni sh+tsi taM ta dzi ru dz+nyA ya/ yum mchog lnga'i snying po'o// phyogs bzhi sems dpa' bdu drug la// rang gi sa bon rnams
333b3(rgyud 'grel): la ni// gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskor b.rA bsams// dzaHhU~M baM hoHa pa ra mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni swA hA/ sgo ma bzhi'i snying po'i sngagaso// de ltar bum pa'i sngags rnams la// dmigs te sngags bzlas
333b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// yig 'bru rnams la bdud rtsi'i chu// babs pas bum pa gang bar bsam// bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis// lus ngag yid gsum nang gdon dang // sdigs
333b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob// 'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam// de nas rang gis sngags bzlas pas// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyi// rang rang gsang sngags bzlas par bsgom// snying khe'i
333b6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon 'od zer las// lha mo dgar mo lcags kyu thogs// bsam gyis mi khyab shar du 'phros// nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas te// dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug nas// bdag bskyong lha dang bum par bstim/
334a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lho yis zhugs pa mos// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas byas nas// gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug ste// gong bzhin du ni bstim par bya// nub kyi lcag sgrog dmar mo yis//
334a2(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te// chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug ste// bsti mo zhing klu gdon dag par bsam// byang gi dril bu dgyes mdzad mas// nang gdon log 'dren tshar bcad nas// gnod sbyin lag
334a3(rgyud 'grel): nas tshe bkug nas// gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim// 'chi med tshe sgrub bshad pa ni// rnam rgyal lasau bum pa gnyis po la// rdzas dang khwa rgyan mgul chings bcas// phyag mtshan bris la
334a4(rgyud 'grel): gdags par bya/ maN+Dal steng du legs par bzhag/ phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pA li// nang du gzhal ya so khang du bsgom// gsang sngags rgyal po'i drizlas pa bya// grong bzhin bdud rtsis bum pa gang /
334a5(rgyud 'grel): de yis rang gzhan thams cad kyis// nad gdon sdig sgrib ma lus dag/ 'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam// las bum rta mgrin gong bzhin bskyed// thugs kha'i sa bon sna gas kyis bskor//
334a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ de yis rang gzhan bar chang bsrung // 'chi med bdud rtsi'i khrus bya'o// de ltar rang don gzhan don la// ma yengs bskyed rim gsal ba yis// ting 'dzin gcig tu
334b1(rgyud 'grel): smyug sa bzlus na// rmugs rdzogs na drag sbrul mdzong 'gyur// denas rgyun du nyam sa sa/ tar skad kyis ma tsun par// bdag nyid gzhan+d+ra dang dag mA 'das// mdun dun smras stong dang zlus/
334b2(rgyud 'grel): hU~M yab snru gastsal bar bsgom/ oM U m+b+ha Shes ra~M h+na rmAs/ gsol ba byu ba la mchod brjod rgyu/ dru pa dgul dmi gus nas ni/ byung 'di
334b3(rgyud 'grel): ma b+h+rUM ye san/ gsung sngags kau shAn+ya gcig bzlas// de yis bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung nas/ rang gi hU~M gtsug na pa yis// nad gdon lngahU~M sgrub thams cad dag/ 'du
334b4(rgyud 'grel): rang lus grang ba yisa'achi myed 'i hU~M zlang thob/ tshe ga myed par gyur pa rnyibs // sbyin pa'i yan lag mas so// sangs ts+tshe b+hu dang / de mi
334b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyuraro// tshe nyams la sog sa smos kyi das s+ho// gsang nas sgrub pa rab tu bsngags/ dkyil 'khor long dang 'dra ba la// lha tshogs thams li khri ltar// hUM rdzogs na na n+ya D+yan gyis mdzes//
334b6(rgyud 'grel): dzus pa thod par bcas pa 'dzim// rdo rje kyil phreng bzhugs pa'o// ban+de drug yin pa sgra brgyas// lA m+b+ha nu ma 'ju ba la/ kyi rin can dang // la mo sna tshogs rdo rje to// gams
335a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin// g.yon pa zod pa bdud rtsis gang // yab la sgrib cing gnyi su 'khril/ thabs dang shes rab gnyisu med// yab yum 'od zer tshogs
335a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug cing // snyoms 'jug zag myong bde ba rgyas// mtshams bzhir byAdang rtsi'i bum pa bzhi// phyogs kyi lha'i cho ga snam bu lA// shar du rdo rje khro bo dang // lho ru rin chen khro bo dang // nub tu pad+ma'i
335a3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo dang // byang du phrin las khro bo dang // steng 'og rnam snang khro bo gnyis// phyogs bzhir khro bo gnyis gnyis ni// rigs kyi yum dang bcas pa la// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang
335a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs pa'o// thams cad g.yas pa rang rtags 'dzin// g.yon pa tshe yi bum po dang / sbrul dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan// me ri 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// lha mo bzhi dang sgo ba
335a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// bzhengs pa khro bo'i tshul du gnas// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs// ye shes spyan drang gnyis med bstim// dbang bskur rigs kyis dbu brgyan pa// gtso bo lnga dang khro bo bcu'i// bum
335a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag la dmigs nas ni// gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas par bya// oM hrIHhUM/ swa b+h+yAM a/ dzaHhUM baM hoHa pa ri mi ta A sur+N+Na na ma hA si d+hI ha sa ni ri ti swA hA// de nas rang nyid bzlas pa bya// bum pa legs
335b1(rgyud 'grel): pabapar bcas pA la// lha rnams gong bzhin bskyed pa dang // rang dang lha rnams sngags bzlas bzlas pas// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa gang // rjesu lha rnams zhu ba'i chu sa// rang bzhin thams cad khrus bya'o// de yisu mchog
335b2(rgyud 'grel): dang thun mong gi/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'i gtor ma 'di// snying po sngags kyis 'bul bar bya// las bzhi'i sbyin bsreg bya bI dang // longs spyod sbrel phyir thod pa mu chod// de nas de kho na nyid
335b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub// rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yi// gsang gnas chos 'byung glu gsum du// hrIHdang paM las me 'brar bas// lus kyi nod rnams thang khe so// spyi bo'i hU~M brgyad zhu ba laso// bde tshon bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab// rtsa gsum
335b4(rgyud 'grel): gang bas bde ba rgyas// drod dang bde ba'i khyad par rnams// sted 'od rlung gis mnan zhes bya// rta bdun ri bo rgyas 'dra nas// mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob// bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// tshe dpag med pa'i
335b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs// rtsa rgyud la'u 'bum pa dang // bshang rgyad 'od zer dra be las// brten nas grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad// 'chi med tshe sgrub 'di brtsams pas// bdag dang rigs drug sems can rnams// 'chi bag med dngos
335b6(rgyud 'grel): grub thob gyur nas// tshe dpag med pa thob par shog/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang // bod kyi lots+tsha ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o// /
336a1(rgyud 'grel): tsha dpag med kyi dkyil chog rgya gzhung bzhug s+ho//
336b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a pa ra mi tA yur+d+ha na maN+Da la b+hi ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la
336b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// rang bzhin tshe dpag med pa'i sku// ye shaM sa lnga ldan gsung gi bdag/ thugs rje'i thugs kyis rjes 'dzin pa'i// bla ma tshe dpag med la 'dud// rtswa rgyud bshang rgyud las byung ba'i// cho ga
336b3(rgyud 'grel): bo zang pos yongs bzung bshad// slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing // gzhan phan sgrub pa'i blo gros can// rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir// yid 'od nyams dga'i gnas nyid du// lha'i rnal 'byor gsal
336b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khro// rab 'bring mtshan ma thob pa dang // slob mas me tog dang bcas pas// gus pas gsol po gdab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// sa gzhi brtan cing
336b5(rgyud 'grel): bzung dang sbyang // nyes pa med pa'i sa phyogs der// bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas nas// paM lus bskyed pa'i lha mo ser// mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan ldan lus phyed snang // bum pa 'dzin la mchodo cing bstod// skyob pa
336b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyong ba'i tshul dang khyang por gyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// slob pa shAkya seng ge yos// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom lta ba/ de bzhin bdag gis bdud ste
337a1(rgyud 'grel): las// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// lag bya sa la bstan pa yis// dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yis// dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yis// khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyis//
337a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor las ni rab bsgrubs pa// brjod nas sa lA thim pa k+ShA prA/ phyogs skyong gi tor ma 'bul ba dang // mthun pa'i grogs dang gsol ba gdab// ro bsngal nyes pa sbyangs ba de// 'bras byur bcug cing rnam
337a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni khyab par byug/ me yis zhi ba'i las kun gyi// sbyin sreg sbyangs dang sngags kyis ni// byin brlabs lha'i khad par bsam// bskyad pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas// slob dpon dkyil
337a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sbrang du 'dug la// slob ma gus pas spos thogs te// mchod cing ba stong dang gsol ba gdab// bcom ljon mgon po che dpag myed // skyon gyis mo gostA li khI ltar// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sgra mngar ba/
337a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid sku l-I phyag 'tshal bskyod // dkyil 'khor lha tshegs thams cad nI// yon tan mya lus bskyeng mdzad cing // yid bzhin nor bu ma tshungs ldan pa'i// 'gro bya skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe dpa
337a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa gsung gi bdag/ 'chi bdag ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i// tshe yi dngos grub gsol ba'i sku// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor bsdus
337b1(rgyud 'grel): te rta mchog sku// khro zhing rab brjid nga rgyal dang // rgung pa hUM lus rdo rjer byas// mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste// rdo rje dril ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'jigs myed byang shar mtshams song nas// dkyil
337b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sa gzhi la gnas pa'i// lha dang lnga min bgegs tshogs nyin// nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// nga yi bka' las me 'da' bar// bgegs kyi tsho gos rnams 'gro bar kyis// gal te mi 'gro
337b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug gyur na// ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis// mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shring // lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni// rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za// de bAs khyod rnams gzhan du dengs// rta
337b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog sngags dang rdo rje 'gros// dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya// de nas khro bo'i phur pa rnams// kI lA ya zhes btub nas kyang // saM kro Ta yes brdung bar bya// me d+hi sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// sa yi
337b5(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha tshogs rnams// sta gon gnas par bya ba ni// lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang // mchod cing bstod nge spos thogs la// bcom ldan mgon po tsho dpag med// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams
337b6(rgyud 'grel): cad dang / rigs pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// khyed rnams le yang mchod pa dang // slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir/
338a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can bdagu che gre zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol// rjesu brtse bar nyer dgongs nas// sang nub dgyes par 'byon par 'tshal// de nas phyi nang mchod pas
338a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod// dkyil 'khor lhag par gnas pa'o// rin chen rgyu las byung ba yis// lho chen mgrin pA ring ba dang // mchu 'phyang nag po ra ring ba dang // mchu 'phyang nag por ri myed// lha grangs mnyam pa las
338a3(rgyud 'grel): bum dang // rang rang phyag mtshan rdzogs par bya// ha swa de ba gser dngul dang // mu tig mu men byi ru gzhug/ nas til gro sran mud ka dang // ga pur dze ti gur gum mchog/ tsan dan+de gnyis dang a kla
338a4(rgyud 'grel): ru/ mar dang bu ramo sbrang rtsi dang // lan tsho rnams kyis lto ba dgang // kha tshar ma nyams ras zungs kyis// mgrin par rab tu brgyan pa dang // kha rgyan ku sha 'bras bu can// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyi
338a5(rgyud 'grel): steng // yang na ku sha'i gdan la bzhugs// b+h+rUM las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang // chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan stengasu// lha rnams rdzogs pa'i bskyed pa dang // sngags bzlas ye shes bdud rtsi rgyun// bum pa
338a6(rgyud 'grel): gang bar bsam pa dang // lha rnams rang rang bstod pa bya// las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa dang // sngags bzlas bar chad bsrung bar dang // sha lnga bdud rtsi'i gtor mas mchod// 'dod pa'i don la
338b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gung ba// slo'u ma lhag par gnas pa yang // snyim pa me tog dang bcas bya// skye rgas na 'chi na kwa yI// chu sbyin la sogs 'jigs rung ba// sred pa'i mtsho las bdag sgrol mdzod//
338b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen por tshul bstan pa'i// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshulo// dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang
338b3(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum de ni bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// 'od kyis bur byas sdig pa sbyangs// bu tshur theg pa chen po pa//
338b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// gsung sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// sku gsung thugs kyis rdo rje can// sangs rgyas dus gsum 'byung ba rnams// rdo rje gsang sngags
338b5(rgyud 'grel): rob bsgom pus// ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// dpung tshon dag kyang de yis bcom// de bas kun khyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas
338b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon gyis// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs kun// sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bya// tshe dpag med pA bdag la dgongs// ma lus bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs rnams// 'di nyid nas gzungs
339a1(rgyud 'grel): sa brgyad par// bla med bdag la gzigs par mdzod// dam tshig sdom pa bzung ba ni// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/
339a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bya// rdo rje rigs mchogra chen po la// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang drag nyid du bzung bar bya// slob dpon dag kyang bzung
339a3(rgyud 'grel): bAr bgyi// rin tshon rigs mchog chen po yis// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du lan+da drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub tshon po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i
339a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs chen dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang bzung bar bya// laMs skye rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// srung dag nyid du
339a5(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bgyi// mchod po'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byeng tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por
339a6(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bgyi// gnyisu med pa'i tshangs spyod dang // rang gi dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi// bdag gi dge ba'i las kyis ni// sangs rgyas myur du bsgrub bya ste// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
339b1(rgyud 'grel): lhaltasna// bla med kan su sgul bar bgyi// gus pas lan gsum brjod par bya// yul khA mgrin pa snying khu ru// dwi'i thig le gsum byas te// rta bdun chu skyes 'khor lo'i ste// thugs gsung skra
339b2(rgyud 'grel): yi snying pos brgyan// rigs kyi lha las 'od 'phyos pa// ye shes gnyisu med par bstim// chu gnyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod// dong nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis// 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos
339b3(rgyud 'grel): par// mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni// bu yis gros 'di gyis shig/ a shAt+tha dang pa la shaM/ u duM wA ra la sogs pa// bcu gnyis sor gyi tshad tsamoM la// rtse mor me tog gis brgyan nas//
339b4(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal 'dab brgyad rnam lngas byug/ shar bltas dbus su dor ba ni// pad+ma'i phyag dang bcas pa// steng du mitshig gi dngos grub yin// phyogasu phrin las grub pa dang // thur bltas sa 'og 'grub pa
339b5(rgyud 'grel): yin// mtsham su 'dzin te dngos grub po// da nas skyor chu sbyin pa ni// au hrIHbri shud+d+ha d+harma sarba pA pau tsAr+ya bi sho d+ha yA bi kal+la a pa na yaM hU~M/ zhes pas sgo gsum dag sbyangs nas// skud pa dmar po
339b6(rgyud 'grel): sum sgril la// rta mgrin sngags kyis bcing bar bya// ku shaM gtsang ma sngas dang stan// ma nor seng ge'i nyal spangs bzhin// thub pas ting 'dzin 'grub pa ltar// mtshan ma gang byung brjod pas
340a1(rgyud 'grel): byad/ bzang na dngos grub spro ba bskyed// ngan na sbyin bsreg gis ni bzlog/ zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad ni/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/ u dum wA ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam
340a2(rgyud 'grel): na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung ngam yang na mi 'byung srid// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// bla mu rdo rje can mchod la// nang par langs te dkyil 'khor la// na mkhar
340a3(rgyud 'grel): bteg te thig gdab ste// bu mo gtsang ma sdom ldan gyis// ras bral las byung bkal po dang // ye shes lnga 'am sku gsung thugs// oM a n+yo nA nu ga ta sarba d+harmA brjod nas bsgril bar bya ba ni// pad+ma snod du
340a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhug nas kyang // mi 'chi lnga yis spangs byas la// blo ldan ye shes pa stim byas nas// na mkhar ye shes ji dzes gang gi/ sgo yi bcu gnyis cha dang ldan// srid kyang khang pa nyes 'gyur la// chings pa'i
340a5(rgyud 'grel): las thig drangs pa la// oM badz+ra sU tra sa mo sa ma ti kra ma hUM/ tshangs dang zur thig la sogs pa// bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des// cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye// gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni//
340a6(rgyud 'grel): chang na zla ma'i srog po zhing // dmin lhag nad kyis btab par 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul slob ma rmongs par 'gyur// blo ldan nyis pa med par bya// gru bzhi sgo bo ni rta babs bcas// dra ba dra ba phyed
340b1(rgyud 'grel): bas brgyan// nyi zla dri lta bu g.yer khas spras// pho brang chu skyes rim pa gnyis// mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng ba dang // khyams dang phyi rol pad ra dang // rdo rje ma ri la sogs pa// rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bya// rin chen lnga dang
340b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru phyed 'am// pad+ma'i snod du so sor bzhag/ sra bon bris lnga ye shes bstim// sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab// sngon po ser po dkar po ljang // dmar po 'di ni nang du 'dod// g.yas bskor rgyun ma chad per
340b3(rgyud 'grel): bri// dbang ldan mtshams su drang ba bya// pad+ma'i snod kyis steng nas bkub// 'di ni chos dbyings drag po ste// sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// tshon gyi las ni yang dag
340b4(rgyud 'grel): brtsam// me tog dor la mtshan ma brtag/ shar sngo lho ser nub dkar po// byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ pad+ma lha snam dmar po'o// de lhor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// khrus byas dri zhim lus byug nas//
340b5(rgyud 'grel): gos bzang brgyan la lan gsum bskor// tshe dpag med bya'i nga rgyal gyis// shar gyi sgo nis nang du zhugs// yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam// oM badz+ra mur+b+ba Ta/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ nam rgyal la sogs
340b6(rgyud 'grel): bum pa rnams// gnas dang go rim bzhin du dgod// sna tshogs gos dang rgyan phreng sogs// mchod pa'i rdzas kyis legs par brgyan// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed// ye shes bsgom la mchod
341a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod bya// tshogs kyi 'khor los tshim pa dang // bar chang zhi phyir shar phyogs su// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang / slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar// slob dpon bdag nyid dbang dang
341a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ shar gyi phyogs nas 'jog pa dang // de nus slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir// khrus byas bgogs dang sdig pa spyang // gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni// bu khyod su yin ci la dga'// bdug ni
341a3(rgyud 'grel): bskal bzang rigs yin no// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi// gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yis// lha rnams la yang phyag 'tsholo// thar pa chen po'i grong
341a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// tshe dpag med pa'i grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru
341a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// oM a khaM bI ra hUM/ me tog phreng ba gtang pa dang // dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal te/ oM na mya te hUM/ oM na mo mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ shar nas
341a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas lho nus dbang // nub nas chos bshang byas nas ni// phrin las sgrub pa la sogs pa'i// don du gsol pa gdab pa ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rmA dzo pa thA na yA ti ma no// ni r+yA
341b1(rgyud 'grel): mIHsarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA b+hi she ka trad+hA nAM nIr+ya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+nA bi Shiny+tsA maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra ba ra d+ha na yAd+hA n+ti nin+ya tA yA
341b2(rgyud 'grel): miD+hesarba tA thAM ga tra badz+ra d+har+m+ma pra waMr+N+Na yA naM/ sArba ta thI ga pU dzaM kAr+m+ma naM/ ang+ganAM nar+yA tA ye mI/ sarba ta thA gA ta badz+ra karmA ku ruM maM// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin pa dang // rnal 'ab+h+r-ir du ni sam+ba
341b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed do// oM sarba yo ga tsi tot+sA ta yi mi/ rdo rje snying khar bzhag// oM su ra te sa ma ya ste/ sid+d+hi badz+ra ya tha su khaM/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cang+ga dang / tshe dpag med kyi dngos grub
341b4(rgyud 'grel): thog// dngos grub gzhan lha ci smros// dkyil 'khor ma zhugs mi sla'o// dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re// 'di ni dom tshig rdo rje ste// gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na// dam tshig chen
341b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i rdo rje yis// rang gi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur// tshe dpag med pa dang khyod kyi// snying la de ring yang dag zhugs// gal te tshul 'di smras nu ni// dau mu thag tu dral te gshegs// 'di ni
341b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshigs bsrungs na dngos grub rnams// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// badz+re tha ka oM AHhUM/ de nas brtsams nas bu
342a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi// tshe dpag med pa nga yin gyis// khyod kyis nga la brnyas pa dang // mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas// dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re// de nas slob ma'i gtso bo yi
342a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// byadag lnga byin+da gyis rlobs mdzod la// tshe dbyug med pa dbab par mdzod// rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor dz+haiM// snying khur l-I las sa'i dkyil
342a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor// mgrin par baM lngas chu'i dkyil 'khor// spyi bo yAM las rlung dang haM// de'i spyi bor tshe dpag med// yab yum 'od kyi rang bzhi ni ni// gar byed sku lus ye shes kyi// bdud rtsi sa
342a4(rgyud 'grel): nas sku la thim// zug med bde bas gang byar sgom// oM hrIHb+h+yAM badz+ri dz+nyA na A yu she ya be sha ya a b+he sha ya a/ s+t+waM b+ha ya/ ra ra rA tsa le hUM o hAHdz+nye zhes brjod rol mo'i sgra dang ni/
342a5(rgyud 'grel): gru gul zla mtshan thod pa ru// dur khrod sol ba'i me yis bsreng// bab gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// AHlas gsung gi bdud rtsi bsam// b+h+rUM hrIHbadz+ra dge dang la sogs pa// smos
342a6(rgyud 'grel): shig rdo rje can gyi rigs// tiSh+Tha badz+ra brtan par bya'o// tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rigs pa'i me tog 'di dor bas// sngon tshe ye shes mnyes pa'i lha// gang yin de la 'bab par
342b1(rgyud 'grel): shog/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoHbye brag dang dngos grub brtan par bya// pra ti grId+d+ha sa mi myaM satwa mahA ba la// slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya// tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi// mig 'byed par ni brtson par
342b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// oM badz+ra nai tA ya ha ra ba ta li hrIHdkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni tshe
342b3(rgyud 'grel): dpag med du bskyed// sngags dang phyag rgya sa byin gyis brlab// 'gro don phun tshogs dngos grub kyang // thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur// dngos grub thob cing dam tshig srungs// gsang
342b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags la yang brtson par gyis// rim gyis rnam par dag pa bstan// de nas slob ma dang ldan des// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// yon mchog dam pa 'bul ba dang // dbang bskur don du gsol
342b5(rgyud 'grel): gad dra// bcom ldan mgon po che dpag med// yab yum gnyis med bde chen sku// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis// dbang bskur ba ni bdug la gsol// lan gsum brjod nas shar phyogs su// pad+ma 'dab
342b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad khri la 'dug/ rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas// chu rnams dung chos bum pa ra bsdus// rdo rje'i glu de nga rol mo'i sgra// rigs lnga rig ma'i lha mo dang // byang chub sems dpa' bgro shis brjod// khro bo rnams
343a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bgegs bsrung ngo // gsung gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i// ye shes bdud rtsi'i dri ma med// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// mi bskyod rdo rje dbang bskuro//
343a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+rA d+h+ri tiSh+Tha dzA d+hU b+h+rUM Shiny+tsa hUM/ gser lnga sogs pa'i dbu rgyun la// rin 'byung ba skyed cing ye shes bsgrim// dang byungs bangs la cho ga 'di brjod// thor tshugs cod byin gyis ba rgyun pa/
343a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags pa'i// rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang // dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin paro bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na mu ku TA b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// rIn tshan la sogs
343a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lnga// snang ba mtha' yas bskyed cing bstim// sangs rgyas kun gyis rdo rje'i dbang // da ring khyed la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis zung // oM
343a5(rgyud 'grel): bad+d+ha d+hi ba ti s+t+waM// A b+hi Shiny+tsa maM dril bu don grub bskyed byas la// ye shes bstim la tshig 'di brjod// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// 'gro don mnyam med byed pa yi// mchod pa'i phrin
343a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byed pa'i// dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro// oM a d+hi pa ta ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// slob me oM las rnam snang bskyed// ye shes spyan drangs gnyisu med// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur
343b1(rgyud 'grel): byas// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// cis kyang gzhom par mi nus pa'i// rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags// oM sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She ka ta maM// chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang //
343b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa yi ni dbang lnga'o// nyon mongs lnga ni rnam dag pas// dbang bskur lnga ni thob pa yin// ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang // ye shes lnga ni rims kyis thob// de nas spyi bo mgrin pa dang //
343b3(rgyud 'grel): snying kha lte ba gsang gnas rnams// 'khor lo lnga yis gnas nyid du// rigs lnga tshe dpag med rnams kyis// dbang bskur lha rnams yab yum ste// 'chi med byang chub sems su gyur// rtsa gsu
343b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lnga rnams gang // byang chub sems kyi dbang bskuro// 'chi med rdo rje'i lus su gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na 'dug
343b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // rdo rje sems dpa'i byartul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta b+hA gi dA sid+d+hi badz+rI sa ma ya tiSh+NI Sha twAM d+hA ra yA mi badz+ra satwA hi hi hUM hUM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni//
343b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po 'i bdag/ dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab
344a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshung // khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos bral byas// rang
344a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni// mchog gi sred pa byed par 'gyur// mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don// gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas// phyir mi ldog pa dbang bskur che// dpa' bo chen po
344a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gsol// shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug/ steng du gradugs dkar phyub nas kyang // rnam rgya lta bum pas dpung bskur te// dbang poskur rdo rje chen po la// khams gsum pa yis phyag byas te/

344a6(rgyud 'grel): la nye bor mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin logs kyis// 'di la 'pho bar mdzad du gsol// 'jig rten khams ni ma ltas drang ba'i phyir// chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis// ji ltar
344b1(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya sna tshogs lnga// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba// khyod kyi phrin las mchog yin no// deng nas gzung nas bu khyod kyi// hU~M rgyal dbang dang bsad pa dang //
344b2(rgyud 'grel): dgug dang bcing dang bsreg pa dang // bsrung dang dbye ba la sogs pa// phrin las sna tshogs grub par gyis// ral gri mug sman sa 'og dang // mchil lham de bzhin r-i lu skye// mi snang bcud len mkha' la spyod//

345a2(rgyud 'grel): bar chad snyoms 'jug gis// sgrub dang bslab pa'i sbyor ba yis// mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur// ltos cig ltos ci ga sems la ltos// sems nyid cir yang grub pa med// gsal gzhag

350a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa slob dpon dzA ba ra bas mdzad pa bzhug so//
350b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyug sa nga / Ar+ya nI lAm+bA rAs pa lA pa na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya da kyi 'a
350b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bcom ldanas 'das 'ju e rje la phyog 'tshal/ mdam dadar med kho chags skur snang ba// gdus pa'i ngag rnams 'joms paro mdzad pa yi// thugs
350b3(rgyud 'grel): rje can la rag btang ngo / dang ngos skye ba yi/ 'dar pa/ thangs dang shes rang gnyis med pa'i/ mi 'gyur dbyer ma rtags kyis mtshan// drag po
350b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum khyod yongs pajoms// nyan shes bya la sol rtogs bral na pa da/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam par 'joms
350b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi sde dang / lhan cig tu 'om min gzhon 'phrul da brang na thabs cig bla ma zhugs te/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me
350b6(rgyud 'grel): mjed kyis lung ston pa bstan pa mdzad nas/ gdul bya 'dul bar mdzad pa na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad de/ 'od bye ba dpag tu med pa khyab par mdzad
351a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ ngan song gsum stong bAr mdzad de/ g.yo ba dang / 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa ston pa mdzad nas/ rdo rje gdun byang chub kyi snying po de nyid du bzhug so// de nas bdud dga'
351a2(rgyud 'grel): rab dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa ting 'dzin gyi mthus de nyid du lhags nas bAr du bcad par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'di smras te/ sems can yongs smon ma byas// pha rol yin dag rdzogs ma byas// spyod
351a3(rgyud 'grel): pa de gnyis rdzogs byas na// de med phyir na mi rigs so zhes smras so// de'i bsam pa phyin ci log bzlog par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis phig g.yos pa sa la brdebs pas sku gzhi thoms cad
351a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yos khrugs nas/ bcom ldan 'jos kyi mdun de nyid du si'i lha mo gser btso mu lta bu thon te/ zon pa tsam gyis bdud bred bzhin du 'dug pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo de
351a5(rgyud 'grel): la bsgo ba mdzad nas de sa'i steng nas rdul phra mo blangs te/ sangs rgyas par rigaso zhes smras pas bdud 'khrugs nas na mkha'i la sang ngo // pa nas da de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu'i bdud
351a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / sa 'og na gnas pa'i klu dang / sa sbyong na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la sogs pa bdud kyi 'khor thams cad bsdus paras bcom ldan 'das la bdud 'khor dang bcas
351b1(rgyud 'grel): bas mtshon rnam pa du ma dang // 'brug dang thog dang / lcags kyi ser ba drag po dbab pa dang / gcan zan gdug pa bzhin khros pa nad pa dang / ri dang brag thogs pa med par 'phangs pa de thams
351b2(rgyud 'grel): cad zhi bar mdzad de/ gang gis kyang mthong bar ma gyur to// de nas na mkha'i dkyil de nyid du dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku phyag na
351b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu g.yo ba dang 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa la sogs pa byung ste/ bdud de rnams ci byang snyom pa'i bsam pas phyogs su
351b4(rgyud 'grel): lte ba ni bred cing sdug bsngal ba'i bsam paso// de nas na mkha' la bltas te/ mthong bar gyur nas snying 'gas pa'i tshul gyis sa la 'gyel bar gyur te/ sa dang po'i bsam pa dang ldan par
351b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'thon te/ bcom ldan 'das de la bskor byas nas/ byang chub sems
351b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i phyag gis/ bdud de rnams la reg ma thag tu dran pa rnyed par gyur te/ snying rje'i bsam pa rgyud la skyes nas/ na mkha'i khro bo chen po yang mthong bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje
352a1(rgyud 'grel): la myur ba'i tshul gyis skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshig brjod pa ni/ gtso bo bdag cag rnams la bsgrub tu gsol/ 'jigs pa chen po 'di las bsgrub du gsol zhes smras bya dang / phyag na
352a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes de nyid la song zhes pa'i lan brjod nas skyab su stong // de nas dus de'i dus su zhu ba phyag na rdo rje bdag gis thos/ dus gcig na thos pa'o// 'o na gang los thos she na/ bcom ldan 'das
352a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i be co ma ldan 'das la'o// gnas gang du zhe na/ 'dod pa khams kyi rtse mo/ gzugs kyi khams kyi me tha ste/
352a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su'o// 'khor gang dang ldan zhe na/ sa bla sa sleb sa 'og gi gdug pa can rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso// 'o na rgyu cis de rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs
352a5(rgyud 'grel): she na/ 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa gi ga klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa'i rjes la/ ma 'ongs par lung
352a6(rgyud 'grel): ston par mdzad de/ khyod bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes pa bi mi mjed du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas/ gdug pa can rnam po 'di gsum thul cig ces gnang ba byin pas na/ gnod sbyin
352b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi sde dpon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa dang // bdud kyi sde dpon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa/ klu'i sde dpon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyisu med pa'i phyag na
352b2(rgyud 'grel): rje'adra ting nge 'dzin la zhugs bya'o// de'i phyir dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'das pa byin gyis brlabs pa/ da ltar byung bas byin gyis rlob pa/ ma 'ongs pas rlob par 'gyur ba 'di la gaM na rdo rjes
352b3(rgyud 'grel): zung cig ces bka' stsal pa'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul nas// phyag ni rdo rjes gsol pa// zhes bya ba ni gus po'i tshul gyis bstod pa'o// gnod sbyin stong phrag bye ba dpag tu mad
352b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mtshe ba gtsigs pa drang 'tshem pa zhes bya ba ni mche ba nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa gcod pa ste/ mtshams ni g.yo ba'o//
352b5(rgyud 'grel): yang na gdugs pa can la'o// de'i don ni sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis rtsa nga nus gcod cing thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la bskyod pa'o// mig me mngag gi phung po 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni/ mig gyi shes rab//
352b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba ni tshogs pa'o// yang na gdug pa ca ni bsreg par byed pa'i spyan no// de'i don ni mi rig pa 'joms pa'o// shes rab me mngag gi phung po 'dra ba ni ye shes chen po rang 'bar ba'o// dbugs
353a1(rgyud 'grel): ni thugs rje'o// me lce ni smin par byed pa ste/ gzhan smin par byed pa'o// yang na 'jigs pa'i nga ro ni hU~M ngo // sgra ni phyir sgrogs pa ste/ dbugs phyir 'phros pa'o//
353a2(rgyud 'grel): de ni me lce bzhin 'bar zhing gdug can sreg par mdzad pa'o// de'i don ni dbugs ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ye shes so// me ltar 'bar ba ni gsal ba'o// 'jigs pa ni 'jigs pas thams
353a3(rgyud 'grel): cad do// nga ro can ni dbugs 'byin pa ste// 'jigs pa las thar par byed pa'o// de bas na 'dod chags kyi dbugs 'byin pa la de skad bya'o// 'o na 'bras bu ci zhe na/ smin ma khro gnyer bsdus pa zhes
353a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ste/ sku gsum gyi 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang ldan pa ste/ rnam par dag cing sku gsum gyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa la bstod pa'o// pod+ma dang chu lhas lag pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni sprul
353a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar pos so// nor rgyas dang dung skyong gi so dbu la brgyan zhes bya ba ni cod pan byas pa'o// sbrulnga byin po che 'bar bcod pan thogs pa ni sbrul dri bzhi lce rna ba'i steng ni rin po che 'bar pa'i 'od dang bcas
353a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yod pa'o// de yang cod pan byos pa'i nor bu ni yod bzhin gyi nor bu 'barau ba'o// gzhan gyi nor bu ni thon ka dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra ni la'o// klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas snyan
353b1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa zhes bya ba ni sbrul dmar po gnyis so// 'bar ba ni spyi gtsug na pad+ma rA ga 'bar ba'o// rkang pas sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba mnan cing za ba/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzungs ska ragasu bcing shing /
353b2(rgyud 'grel): klo nag po ser l-i khar zo gas pa zhes bya ba ni stobs kyi rgyu dang / rigs ldan gnyis nag po khar gtsug nas se ral khar drangs pa ste// kha nas dug nag po'i 'phro ba/ spyi bo na in+d+ra nI la'i nor bu ljang
353b3(rgyud 'grel): nag 'bar ba'o// des ni zhe sdang can 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// bzhin rgyas pa ya sos ma mchu mnan pa zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab dbyar med pa 'am/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyisu med pa
353b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rgyas pas ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rgyas pa'o// de'i 'od ni 'dod chags can 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o// gshin rje'i cha byad ni sgo tsha ba dang / shin tu khros pa'o// da
353b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni byin ci log la zhugs pa la khros shing ljags 'khyug pa dang / gsus pa 'khyil zhing sbrul za bar sbyin pa'o// de'i don ni gshin rje ni phyin ci log gi gang zag la bya la/
353b6(rgyud 'grel): de la shes rab kyi snang ba ston par byed pas na gsung gi sgo nas snang ba skyed pa'i glog go// gsum pa ni yangs pa yin la/ sbrul ni gti mug gi rang bzhin no// de 'jims par byed pa la/ za ba zhes bya'o//
354a1(rgyud 'grel): des ni gti mug can 'dul ba'o// de ltar dug gsum 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i stong pa'o// 'o na yon tan kyi khyad par ci zhe nu/ rgya mtsho'i zabasu dpag tshad brgyad
354a2(rgyud 'grel): khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa zhes bya ba ni sku'i tshad ston pa ste/ shin tu tsha zhes bya ba'i don to// dbang po dang nyi ma'i sde man ba zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi brgya byin
354a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi tshangs pa ste/ kha bub tu bsnol ba'i tshangs pa'i phrag pa'i steng na zlo ba nya gang ba lta bu'o// brgya byin gyi phrog pa'i steng na nyi ma s+t+waM/ de gnyis kyi steng na bzhugs pa ni brkyang ba skum
354a4(rgyud 'grel): du bzhugs pa'o// lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ stobs phul du byung ba ste/ lag pa brdabs mas 'jig rten gyi khams brlag par byed pa'i stobs mnga' ba'o// oM la l-i thA
354a5(rgyud 'grel): bye ba ni stong pa nyid la ngo mtshar ba 'am/ gdul bya la ngo motshar ba'i sgra sgrags pas skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba ni sa bla dang sa sbeng ngo // klu rnams brlag par byed ces pa ni sa 'og na gnas pa'o// de rnams
354a6(rgyud 'grel): god mo drag po sgrogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das sku de dang ldan pa'i gad rgyangs chen po dgod pa des brlag par byid pa'o// 'o na 'phrin las mnga' 'am zhe na/ kun tu 'khrugs par byed cing gshin rje'i gzugs
354b1(rgyud 'grel): can/ khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun tu 'khrugs par byed pa'i sku de las 'od zer kun tu 'khrugs shing 'phro ba de las sprul pa dpag tu med
354b2(rgyud 'grel): pa phyag na rdo rje lta bu'i sprul pa 'phro bos na gshin rje'i gzugs tsan/ sa 'og sa stengs blo gsumi 'jig por byed pas khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa'o// de yang gdul bya rnam pa gsum
354b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bar byed pas na/ klu rnams 'dul bar byed bya'o// de'i phyir de la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes phyag btsal nas spobs pa dang ljon pa'i phyir ni
354b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo zhes pa'i don to// de la dgos pa ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod nas gsung du gsol zhes smra sngo pa'o// de nos bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
354b5(rgyud 'grel): gonas kyi bdud kyi khang pa de nyid du ting 'dzin la bzhugs pa nI/ dri nas na mkha' de nyid la gzhal yaMs khang dang zhes bya ba ni/ ting 'dzin gyi 'phrul pas bdud kyi khang pa de nyid gzhal yos
354b6(rgyud 'grel): khang du sprul te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhis rnam par mdzes// dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang / bdud rnams 'dul bar tA ra na'o// d+harma d+hA tu na mkha' dkyil// dur khrod
355a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i dbus su'o// 'khor lo chen po'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa'i drag po chen pos 'khor bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhal yas khang de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das
355a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje zhal gsum pa ste/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dbang du sdus pa'i zhal g.yas g.yon dkar po dmar ser dbus mthing nag gti mug can 'dul ba'i zhal lo// yang na khros pa dang / bzhad pa
355a3(rgyud 'grel): dong / gtsigs pas drag po gsum 'dul bar byed pa// yang ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa bdud gtso bo'i cha lugs 'dzin pas bdud dbang du sdud pa'i rtag so// phyag drug ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / sdigs
355a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang / bar ma gnyis thal mo rde bas pa// the ma gnyis sbrul za ba/ zhabs gnyis nyi bla deng tshangs pa drang / brgya byin mnan pa/ stag gi sham thabs dang / rigs bzhi'i klus sku la brgyan
355a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gong gi bskong pa'i yon tan sku la rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu lha mo mdzes ldan mu mthing nag gri gug dang thod pa bsnams shing / sku la 'khyud pa lhan cig tu gnas te/
355a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud 'dul ba'i tshul can no// shar phyogasasu dri za'i rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed de/ dri za'i pho mo'i steng du khro bo bdud las rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba sku mdog dkar po/ phyag bzhi ga rdo rje rtse lnga
355b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang kha T+wAM gA 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzubs bcangs shing yum la 'khyud pa/ lha me 'od zer can sku mdog dkar mo spu gri dang thod pa bsnams shing g.yon phyogs nas 'khril ba'o//
355b2(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogasu gshin rje'i rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed pa/ gshin rje pho mo'i steng n+ya khro bo gzi brjid 'bar ba zhes bya ba mdog ser po/ phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang dbyug tho 'dzin pa/ 'og ma
355b3(rgyud 'grel): gr-inyis sngags mdzub bcangs shing yu mo la 'khyud pa/ lha mo mngangs can ma sku mdog ser mo zangs gri dang thod pa bsnams shing g.yon phyo gos su 'khril ba'o// nub phyogasu chu lha'i rigs
355b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed pa chu lha pho mo'i steng du khro bo rngam pa'i sgra bsgrogs zhes bya ba mdog dmar po/ phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang sbrul zhags 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub
355b5(rgyud 'grel): bcang sa shIng yum la 'khyud pa/ lha mo sgra da sa can skra mdog dmar mo ste ri dang thod po bsnyams shing g.yon phyogs nas 'khril ba'o// byang phyogasu gnod sbyin gyi rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul
355b6(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'i bgegs kyi rgyal po pho mo bsnol po'i steng na khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhes bya ba sku mdog ljang khu phyag bzhi pa/ rdo rje dang be con bsnomaso pa/ thog mo gnyis sdigs mdzub bcangs
356a1(rgyud 'grel): shing yum la 'khyud pa/ lha mo rlung 'byin ma sku mdog ljang khu 'khor lo dang thod pa bsnams shing g.yon phyogs nas gtso bor 'khril pa'o// shAr phyogs kyi sgor sgro pa
356a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ lcags kyu mdog dkar po zla ba'i steng na phyir brkyang zhing / lcags kyus 'dren cing sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor sgo ba gnyis te/ zhugs pa mdog ser po// zla ba'i ste
356a3(rgyud 'grel): nA phyir brkyang zhing / zhags pa 'phan cing sdigs mdzub mdzod pa'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor sgo ba gnyis te/ lcags sgrog mi ga dmar po zla ba'i steng na phyirar+ya brkyang zhing / lcag sna sgrogs bsnams
356a4(rgyud 'grel): shing sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor sgo bye gnyis te/ dril blo mdog ljang khu zla ba'i steng na phyir brkyang zhing rdo rje dang dril bu sdigs mdzub bo stsol po'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor rab tu
356a5(rgyud 'grel): sbrul nis gdugs pa can rnams do bad+yo ru bsdus nas gtso bo 'khor lo chen po la gdug pa 'dul phyir bstod pa ni/ phyag na rdo rje drag po chu// rdo rje khro bo drag po tshun 'joms// rdo rje mi thub 'jigs
356a6(rgyud 'grel): byekhyod che// rdo rje gzi brjid sngags kyi gtso// rdo rje phrin las kun don mdzad// thabs 'dril 'khor mo che skye le// 'byong ba lnga yo bdag nyid che// mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni// mngangs casasgra
356b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs rlung 'byin te// skyed byed lus kun sgrub pa la// 'gugs shing sdud dang sdom zhing 'dzin// mtha' rtul las rnams grub pa la// zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyang du byas
356b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bstodri pa'o// da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i de kho na nyid dbang du byas nas bstod pa ni/ thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs la// kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du los// bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad
356b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ 'khor lo'i bdag po khyod la bstod// ces bya ba la bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ste/ lha'i bdag nyid do// 'khor lo ni sprul pa dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang / bde ba chen po'o//
356b4(rgyud 'grel): thig le ni byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'o// rang bzhin ni dr-i kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin mi rtog pa'o// mi shigs pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa 'am/ tha mi dad pa ste/ de bas na thabs shes rab dbyer med ces bya ba'i
356b5(rgyud 'grel): don to// de rlong bzhin ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na/ kha sbyor zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'o// nyi zla zhes bya ba ni la la nA dang r+ya so nA'o// 'phyo 'du zhes bya ba ni bsreg pa dang // gso ba dang / srog dang gnod du 'phro
356b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'du ba'o// dgos pa ci zhe na/ bgogs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa/ zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa la bya'o// yang na 'khor lo ni rnam pa bzhi'o// bdag po ni phyag mtshan rdo
357a1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rang bzhin te/ srog dang rtsol bu'i rang bzhin no// de'i phyir mi shigs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don to// kha sbyor ni rdo rje'i rwa dang bum pa'i rang bzhin 'khor lo bzhi'o//
357a2(rgyud 'grel): de yang thabs shes rab kyi rang bzhin te/ nyi zla rnam pa gnyis so// 'phro 'du'i tshul gyis ni bsreg pa dang / gso ba dang bsdu ba'o// ji ltar zhe na/ bgegs rigs stong phrag zhi bAr
357a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs shing zhi bras na bgegs la sogs pa zhi ba'o// de bas na phyi'i bgegs dang / nang gi bgegs zhi bar mdzad nas phan pa skyed pa'i phyir
357a4(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa ni di'o// sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis// thabs dang shes rab bsregs gso mdzad// bdade chen rab tu gsos mdzad pa// sdug bsngal nyon mo 'jomu la 'dud ces gsungaso// des ni gong
357a5(rgyud 'grel): dang yang 'brel lo// de'i don ni 'di'o// bgegs ji ltar zhi bar mdzad ce na/ gtor mas zhi ba'i phyir/ sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis zhes bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid brtan nas/
357a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags ston pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnams la dam bsgrag pa ni/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho pAM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ aM daM nAM lAM ba ra d+ha r-i sha rI raM badz+ra pA ni hr-i da ya ni/ ya sa ma ti kra ma te/
357b1(rgyud 'grel): ut+pA da naM b+ha bi shud+d+hi zhes bya ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ kye kye brang gis 'gro ba'i klu'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ gang las she na/ phyag nA rdo rje gos sngon po can
357b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sku 'dzin pa'i snying po 'odi las so// 'das nu ci zhe na/ 'das na brlag par 'gyur ro// 'das par gyur na nyes pa ji lta bu 'byung zhe no/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bI bud+d+ha ma ti prA ba ta zhes bya ba
357b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'angs pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' bcag pas/ ha ra hi ra nA ga nan/ br-i ha ra bra ha ra nA ga nan/ tshin+da tshin+da nA ga hr-i da ya ni bin+da bin+da nA gA d+ha mau ni/
357b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hibI sI mat+mA nA ga sha rI Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya na ni/ nA ga bi da rA NA ya hUM phraT/ nA ga kro d+ha s+ya tA nA ya phaT zhes bya ba ni saM 'og na gnas pa rnams la granod pa mdor bstan te/ 'di 'dra ba
357b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i// klu rnams gdan du byas nas zla ba dang / mnan nas gtso bo lnga ster ba dang / dbang po'i rten gcod pa dang / lus bcing ba dang / klu'i lus dang snying 'dral bar byed pa dang / klu'i lus gshog
357b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / klu rnams 'joms pa dang / klu khro bos brlag par byed do// de'i las la sbyar ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi byang du bcas te/ bsgrub bya'i gzugs sgra
358a1(rgyud 'grel): tshil lam rten gyi sa la byas te/ de yang gru gsum du bcug nas bdag nyid grong du bstan pa'i 'khor lo chen po bsgoms la/ sgrub pa'i sngags la lus kyi sngags de rnams btags
358a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ yungs kar spu bar byas la las brtsa mo mo// de ni phu las bskyed cing / dgug gtsug bcing ba byi zhing sa bon phu la las bya'o// de nas man no// sa steng gi gnod sbyin la smod pa dor ba nI/ tad+ya thA
358a3(rgyud 'grel): bibi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT kro d+hi sA d+ha nA ya hUM phaT/ ni lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ e pra hI hA hA baM lA yu pheMT// ro g+hA NA~M ya phaT zhes pa pa ni khro moM 'joms ma dang / sgrub pa'i khro mo dang / sgrub ba'i gos sngon ma dang /
358a4(rgyud 'grel): thogs med stobs ma dang / pha rol mnon ma dang / mthar byang mnon ma dang / mthor gzugs gnon pa dang / gau tum tshon gnon pa'o// yak+Sha AM pasgyur phaT zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyis 'og la
358a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni 'di lta ste/ ha su ha s+yA/ d+hA ra d+hA r+ya/ mA rA ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya zhes bya ba ni brdeg pA dang / 'joms pa dang / gsong pa dang / gnod par byed pa'o// dwe'i lngas sbyor ni/ sgrub pa
358a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'brel ba'i las sbyor gyi dkyil 'khor byas te/ de yang gru gsum mdzub gang ba byas te/ spra tshil la gzugs sor brgyad pa snying kha ra k+Sha gzhug par bya'o// 'khor gyi sprul pas yungs
358b1(rgyud 'grel): kur la gsang ba'i las bya'o// de nus mAn+dan pa'i las bya'o// d+ya thA/ bi dwA rA Na ya hUM phaT/ kro d+hA sA d+ha yu phaT/ nI lAM ba sa na ya phaT/ a pra ti ha t+ya ba la yA phaT zhes byA byA ni sa dang
358b2(rgyud 'grel): me dang / chu dang / rung ngo // sa'i lha mos ni rin po tshwa dang / pad+ma drang / ku su ta ra~M bin gyis brlabs so// me'i lha mos ni 'odra gsal ba drang / 'baR+Sha ba drang / 'od gzhun zil gyis gonon par
358b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad do// chu'i lha mos ni 'bab chu dang / bdud rtsi'i mtsho dang / dri byin gyis brlabs so// rlung gi lha myos ni 'bab chu dang / yid du 'ong bya'i char du byin gyis brlabs so// rlung gi lha myos ni sgra
358b4(rgyud 'grel): snyan pa dang / ying du 'ong ba dang / sim pa'i ngang dang / spos kyi ngang du byas haM dadud rtsi'i cho 'phrul legs par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// pa ra kr-i mA ya phaT/ kr-i tan+ta ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAM ta rU
358b5(rgyud 'grel): pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ ces bya ba ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes bya'o// mtshan+da mar 'dzin pa la brten+da nasa? rnam par 'byed cing phrag
358b6(rgyud 'grel): dog zhi nas sdug bsngal can rnams bde bar byin gyis brlabs so// mi dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dge bar byin gyis brlabaso// gzugs mi sdug mdzes par byin gyis brlab so// zhe sdang dang
359a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs so// rnam par shes pa ni gtum pa 'am 'bar ba'o// gzugs ni brten pa'i rang bzhin no// 'du shes ni
359a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mur 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can no// 'du byed ni thogs pa med pa 'am/ chags pa dang bral ba'o// tshor ba ni bde ba 'am rgyud la srog 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no// gzhan gyi rgyud sreg
359a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khro bo'i gzugs mthar 'joms par bye tsihau pha rol gnon par byed pas/ trA sa na ya phaT/ kus+sa N+Dod+Ya ta nA ya phaT/ pre ta pi bA tsa bI nA shA ku rA ya phaT ces bya ba 'ching ba dang / 'dzin pa
359a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / gsod pa dang / gnon pa la sogs pa'i gnod par 'gyu ro// de'i los sbyor ni 'di lta ste/ bdud rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sog 'phrog par byed pa'i yau dgas rnams dang / sha za
359a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bdud dang bdud kyi rigs ma rus pa rnams sngo// de rnams bka' las 'das na brlig par 'gyur te/ ha s+ya ha sra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra yA/ nA sha ya nA sha ya zhes bya ba ste/ 'ching ba dang /

359b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan sor brgyad sgri khur bro dang bcas paM der bcug nas nim bya'i khu bI dang yungs kar dang phye ma gsum lu sprul pa'i khro bor byas lnga gsad pa'i las bya'o// chas gos ni nag por bya'o//
359b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid bsgom pa ni 'khor lo chen po ji lta ba bzhin du gsal bar bya'o// phyir gseng thabs sbyar ba ni/ sarba bi g+h+nAM bi nA sha ka rA yau phaT ces bya bas las bya'o// bstan pa 'jigs pa rnams la
359b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gu h+ye 'dri nI rab tu bstan// rabs chung thod pa'i snod nang du// dzaHbrgyad bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gzhug/ gru gsum+b+ha rgya gram sku gzugs te/ bsnyen pa rdzogs nas tha las brtsa mo//
359b6(rgyud 'grel): tad+ya thA/ b+h+yo b+h+r-i pAM nA gai a d+ho pa ta ye i de ni lAM b+hai ra d+hIri shi rI r-I badz+ra dA NitsI da yaM/ yaHsaM ma tI kA mr-i tau/ ut+mA dwen+do b+h+r-i bi nr-id+b+hi/ sar+b+ba shA d+h+r-i bi nA sha ka rA ya paT/ sarba sha d+hu d+harma ya
360a1(rgyud 'grel): nA sh+yA ka rA sa panra/ san+na shrU d+d+ha s+t+ra g+hA tA ba nU sh+tsa ka rA ya phaT ces/ bzlas shang lan bdun bskor bas bzlogs par bya'o// de zlum pa dang shar phyogs 'dug ste/ gtor
360a2(rgyud 'grel): gang nasmra bslab pa gso ste gsol ba gdab bo// de nas rdo rje dag pas brdungs pa ni/ ha raN+Da rA b+h+re h+ma r+yA prA hA ra/ chen+da tshan/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ sar+b+bad+h+yaM b+hi nA shA kAR+Sha yo phaT ces bya bas brdeg
360a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de yang dbang du bsdu ba dang / gsad pa dang / 'dren pa dang / bcing ba ste/ sgo ba'i gtso bo la brten pa'i sngags so// rdo rje rtse mo yas rtsas bskor zhing brdung bar bya'o// ha sa ha sa/
360a4(rgyud 'grel): d+ha rA d+ho ra/ mA ra ya mU ru ya/ nA sha ya nA shwA y+ya zhes bya bya ni/ rkang pa'i 'og nas mnan+ta tsingad+ya brdeg/ dgug dang dbang du bsdu ba dang // gAs+dza dang mnan pa'i las yin te/ dkyil 'khor
360a5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i dbang du byas pa'i sgom pa'i las sbyor ro// khro mo bzhis ni mchod pa dbul// khro bo bzhi yis las brtsa mo// mchod rten bcas pa'i ri rtser sgra// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur//
360a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khar gzhi dkar po'i snod nang du/ nA ga brgyad kyi gzugs byas te// 'phel ba'i dus kyi tshes grangs la// bdud rtsi 'o mas dus gsum mchod// bsnyen pa 'bum du them du them pa dang /
360b1(rgyud 'grel): lto 'phye'i gzugs nang ming gzhug bya// ma ti pra pa ta ha ra ha ra nA ga nan/ pra ha ra pA ha ra nA ga nAn/ tshAn+da tshan+da/ nA ga hr-i dra ya nI/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga d+ha ma ni/ b+hi sri mA ta nA ga sha rI ra Ni/ bi s+pho
360b2(rgyud 'grel): ya nA go ya nA ni/ nA ga bi dA ra Na hUM phaT/ nA ga kro d+ha sA d+ha nA ya phaT/ klu brgyad drag po'i gsang sngags ti// bsnyen pa gtso bo'i bsnyen pa le// phu btags 'di yi rtsa sngags te/ 'bum
360b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas 'di yi las brtsam mo// bsrung ba lus li gdags par bya// las thob lte 'phye'i thod bcug la// byang laM gdol pa can la gtang // mchod rten rab gnas sgrub sngags so// thod pa byin
360b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs bskor ba'i sngags// phur bu hUM drang phaT kyis so// lto 'a phyi la ni klu brgyad sdigaso// 'khor lo gnyis su shes pas gzhug/ gdon sngags gsal byed dbyangs yig bskor// bsnyen
360b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub las rnams rdzogs gyur na// rang 'og thams cad 'du bar spro'o// 'drag pa la sogs byin brlabs nas// gru gsum rdo rje mtshan pa'o// sum rtseg drug po 'i mchod rten la// bum par
360b6(rgyud 'grel): gdung dang bcos byis mcho dra// zug gsum bsnyen pa rdzogasuM byas nas// byin pa rlabyas can gyis rab tu mnan// klu 'dral ba yi gzugs bya ste// gtso bo'i sngags kyis legs bsgrubs na/
361a1(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum gzugs brnyan bcas pa ni// gdams ngag ldan pas legs sbyar sgra// 'khor lo gro ga shing shun la// nim pa'i chu yis bri ba ni// thig bzhi le che
361a2(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa la// ma nor sngags rnams dgod pa ni// bi dA rA nA ya hUM phaT/ kro d+ha sA d+ha na ya pheT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT a pra ti he ta ba lA yaM phaT/ ha sa hA sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya
361a3(rgyud 'grel): nA shaM ya hUM phaT ces pa dgod/ ba ra kra mA ya phaT/ kr-i tr-i tA yaM phaT/ kr-i tAM ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha Na ya phaT/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha rA pra hA ra/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+na/ hUM phaT/ zur la gzugs dang
361a4(rgyud 'grel): mying dang bcangs pas/ 'khrul 'khor gtso bo'i lte bar bskor// bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ pa ra kra ma ya phaT/ ces bya bas s+ya yi dkyil 'khor steng gnas bes/ zhi zhing sbyang ba'i las bskor

361a6(rgyud 'grel): laM bsams te// gnyis pa'i mtsham su ra bsam mo// ni laM ba sa nA ya phaT/ kr-i tAM ha rU pa ya phaT/ a pra hi ha ta ba la ya phaT/ ro Sha ha ta ba la ya phaT/ dang po'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug ste// chu yi

361b4(rgyud 'grel): bAM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dAM nI lAM ba raM d+ha ra sha rI raM/ kro d+hA s+yA d+ha badz+ra pau Ni hr-i da yaM/ yo sa mA ti kra ma te/ ud+bA d+hA naM/ b+ha bi shud+d+hi r+yA dz+nyA pa ya tI swAhwA/ zhes bya ba ni gats+tsha bo dang yum dang bits+yas

363b2(rgyud 'grel): tA thA ga t+ye b+h+yo bi shr-I mu khe b+h+yaHsirba t+yaMdA khaM ud+g+ha te s+phaR+YA Na hi maM gau ga na khAM swAhA/ zhes pa'i stegs lan gsume btab ste byin gyis brlabs la/ oM ni lAM ba ra d+ha ra kro d+ha sA d+hA badz+ra bA
