399b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bskyod// smin ma bskyod dang ram 'degs dang // cung zad ngo tsha'i zur mig dang // zla rgyas stan la 'dug pa dang // kha yi pad+mo 'dzum dang bcas// cung zad dmar po'i mtsha ba 'chang // kun da ltar
399b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar phreng ba dang // skod cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// ra pa dra bar gyur pa'o// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams ca kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las// sa dang pha rol phyin pa las//
399b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar// de bzhin du ni bdud kyi sde// pham par bya ste dkyilo 'khor bri// lha mo sa la thim pa ro bsam// bdag
399b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid phyag ni rdo rje yis// nga rgyal can dang cha lugs bcas// dpral bar dri yi thig le byaM// mchod rdzas bkram la byin gyis brlab// spro bo bskyed pa'i tshogs bcang brjod// lha'i nga rgyal byas pa yis
399b6(rgyud 'grel): lus pos phyogs bcu skor gyis bskor// spos dang dril bu lag tu thogs// ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor dgongasu gsol// bdag ni ming 'di zhes bgyi bas// rdo rje can gyi
400a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'bri// deng 'dir thams cad kun gshegs shig/ dngos grub 'dir ni stsal du gsol// stegs bu chen po'i dbus gnas te// yang na de na gnas par bsam// grub
400a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i grogs mchog mkhas pa yis// lha mo bzhi yi ting 'dzin zhugs// tshul bzhin dang mi ldan pa yis// phyogs bzhi nas ni gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa
400a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi dngos// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/
400a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i mchog ni chos las byung // ye shes spyod pa rnams sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems dpa' kun gyi
400a5(rgyud 'grel): sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// kun bzang thugs kyi 'khor los sgyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas dri yi thig le ni// stegs bu'i steng du dgug bya ste// dbus suM maN+Dal
400a6(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi pa// phyogs mtshams rnams su zlum por bya'o// de'i steng du skad cig mas// mkha' la bteg pa'i 'khor lo rnams// phab la gdan du dbul bar bya'o// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la//
400b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis mang bstim// gru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// spyan la sogs bas dbang bskur ro// mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod// bstan pa rdzogs pa'i bum
400b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la// byin gyis brlab la sogs pa nas// mchod pa yaun chad rdzogs par bya'o// dri yi thig laM re re lo// rang rang bum pa dgod par bya// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad la// bsang
400b3(rgyud 'grel): gtor byas lo dngos grub kyi// rdza su gsol ba gdab la bzhag/ sngar gyi stegs bu yo l-i bas gtsadra// slob dpon yol ba'i nang 'dug la// slob ma khrus byas spyod laM mdzes// dga' chen khyod la bdag stono// sgron khyod
400b4(rgyud 'grel): ni dgongastsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i// mgon po chen po bdagu 'tshalo// dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni bdag lo gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
400b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ skyobs gsum da ni bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// gsang sngags spyod lam chen po dag/ khyod la
400b6(rgyud 'grel): yang ngag bstan par bya// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs kyis rdo rje can// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di bsgoms pas// dpa' bo byang
401a1(rgyud 'grel): chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de// shAkya seng gA skyob pa yis// bdud snga shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen de dag
401a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag de yis bcom// 'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogaso nas// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen thob pa'i phyiro// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/
401a3(rgyud 'grel): mdun du maN+Dal zlum po ni// legs byas me tog tshem bu dgram// mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod// sngon du 'gro bo'i cho ga rnams// bya zhing sems ni gnas par bya'o// slob ma mi
401a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs stong pa las// lha yis nga rgyal byas pa las// dpral ba snying ka mgrin pa ru// d+hi yi thig le gsum bya ste// slob dpon thugs kwa'i sa bon l-is// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po spro// phyag mtshan
401a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum du gyur pa lus// rdo rje slob ma'i mngon logasu// maN+Dal zlum pau ra re bya// mye toglo tshom bu dgram par bya// bsang gtor bya zhing mchod pa dbul// deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis// 'khor
401a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nyes pas ma phog pas// mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas rdo rje slob mas mdun// maN+Dal byas te me tog dgram// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis//
401b1(rgyud 'grel): so shing sor ni brgyad pa las// phreng bu'i sngags ni lan gsum bzlas// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// kha ni phyir bltas sro shing bca'// maN+Dal phyogasu sngo shring ngor// lhas kyi rim pa
401b2(rgyud 'grel): brtag pa dang // spro ba bskyed pa'i tshig brjod de// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dum pa ro'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na ni re dga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo // gsung sngags
401b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gis mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed mi nus// bskal paM bye ba du ma ru// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // 'gro don mnyam med
401b4(rgyud 'grel): byed par nus// gzhan yang theg pa chen po yis// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldar// khyod rnams de ring de bas na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du
401b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// des na bu yis brtson par gyis// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// phreng ba'i sngags som a mr-i ta'i// bsrung skud byas la btags lo bzhag/ yang na rak+Sha rak+Sha yis// slob ma de nyid bsrung
401b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// grub na bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya// ku sha'i gden bting a mr-i ta'i// sngags bzlas byang shar mtshams su nyal// lha yi nga rgyal gsal ba las// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// mi dang
402a1(rgyud 'grel): ye ting 'dzin bya// u d+hiSh+TA yI sngags bad cing // lU yaM 'khor lo mkha' la gdag/ la m+b+ha la phra ba 'i thAg srung la// dri bzangs rnams kyi sdung la bzhag/ sku bon las ni 'od
402a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas// ye shes thig skud spyan drangs la// gnyi su med par bstims la bzhag/ de nas 'dod lha'i nga rgyas byas// thig sna 'dren pa'i slob ma ni// mdzes pa'i lha mor bsam par bya// dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA brjod
402a3(rgyud 'grel): cing thig skud bsgyur// des kyang gsum brjod blang bar bya// de nas gnam thig ci rigs gdab// oM AHhUM swA hA// sngags 'di brjod cing gdab par bya// dang por thig chen brgyad pa la// oM nI bcu drug phye ste/
402a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab// dre nas che chung sum cu gnyis// phyogs rer cha tshon bcu drug pa// mchenu brgya dra ni nang du gtang // che tshan brgyad ni phyi ru gtang // phyi drang ning gi cha brgyad la// cha phran sum cu rtsa gnyis gdab//
402a5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i thig nas bgrangs pa yi// cho phran bcu drug phyogs bzhir gdab// phyogs re dag nas brtsis pa yi// dbus kyi lci ba'i cha phran gnyis// pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i cha phran gcig/ 'dab ma brgyad la ma
402a6(rgyud 'grel): phran gsum// mu khyud nyi ma'i ze 'bru la// cha phran re ro mnyam par gdab// bcu drug pa la cha phran bzhi// mu khyud cha phran gnyisu gdab/ gru chang la ni chi phran gcig/ de bas cha tshan bzhir gnas te//
402b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo dang bcu gcig rdo rje la// cha chen gnyis ni mnyam par gdab// cha chen gcig la rnga babs te// nu phran bzhi ru gdab par bya// cha chen gcig la Na pran bzhi// cha phras phyed ni pad+ma'o// gnyis ni chos
402b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo la'o// phyed gdugs kyi yu ba ste// chu gcig mdzes pa'i gdugs su bya// rdo rje me ri mu gtogs pa'o// tshon sna lnga ni stong par bsam// yi ge 'bru lnga byung bar bsam// oM hUM hrI
402b3(rgyud 'grel): khaM traM// thugs ka yi ni sa bon lus// 'od 'phros ye shes tshon rtsi dbab// thim pas tshon rtsi lnga ru bsam// slob ma lag pa bde ba yis// rdul tshon gzhal yas bri bar bya// dbus kyi lte ba ser po la// ge
402b4(rgyud 'grel): sar 'od dang bcas pa'o// 'khor lo rtsibs ni mthing ka'o// dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// gtso bo'i gdan stengs phyag mtshan dgod// 'khor lo'i lte bar de bkod nas// rtsibs su 'khor rnams
402b5(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa ni// thod pa gri gug nag po'o// mu khyud zlum po mthang kI la// rtse gsum 'bar bas bskor bar bya// mU khyA zlum po mthing kA la// thod pa'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// sgo bzhi glu chang phyogs dang bstan
402b6(rgyud 'grel): dgar dang saR+Sha dang ldang // kun gyi nang rol nag por bya// rgyan la sogs pa spyi dang mthun// rdo rje me ri bcas pa blo/ niphyi rol dur khrod 'jigs pas bskor// de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni// tshogs gnyis yongs
404a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byas nas// phyi nang stong pa nyid du bsam// shUn+ya tA yis brtan par bya// de nas bdag nyid hUM du bsam// gur dang ra ba me rin+d+ra bcas// yaM dang baM lngas rlung dang chu// laM da rAM dang a las
404a2(rgyud 'grel): nira'abyung ba lnga ni gyur pa las// 'khor lo rtsi bos bzhi mu khyud btsos// sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan par bas mo// tshangs dang brgya byin dri za dang // chu lha ku be rA yi gdan// dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i steng // hUM dang nyi ma
404a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsum// de yi bar du sa bon las// gtso bo yab yum sku bskyed do// de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni// rang 'dod lha yi nga rgyal bya// zhul gcig phyag gnyis gsalnga bya dang // dpral bar khrag gi thig le bya// sngags
404a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod cing dkyil 'khor bskor// lan gsum bskor lnga shar du 'jug/ oM badz+ra d+hi rot+ma mA ya swA hA// sngags du brjod cing ting 'dzin gyis// gzhal yaswa khang ni sgro dbye'o// bla ru rgyal mtshan ba dan gdogs// dar
404a5(rgyud 'grel): dpyangs dang ni yol bar bcas// lnga ldi dar dang ras kyis klubs// grwa bzhir mda' bzhi me ldong bzhi// stegs bu'i zur la dgod par bya// zhal gsil la sogs mchod pa'i rdzas// 'di ltar 'byor par dgra
404a6(rgyud 'grel): por bya// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i gtor me dang // tshogs kyi zhal zas phyogs bzhir dgram// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin dang // bskyed tshul rgyas pa'i rim pa yis// 'dod yon lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// skad cig ma
404b1(rgyud 'grel): yi shes su// gsal byar byin gyis brlabs lu bzhag/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang // las kyi phyag rgya byin brlabs la// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs byas nas// gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba bya// thugs//
404b2(rgyud 'grel): ka yi nI sa blon las// phyogs bcur 'od zer 'phros pa las// dus gsum sangs rgyas yab yum bcas// spyi bo gtsug tu spyan drangs la// tshongs pa'i bu ga'i nang nas gzhug/ gsang ba'i rdo rje lam nas dbyung
404b3(rgyud 'grel): yum gyi pad+ma'i ge sar la// sgrub pa'i thabs nas gsungs pa bzhin// yab yum sgro mar bcas pa bsam// oM s+pho ra Na hUM phaT/ sngags de brjod pas rang rang gi/ gnas su grangan la bzhugs par
404b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// de nis sa bon 'od zer gyis// phyag rgya ye shes 'khor lo rnams// mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te// bsrung gtor bya zhing mchod pa dbul// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bsti/ ma nI le bteg la N+DI rgyas sa
404b5(rgyud 'grel): par ldan nas byin brlabs ni// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// sman la stsogs pas dbang bskur ro// mi bskyod dbu la porgyan pur bsas// skad cigau ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang bstan skyong spyan drangs
404b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo/ zhal gsil gdan dang sku khrus gsol// de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// bshos dang zhal zas sna tshogs dbul// rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs dbul// gong gi mchod rdzas lhag ma yis// phyi yi bstan skyong rgyas
405a1(rgyud 'grel): par mchod// de nas sgrub khang phyi rol tu// 'byung po'i gtor mA gAtang bar bya'o// las kyi rim pa de rnams ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yis bya'o// de nas skad cig ting 'dzin
405a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis// zhal gsum phyag drug du rgyal byas// nad dang gsang ba bla med dang // dngos dang tingange 'dzin gyis dbu'o// thubs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'dra los// bgegs rigs stong phrag
405a3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms mdzad pa'i// 'khor lo'i bdog po phyag 'tshal bstod do// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las// dri za'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i// bdud las rgyal la phyag 'tshalo//
405a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// kha sbyor nyi mo'i 'phro 'du las// gshin rje gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i// rdo rje gzi brjid phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// kho sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro
405a5(rgyud 'grel): 'du las// chu lha'i gdug pa 'dul mdzod pa'i// rngam+b+ha sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las// gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul mdzod pa'i// rdo
405a6(rgyud 'grel): phrin las phyag 'a tshal bstod // 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid tshe// mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni/ mdangs ldan sgra dbyings rlung 'byin to// skyed byed las kun sgrub pa lo// 'gugs shing sdud pa sdom zhing
405b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// mtha' rtul las rnams sgrub la bstod// ces bstod pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya// mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis brlabs// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la
405b2(rgyud 'grel): rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // de bzhin nyid las nges par bskyed// bden pa des ni dkyil 'khor du// gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i slob ma ni//
405b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ de nas rdo rje slob ma ni// khrus byas spyod lam mdzes pa yis// sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas pa yis// sgrub khang phyi ru tshig 'di bsgrag/ de bzhin gshegs
405b4(rgyud 'grel): baM thams cad kyis// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mau mthong snod dang mI ldan na// su la'ong ston par ma byed cig/ de nas bdud rtsi lha yi chu// blangs nas byin gyis brlabasdu par bya// sku
405b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi snying po 'di/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas lha sbyin// 'di ni rdo rje dam+b+ha rlig chu/ srungs shig mu sbyangs sreg par byed// srungs na dngas grub ster bar byed// bdud rtsi 'di ni myang bar gyis
405b6(rgyud 'grel): oM pany+tsa mr-i to da ka tha lA zhes glung // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// slob ma lha ru byin gyis brlab// sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dmo pa yis// gdong g.yogs dar ra mo ras kyis bcing // rdo rje dril bu lag
406a1(rgyud 'grel): tu gtad// rdo rje nus bzung ha ha yis// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor// de nas yol ba'i nang khrid la// phyag 'tshal te me tog dor bar bya// lha rnams gang la
406a2(rgyud 'grel): phog pa ste// slob dpon gyis ni blta bar bya// de nas rdzas kyi dud pa btang // rdo rje slob dpon thugs ka nas// kha dog dmar po'i a bton te// slob mo'i snying khar gzhug par bya// slob mas nyams kyi ba
406a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// 'phar dang ldeg pa'i rtags byung no// de nyid brtun pa'i yan lag bya// dri nas phyag ni rdo rje nyid// slob ma'i spyi bor spyan drangs la// yi ge hUM dra gyur par bsam// de gyur rtswa lnga de nyid can// nA nAs tshangs
406a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bu gar zhugs// snying gi dkyil du lha ru gyur// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha rA badz+ra pA Ni tsid+ha mot+pa la badz+ra sa ya mA ldan// sngags 'di brjid la gsal bar bi sem// mthu stobs phyag na rdo rje ni// khyod kyi snying du yang
406a5(rgyud 'grel): dag zhugs// rtag tu yi dam lha yin gyis// tshul 'di sme bar ma byed cig/ gal te tshul 'di smras nas ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste// nga yis bsgo ba'i las nyen cig/ ma mos//
406a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyas par ma byed cig/ gal te khyod kyis brnyas na ni// dam tshig 'dis ni sreg par byed// tsha ba chen po'i gnas su sreg/ rang bzhin rnam dag bdag nyid lus// dpa' bo dbang phyug ma yi gnas//
406b1(rgyud 'grel): dri med rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bu khyod kyis ni lta bar bgyis// gdong g.yogs bkrol te 'khor lo yis// de bzhin nyid ni bstan par bya// gtso bo sgo bar bcas par bstan// de nas rdo rje slob ma yis//
406b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam legs par bsrungs pa yis// bsam gyis mi khyab dam chos snang // dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol// de nas bum pa rnams kyi chu// rnam rgyal las kyi bum par blug/ chu de mi dmigs
406b3(rgyud 'grel): sto pa las// mthing kha'i mdog can hUM du gyur// dwe gyur rtsi lnga de nyid can// de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las// sangs rgyas mi bskyod pA ru gyur// sa bon las ni 'odra 'phros nas// ye
406b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyong spyan drangs te// phyag rgya bzhi yis gi nyis med bristim// de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// de nyid chu ru gyur pa yis// slob ma la ni dbang bskuro// sku gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i// ye
406b5(rgyud 'grel): shes bdud rtsi dri ma med// lha yi chu nI dag pya yis// mi bskyod par nI dbang bsku re// oM badz+ra da na shU n+ya tA AM b+hiny+tsa mi// slob ma mi bskyod pa ru bas ma// de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// cod pan
406b6(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs oM ru gyur// oM gyur rin chen oM gyis mtshan// de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las// sangs rgyas rin tshan 'byung ldan bsam// sa bon las ni 'od 'phros pas// ye shes rin tshan 'byung
407a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan ni// mdun gyi mkha' la spyan pra sa twe// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyi byin gyis brlab// de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// de nyid cod pan
407a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yis// klo mA la nAM debang bskuro// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid de// dgu rgyun rin chen bla n+ya med// dbu d+h+yan rin che na mchog 'gro mo// rtogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra sa ma ya d+h+wa dz+nyA na
407a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM saM b+ha ba hUM// a b+hi Shiny+tsa myi/ slob mya rin chen 'byung ldan bsam// de la mchod pa rnam lngas mchod// rdo rje mi dmigs dzaM du gyur// de gyur pad+ma dza~M gris mtshan// de lngas 'od 'phros 'dus pa las// sangs rgyas
407a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag ming du gyur// sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros// ye shes sems dpa' 'od dpag med// mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs tAM// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis
407a5(rgyud 'grel): brlab// de la mchod pa rnam lngas dbul// de nyid rdo rjer gyur pa yis// slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang // mi phyed rdo d+hA gsalta ba las// chos rnams kun gyi sgor gyur pa//
407a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur// oM pra dz+nyA a be sha dz+nyA na a b+hiShiny+tsA mi// slob ma 'od dpag ming du bsim/ de la mchod po rnam lnga dngul// dril bu mi dmigs khaM du gyur// de gyur ral gri khaM gis mtshan//
407b1(rgyud 'grel): las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las// sangs rgyas don yod grub par gyur// sa bon las ni 'od 'phros pa pas// ye shes don yod grub pa ni// mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med
407b2(rgyud 'grel): bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// de nyid dril bur gyur pa yis// slob mA la ni dbang bskur ro// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'gro don nyams med
407b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yi// ma chod pa'i rdzas rnamos rdzogs byed pa// dril bu las kyi dbang bskuro// oM tiSh+Ta nu ta na dz+nyA nA pa te badz+ra a b+hiShiny+tsa mi// de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis// kha sbyor tshul du bsnol la sbyin// lag tu
407b4(rgyud 'grel): gotad la gsil du gzhug/ slob ma don yod grub par bsam// de la mchod pa rnam lngas mchod// slob ma mi dmigs oM du gyur// de gyur 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan// de los 'da' phres 'dus paM las// sangs
407b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gyur// sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros// ye shes rnam par snang mdzad ni// mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis
407b6(rgyud 'grel): brlab// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/ byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// cis kyang mi chod mi shig pa'i// rdo rje ming du rab tu grags// oM tra tsa krA mo g+ha dz+nyA na badz+ra a b+hiShiny+tsa mi/ sleb ma rnam par snang mdzad bsam/
408a1(rgyud 'grel): de la mchod pa lnga dbul// chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang // rig pa yi ni dbang lnga'o// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dgu rgyu// dbang lnga yis ni thob pa yin// ma rig pa
408a2(rgyud 'grel): las 'das nas kyang // ye shes lnga ni rim gyis 'thob// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// lag tu spos thogs dril bu gsil// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rgyas par mchod // yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// lan gsum
408a3(rgyud 'grel): bar du bzlas par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byin brlabs nI// 'di la 'gro bar mdzad du gsol// sngags kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rtul zhugs brtan pa mdzad du gsol// slob ma'i lag tu me tog
408a4(rgyud 'grel): gtang // nyi shu rtsa gcig lan gsum bzlas// de nas rdo rje slob ma yis// lha drang slob dpon bcas pa la// me tog phul te tshig 'di brjod// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzung legs kyis// byadagA la 'go bar mdzad
408a5(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// rdo rje lcag tu blang byas te// ye shes rdo rjer byin brlabs nas// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// mthu stobs mnga' bdag phyog na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu
408a6(rgyud 'grel): bzung // phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya~M staM b+ha ya a b+hi'iny+tsa mo// sngags de brjod la slob ma yi// lag tu rdo rje gtang bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// rgyan dang tshe lugs thams cad baM/
408b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la ni bskon la bzhag/ zhal gsum phyag drug sgom du gzhug/ rgyan dang cha lugs 'bar ba ni// dpa' bo bu yis blang bar bgyis// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// phyi rol nang na yang
408b2(rgyud 'grel): ngal gnas// oM nI lAM pa ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hI he// sngags de brjod lnga brtan par bya'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// thub pa chen po'i cha lugs zhugs// slob ma la ni chos gos bskon// dA ni shAkya seng ge ste/
408b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan cha phyag na rdo rje bcas// 'di kun du yi sprul pa ste// ma 'jigs 'jigos par ma byed cig/ khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs las thar// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing ngag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar
408b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM aM b+hiShiny+tsa mi// sngags de brjod la bsrungs la bzhag/ bu khyod 'khor lo'i dbang bskur gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs can// de
408b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs par lung bstan// khams gsum bdag po rgyal srid che// pa la ldan yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// bdud kyi sde rnams la tsam zin gyis// khyod kyis grong khyer mchog tu zhugs// e nI l-I
408b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni sid+d+hi sa ma ya staM b+ha ya e b+hi'iny+tsa mi// sngags da brjod la dung bstan no// slob ma spyod lam mdzes pa yis// mtshan ma med pa 'gro ba'i don// gang dag bdag gis byed nus bas//
409a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che// dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchod par bya// de nas seng ge'i khri bshams
409a2(rgyud 'grel): laslob ma gzhag ste dbang bskur ro// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // lha rnams kyis ni sku khrus gsol// de bzhin lha yi bdud rtsi yis// sku khrus dam pa gsol bar bya// oM dz+ra a b+hi Sheka/
409a3(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ dung bud rnga chen brdung du gzhug/ po tI glegs byaM lag tu gtad// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro// slob dpon thugs kar zla ba bsam// de yi steng du yig 'bru bsam// de
409a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur rtse l-I de nyid can// dwe yi lte ba'i nang du ni// lha yi 'khor lo bsam par bya// rdo rje slob ma'i snying khAr yang // zla ba hUM drang rdo rje bsam// de yi lte ba stong pA ru// slob dponi thugs las
409a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bton// slob ma'i stong khar bstim la bzhag/ ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// spyan la sogs pas
409a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bsku'o// rnal 'byor 'don shes pa yis// mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ dpa' bo chen po'i ngo yi bkas// 'dod yin lnga la spyad par gyis// oM su pra toSh+Tha swA hA// de nas rjes su gnang ba'o
409b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang // slob ma la ni bskur bar bya// deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis// lus drang srog la mi phangs par// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bya dang // 'gro ba'i dron ni dpag med byos// sems can
409b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ rten cing 'brel ba'i chos dang ldan// khams gsum de ltar shes nas ni// sems can don ni mtshungs med byos// de nas slob ma'i dbang bcu ste// phal cher bum pa la
409b3(rgyud 'grel): brten pas/ bum pa'i dbang zhes brjod pa yin// phyir mi ldog dang rjes su gnang // rdo rje sleb dpon dbang yino// lus ni dri mya 'khrod pa'o// nyon mongs pa yi sgrib paM spang // sa ni dang po
409b4(rgyud 'grel): thob par byed// dbang bskur rim pa bcu gnyis so// de nas gasreng ba'i dbang bskur te// dang por snod ldan slob ma yis// tshogs dang dpa' bo'i ston mo bya// shes rab ma ni bcu gnyis sam/
409b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar+ya// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze'i rigs// mig+na kyus ring shing sha mdings dkar// mnyan lcug 'khril l+h+wam gzhon tshul cano// lus la nu 'bur kha dri zhim// smras
409b6(rgyud 'grel): na ngag 'jam mdzes par 'gro// yon tan gzhan yang ldan btsal te// slob dpon mdun du maN+Dal ni// gru bzhi lham pa khru gang tshad// byi dor legs byas me tog dgram// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs
410a1(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yi// shes rab chen po'i snod 'gyur phyir// dbang bsgyur chen po mdzad du gsol// gsang spyong thabs dang ldan pa yi// ye shes bdud rtsid
410a2(rgyud 'grel): ma med// bdud rtsi chen po'i ro myang phyir// dab nga bskur 'di la khyod spro 'am// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// lha mo 'di ni khyad par can// yon tan+da mtha' yas ldan pa ste// gsang spyod thabs kyi sbyor
410a3(rgyud 'grel): ba las// gsang ba'i dbang bskor mdzod du gsol// de nas rdul tshon gzhal yas khang // nang du gsang ba'i yum bzhag nas// de nas sa bon 'od zer gyis// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi yum// phang na
410a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i lha mo rnams// spyi bo'i gtsug tu spyan drangs te// tshangs pa'i bu ga'i lam du zhugs// rdo rje bum+b+ha pa'i 'khor lo la// rgyalnga ba sangs rgyas lnga ru gyur// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom//
410a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' gsang byin gyis brla ba pa dang // gAnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya// yab yum 'khril ba'i bsgom pa yis// ye shes gsal ba'i byang chub sems// phab nas mtshan dang ldan pa'i blugs// dpa'
410a6(rgyud 'grel): bo rnal 'byor mo kun gyis// dam tshig 'di ni ngo mtshor che// khams lnga yi ni ro yis gang // bde ba chen po myang bar gyis// rdzas de slob ma'i lce la bzhag/ a ho su kha skal chen no// dngos grub dam pa
410b1(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol// 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis// ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur// byang chub sems ni yid 'ong bas// de bzhin bu khyod dbang bskur ro// de nas shes rab ye shes dbang //
410b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu zab pa'i tshul du bskur// bdud rtsi lnga yi chu la sogs// shes rab ma yi lus kun bkru// 'dzi' ti tsAn ga bur dris// shes rab ma yi lus la byugs// lha mo 'di ni khyad par che// bde ba
410b3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas ster byed ma// blangs nas rnam pa thams cad du// bu yis bla med mchod par gyis// byang chub sems ni bla na med// bu yis ci dgur za nus sam// phyag rgya lha las myong ba yis// rig ma
410b4(rgyud 'grel): dang pas mchod nu sa sam// gshad ci khu bA rak+ta sogs// 'di nyid du ni za nus snum// nga yi gsong ba'i pad+ma 'di// bde ba myur du bskyed pa ste// khyod kyis rtag tu mchod nus sam// ji skad bshad
410b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dam tshig rnams// lha mo ci dgar bdag gis nus// lha mo'i pad+ma mchod par bgyi// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// shes rab lag pa g.yon pa dang // slob ma'i lag pa g.yas pa gnyis// dar gyis mdud
410b6(rgyud 'grel): pa byas la bzhag/ brda yi dkyil 'khor bris pa'i steng // pi dar stan la sogs pa 'am// dar gyi blo dang stan 'phar ma bting // rdo rje khro bo rtag tu bskyod // me 'od 'bar ba bsgom par bya// steng gi pad+ma'i
411a1(rgyud 'grel): snying po bcu// shes pa rang gsal dang la bzhag/ slob ma'i lag pa g.yas pa yis// shes rab mkhal ma g.yon mnan nas// slob ma'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// gsung ba'i pad+ma khwa
411a2(rgyud 'grel): phye ste// pad+ma ge sar snying po btsal// shes rab bum pa'i mgul chings kyis// slob ma'i bum pa mgul pa bcing // bde ba kha sbyor bsgom par bya'o// pad+ma ze 'bru rgyas pa dang // rdo rje lag gi khrig sgo bzhug/ gnyis
411a3(rgyud 'grel): suM med pa'i sbyor ba bya// rlung la goms pas rlung la gtang // sngags kyi rtswa sgo dgug pa dang // sor mos brngam zhing glod pa dang // pad+ma'i ge sar snying po de// rdo rje sbu gur bcug la gzung // nyams kyi stobs kyis nang
411a4(rgyud 'grel): du 'then// byedro ba gsal lo mi rtog pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes myong // de'i nyams dang mi 'bral bar// cung zhig de la gnas par bya// de nas rdo rje chu mthung gis// bsgom pa cung zhig bya ba yin// mi gsal
411a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes ma yin na// rol pa'i sgra la sems gta l-i// yang dang yang du nyams su blang // de yi ye shes bskye bar 'gyur// de nas gnyis ka dral bar ldang // pad+ma dang ni rdo rje nas// byang chub sems kyi kun nga la//
411a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin pas// lce yis blang zhing gzhi bar bya// kun+da lta bu'i byang chub sems// rang gi sems la bstim par bya// gnyis med ye shes gsal bar 'gyur// shes rab ma yi rkang pa g.yon//
411b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni// da dang rdo rje slob dpon dang // mched drang lcam dral thams cad la// khams gsum sems can ma lus pa// ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig/ gzhan yang dam tshig bshad pa rnams//
411b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar gyis// de nas gzung nas bu khyod kyis// ji srid byang chub ma thob par// sems can kun gyi don rnams ni// rtag tu rmi lam bzhin du gyis zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bzhi pa tshig gi dbang //
411b3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// mjug gi las kyi cho ga ni// mkha' la btegs nas bzhugs pa yi// 'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs la// mchod pa'i yo byang 'byor tshad dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams
411b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdu// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yis// bshags pa ci tsam 'grub par bya// mkha' 'gro rnams la gtor mas mchod// tshogs dang dpa' bo'i ston mo bya// oM kri to wi la sogs pa yis// ye shes 'khor lo
411b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegasu gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dam tshig bsdu// 'gro ba 'dod pa tha dod pas// de la dgongs nas badre gshegs kyisra// mos pA tha dang drang pa'i phyir// 'gri la rtsa bas byang chub lam// sna tshogs tha dad
411b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa kun// gang zhig 'ga' la phan phyir du// gsal ba'i sgron mar gsung ba yin// de la brten nas yun ring mos pa yis// 'dod lha'i zhal mthong de tshe lhag lhas gnang ba byin// ma smin smin
412a1(rgyud 'grel): byed yon tan kun 'byung ba'i// shes rab bzang zhing mang thos rlom sems med// brtson 'grus drag cing sran thub brtan blo can// bla ma la gus dang ldan snying rjer ldan// de 'dra'i slob ma

412a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// sgrub pos dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par shog/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga na maM gru'i rigs las byung ba'i dngos grub brnyes pa slob dpon dzA ba rI pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so//
412a4(rgyud 'grel): bam po'i mkhan po paN+Di rta de ba pU r+Na ma ti dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ tsi tI dzo la lAk+Sha Na nA ma/ bod skad du/ mdze
412a5(rgyud 'grel): nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// 'gro rnams rdul dang mun pa snying stobs kyis// 'dam la gnas te rkyen gyi ri bos non// de gsal shes phyir rang gi rtogs pas bri// dam pa'i
412a6(rgyud 'grel): drin thob mgon la spyis btud bshad// de la 'dir nad kyi mtshan nyid dang / bzlas pa'i tshad dang / de bzlog pa'i thabs so// de la mtshan nyid la bcu gnyisu shes par bya ste/ gal te bcu gnyis kyis ma zlogs
412b1(rgyud 'grel): na de 'phro bcad do// 'bad pa dang bcad pas tshogs pas glo/ thabs ni 'dod pa'i lnga mnyes pas bzlog pa dang // rten cing 'brel pa'i nus pas bzlog pa'o// 'dod pa'i lha mnyes pas bzlog pa ni

413a1(rgyud 'grel): tsha ker ker ba dang / tshe brang breng ba dang / lus la sogs pa tsha thang de ba dang tsha pirar+ya pi ra bA dang / yan lag bra ba'o// khrag la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste/ stu nas skabs skabs
413a2(rgyud 'grel): su yang yang 'dzag pa dang / tshwa ber byer ba dang / lus lci yor yor ba dang / gdong dmar pa la stag pa'i lo ma'i bris ma ltar 'ong ngo // nang grol la zhugs po nAM bzhi ste// glo snying mi byad ba dang /

413a4(rgyud 'grel): tu 'ong ba dang / khu ba dngos snyigs bye nas 'ong ba'o// chu la zhugs pa ni gsum ste// sbubs kyi chu rgya skyugs kyi khu bo ltar 'ong ba dang / sna'i chu rtag tu skyo mar 'dzag pa dang // mig mu rtag par 'dzag
