478b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bshags dang yi rang ba// bsod nams sngo dang skyab 'gro dang // rdo rje la sogs bzhi po dang // de nas stong pa nyid bsgom bya// stong pa'i sngags ni nyid brjod bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba baM
479a1(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ho haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// mdun du raM las nyi ma bsgom// de ste swA hUM mchog rab bsams la// de 'gyur sna tshogs rdo rjer bsam// de las 'phros pa'i sa gzhi dang // ra ba gur dang /
479a2(rgyud 'grel): bla re dang // dra ba la sogs nges pra l-i// bdag kyang der ni khyab pa ste// mtshanA mar bsam par mi bya ste// de yi nang du bsam bya ba// na mkha' khyab pa ri chos 'byung bsgom// e yaM raM br-i laM suM bruM la sogs pas// rim pa
479a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du chos 'byung nang // rlung dang me dang chu dang sa// gzhu dbyib gru gsum zlum po dang // gru bzhi po la spyi dang dmar// dkar saur ljang khur rab tu grags// grwa ra ni ba dAn bum pa dang // me ri rdo rjes rnam par brgyan// de stengs
479a4(rgyud 'grel): rI rab king rus gzugs// de dag rlung gi sde rab sbar nA sa// yongasuM zhu bar gyur pa las// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bAr brgyan// rin chen pha gu 'dod yon sa// dra ba dru phyed yang dag ldan// gdugs dang
479a5(rgyud 'grel): ri dgas nges par gnas// tA rA na ni bzhis brgyan cing // keng rus rdo rje sbrul mgo dang // 'bar ba'i 'phreng bsdu yang dag brgyan// rdo rje ra ba'i nang logs// dur khrod brgyad dang ce spyang sogs// 'jigs pa'i rol pas
479a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// drag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdan ni nyi shu gnyis kyis nges/ dkyil du tshangs pa brgya byin gnyis// phan tshun kha ltas yongasu dgos// de yi mtha' lo gas mtshams rnamasu// 'jigs bI
479b1(rgyud 'grel): keng rus nyi shur gnas// de steng sa bon rnams bsams te// 'di dag rims pas shes par bya// hUM hUM/ mAM baM aM/ yaM bA tse to/ po mya rau ge/ tshe laM paM baM// de dag yongasu gyur pa las// mtshan ma nges par bsdam
479b2(rgyud 'grel): bur bya// hUM gnyis pa las raM byung bas// rdo rje gnyis dang yung dag ldan// rtsadad dang dbyug pa mcho rten de gi/ sdigs mdzub gri gug rnon po dang // lcags sgrog me lce glang chen lhogs// me tog dung phor ro mchog dang // dril bu
479b3(rgyud 'grel): tho bo rkyal pa dang // hom zar gri gug rnon po ngas// de dag yongs la se bon te// de gnyis yongs su gyur pa las// sku rnams rim pa bzhin bsgom bya// dbus kyi khyab bdag chen po ni// sku ma dog sngon po gtum bag can//
479b4(rgyud 'grel): dbu skra kham pa gyen du 'phags// spyan ni skal pa'i me ltar 'bar// mche ba gtsigs shing gsus bA 'khyil// phrag po g.yas na nyi ma la// g.yon ni zla ba nges par rgyu// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse dgu pa// g.yon pa mkha'u lding
479b5(rgyud 'grel): drag po 'dzin// thod pa lnga yis rnam par brgyan// sbrul gyi rgyan cha bdun dang ldan// cung zad g.yon du gzigs par bsam// shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal te// dbu gsum phyag ni drug pa'i dbyig/ kha dog dmar po de nyid 'du
479b6(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// dang po g.yas na rdo rje la// g.yon na dgra sta yang dag ldan// bar ma gnyis kyi 'dzin byed pa// gung mo srin mtho ba gnyis mdud nas// gzhon rnams yongs su brkyang pa
480a1(rgyud 'grel): yin// de nyid thugs kar gzung byas la// de 'og g.yas na zhags pa 'dzin// g.yon na ral gri yang dpya ldan// lhor ni nag po chen po ste// kha dog drung sprin lta bu la// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa'i
480a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs// g.yas na tsan dan pang tshan bsnams// g.yon na zhag sa pa 'dzin pa nyid// nub du lus ngan rgyal po ni// kha dog ljang khu nyid la yang // spyi bor rdo rje mig gis brgyan// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa la//
480a3(rgyud 'grel): goyas bla nyid na mchod rten la// g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin// byang phyogasu ni dgod bya ba// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yongasu gnas// kha dog sngon po khro nyer zhal// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang stang stabs tshul//
480a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis brang du bsnol mdzad de// g.yon du cung zad gzigs pa yin// byang shar rdo rje gau nod sbyin te// kha dog dmar nag 'jigs pa ste// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa la// grwa yas pa gri gug rnon po 'phyar// g.yon/
480a5(rgyud 'grel): no tsA ti drag po brdung // g.yas brkyang g.yon brkum gar thabs tshul// shar lhor rdo rje ro langs nyid// kha dog sngo sgra 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa dang // rdo rje lcags sgrog rab bzung naso// gung srin
480a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gsum po rnams// dam por bzung nas yongs su bsdams// mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste// spyi bor bsnol ba rings par gnas// lho nub rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// kha dog dmar skya de nyid la// zhal gcig
480b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni gnyis pa'i gzugs// shin+da tu mi zad drag po la// zhabs gnyis mthil sbyar btsugs pa ste// na mkha' gru bzhi pa ru 'dod// phyag gnyis spyi bor thal sbyar nas// me lce 'bar ba yangasu 'a'is/ nub byang rdo rje 'jig
480b2(rgyud 'grel): byed de/ kha dog sngonag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa la// zhabs gnyis dag ni rab tu bshad// g.yas g.yon dang po glang tshon gyi// lpagos pas ye su brgyan pa yin// de 'ag grwa yo ni na dgra snga dang
480b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yang dag brgyan pa ste// gsum pa'i g.yas na lcags kyu dang // g.yon pa mi mgo rlon pa 'dzin/ mtshams kyi glu chad gang yin par// 'od skyeng ma dang yid 'phrog ma// kun babang mo dang rmA sU can// pa gcil byug+sa ni gnyis
480b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la// kar ser domar dang sngon po yi// kha dog can la ldem bag can/ shin tu 'dzes pa'i phyag gnyis kyis// spyi bo rab tu bzung ba ni// ma tog dri dang zhal zas dang // sgra sman gur gyi rol pas gnas// sgo rnamasu ni sgo bsrung ba//
480b5(rgyud 'grel): srog gcod ma dang dbubs rngub me// khrag 'thung ma dang sha za ma// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa lnga// stag dang song gi sbrul dang ni// byi la'i gdong du gnas pa ste// rang rang rigs kyi kha dog dang // g.yas pa rnamasu thogs pa
480b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// tho ba rkyal pa hom gzar dang // gri gug rnon po yongs su 'dzin// g.yon pa rnams na thogs pa ni// zhags pa thogs par gcig po ste// mche ba gtsigs shing rngam pa'i sku// shin tu khro gnyer brjid ba'i zhal// g.yas bskum
481a1(rgyud 'grel): gAyon du cung zad gzigs// hA la ha la sgra yang sgrogs// gzhan yung lha rnams de dag kun// thod pa lnga yis dbu la brgya na// rgyun tshwa dang yang yang dag ldan// stag gi lhags pas smad bkris pa'o// pad+ma 'dab
481a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa yi// snying po la ni gtso bo bzhugs// 'dab ma la ni lha rnams dang // phyi rol keng rus phreng bas brgyan// gru ched la ni lha mo bzhi// sgo bzhi rnams la ni sgo bsrungs dang // dkyil 'khor rdzogs ber bsam byas nas//
481a3(rgyud 'grel): snying khar rang gi sa bon bsam// 'od zer phyung ste de nas ni// ye shes 'khor lo dkug byas la// mdun du gnas pa nyid la yang // zhal bsil nye reg 'thor 'thung sogs// yang dang yang du mchod byas la// lcags kyo zhugs
481a4(rgyud 'grel): pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu'i phyag rgya bzhi po yis// dzaHhUM baM hoHnges brjod la// sdigs dang phyag rgya sbyor shes pas// dam tshig 'khor lo myur nga gzhug/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' yis// thogs nas 'od zer 'phros
481a5(rgyud 'grel): byas naswa// kun bzang ma sogs lha mo bzhi// rdo rje bum pa bzung nas ni// mi 'chi lnga yis sbyor ba yis// bdag la dbang bskur nges par bsgom// de bskur nga'i skad cig la// sngags 'di dag ni rab tu brjod// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA
481a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra pA Ni ye b+h+rUM Ar+ya bas+tho ha yi a som b+hi rjes ti hUM/ de nis khyab bdag blo yis// kun gyi spyi bor mtshan mar bya// de nas go la bgo ba ste// chu shing steng du hUM bsams la// de gyur rdo rje go char bsgoms byas la// sngags 'di/
481b1(rgyud 'grel): yis ni spyi bor gzugs// de yis kun la khyab paR+Sha bsams// badz+ra ka ba hUM/ bdag nyid grong gi gzugs gnas la// steng du mig 'dra'i dngos po bsgom// de las grong du gyur pa las// 'jigs byed rigs dgu rnam
481b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsam+ba// mI 'dra stu gur rab sbyar bas// snying po'i steng du gsal bar snang // snying po'i steng du chu bsgrubs pas// yan lag stong dang ldan pa nyid// spun la phyogs bIr kha bltas la// bdag las gong du gyur
481b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// hUM gnyis lA ni steng ma yi// nges par gsal bar rab byas la// dang po'i snying por rab song ste// de las mi 'chi rab ldan pas// 'jigs byed steng na rab gnas pa'i/ mig 'dra'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan//
481b4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms byed mig 'dra'i gar mar sbyor// thabs dang shes rab gsum du nges// dngos po gsum du rab brgyud de// snying po'i steng na gnas pa yi// mr-i 'o dro steng du nges par song // rang gi gar ma'i khyen tsam lo// skad cig
481b5(rgyud 'grel): bye brag bcu drug pa'i// thabs yongasu rdzogs pa skye// dang po dngos po rtog mi phye/ rdzogs pa nyid la me 'bar bas// rim pa de nyid mi gnas shing // dang po'i snang ba gang yin pa/ mar me'i rtse me lta bu yi// phyi nung rang
481b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'od gsil ba'i// dang po rab tu brtag bya'o// rim pa gsum par rab rdzogs yin// skad cig bye brag bcu pa yi// steng du par gnyis rab 'bar dang // hUM las skyes pa thub pa'i sku// yang dag par ni brtag
482a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// 'on kyang gong ma'i sa bon las// bskyed par bya ba kho na yin// sems dpa' gnyisu nges pa dang // 'khor lo spros pas char lta bu// log rtog shin tu smin byed pa// skyon gasngal nas ni de nyid du/
482a2(rgyud 'grel): slar yang ngo bos yang dag gnas// de ltar gsal bar mu khrul bar// skyon gyis ma gos dri med do// sngags kyi rgyu gA gsum las ni// khyab par nges par dmigs byas la// bdag nyid tha mal gzugs kyis gnas// de dag pha
482a3(rgyud 'grel): tshun brgyud pa yin// zo chun khyad mo bzhin du bsam// drag po'i bzlas po de nyid dang // rang bzhin rdo rje bzlas pa'o// rigs gsum yang dag bsdus pa yin// oM b+ho b+ho pAn+d+ha ga A d+hi pra ta ye/ oM na mo nI laM bA rA sha rI raM// badz+ra
482a4(rgyud 'grel): pUpI NI hri dra ya// yaHmA ti kr-I mA tI/ ut+sA da nI b+ha bi shud+d+hi/ tAd+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bu d+ha/ ma tI kra ma ta hA ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ra ra ha pra ha ni gA nan tshin+da tshin+da nA gA hr-i de ya nI/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga da ma ni/ bi si ma d+ha nA ga sha
482a5(rgyud 'grel): rI raM// bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA hUM phaT/ nAM ga bi d+hA ra NA yai hUM phaT/ nAM god+Ya da na ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta bi la ya hUM phaT/ kri tAn tA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i twen+te na ru pa ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha tA ya
482a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ tA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ kusmaN+Dot+pA da nA yai hUM phaT/ pre ta bi shA tsa bi nAM she ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yaMk+Sha a pasma ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ dA ra dA re/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na/ bi nI ka ra
482b1(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT/ sarba sha truM saM g+hA bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM tra tA kA ra la kra bi sha na nI lAM bu ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA NI ya/ nA ga laM kA rA sa ko sa ko traM/ byA tsa ra Ni ba s+ya na yA b+ha ma ke rA g+ha ra ha
482b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ha ye/ tro t+ya mu t+te na te na trai lokyA d+ha ha pA b+hU met+ta ma sa ra na ru ta ya/ nA ga tsi tu ram b+hak+ShaM hUM phaT/ oM lokya bi dzA ya hUM phuMT/ oM ma hA kA la ro Sha na hUM phaT/ oM b+he shwa ra ma na ye hU~M phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hA na
482b3(rgyud 'grel): har+tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yAk+Sh+ma hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pe pe ha lI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra be ra ba ru ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pre bid pa ta ya hUM phaT/ oM na mo me ha ra ne ya hUM phaT/ oM sa man+ta pra tri ya hUM phaT/ oM she pa ha gi ra ti ya hU~M phaT/ oM
482b4(rgyud 'grel): prasti ti na ya hUM phaT/ oM si sho so ga pa ya hUM phaT/ oM ra ti phra ma ni hUM phaT/ oM ma saM b+ha ga khri hUM phaT// de nas phyogs bdu 'khrugs pa las// yi ge ngas pa gang yin pa// bla ma'i man ngag rab gsal bris// gcig/
482b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bsdus te bzlas pa bya// rang byung sngags pa bdag nyid la// grangs tsha de bzung bar glang yin pa// rigs kyi dbang gi bshad par bya// tha mal pa'i gzugs gnas// gtso bo nyid la 'di bstod bya// hUM gnod sbyin sde dpon
482b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni// gdug pa rnams la mi ltar 'bar// stong gsum ma lus skrag mdzad pa'i// 'bar ba che la phyag 'tshalo// ha ha nges por sgrogs pa yis// srid gsum ma lus g.yo mdzad pa'o// rngam zhing gle go ltar 'gyur/
483a1(rgyud 'grel): baSh+Ti sgra// gsus po che la phyag 'tshal lho// shrIn tu mAM zad gdug pa'i thugs// gshe dang rnam pa gdag pa'i bdag/ chos nyid dang lhas rtog thul pa// rdo rje blugs la phyag 'tsha'o// rdo rje'i dkyil
483a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor me lce'i yis// sprin dmar rab tu 'phyo mdzod pa// khro bo khro mo 'od zer tsha// gtsi 'khor ldan la phyag 'tshal 'dud// hUM nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni// byas pas bgegs ni 'a mi 'jug yin// dwe nA bsrung ba'i
483a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los bsrung // 'og tu hUM las skyes pa yis// rdo rje kun 'byung yang dgra bsam// de stengs hAM las skyes pa yis// rdo rje rtse lngar bdag sems te// 'gro dang 'chags dang 'dug kyang rung // nyal la sogs pa'i
483a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam la// de gyur lag na rdo rjer bas mo// kun la de yi 'od 'phros pas// me lce'i phung po 'bar bar bsgom// de yis thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur// zas kyi rnal 'byor spyad par bya// oM las dge sbyor rab bsams la//
483a5(rgyud 'grel): de 'og 'byung ba'i sa bon nyid// bsams la de rgyud dngos po la// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su// mi 'chi lta ni yang dag bsgom// nga yi nang ngu hUM 'bar bas// dngos po thams cad zhu byar bsam// de bsams
483a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi tshe na ni// sngags ni badz+ra a mr-i ha ha/ de steng oM gyis rab bsam mtshan lo// mtha' mar hUM gis rab tu brgyun// de nas snying kha'i sa bon la// 'od zer na mkha' phyogs spros pas// bde bar ga
483b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdud rtsis gang // de ni yongasu 'dres par bsam// rang gi snying gar gnas pa las// re pha la ni shing rta bcu// de las de yi steng du ni// paM lus pad+ma 'dab bcu drug/ nges par yang ngag ldan par bya// de yang gi
483b2(rgyud 'grel): sar snying por ldan// snying po la ni gtso bo ste// 'dab ma dag la lha rnams nyid// rang bzhin gsal bar yongs su brtag/ 'og tu r-i khAs me yi ni// dkyil du 'bar bair nges par bsam// de nas lagau pa g.yas pa
483b3(rgyud 'grel): la bzhi po dgang gzur ngo bo nyid// dang por blugs gzar bsams byas la// sngags 'di brjod la bza' bar bya// des zos tshogs kyi 'khor lo la// mchod pa rgya chen byas par 'gyur// oM badz+ra pA Ni ga NA ya swA hA/
483b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu khrus la rab brtson na// chu bo'i 'gram du song ba las// dang poro gtso la phyag 'tshal nas// chu la sngags kyis gdab par bya// de nas khrus dgu byas pa yis// phyi nAs lnga yaM dang po la// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga
483b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// bzhi po 'di bskyengs la sogs// lha mo rnams kyi bum pa las// bdud rtsi dbang bskur khrus byed yin// de nas khu tshur btsongs pa las// mthe bong bsgreng ste pi bor ni// sngagasde 'di yis ni chus mnan bya//
483b6(rgyud 'grel): de byas dbul khrus byed de// 'gro ba ma lus ngag par bshad// oM badz+ra sna na hU~M/ bzlas pa byed ci ngo khrus byas na/ yon tan brjod kyis mi lang bas// phyi yi khrus ni de dag la// nang gi khrus ni mi rtog pas// thaMm
484a1(rgyud 'grel): cang dag par 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi 'an du ni// sgrub bya'i thabs 'di byas pa la// dge ba dri med gang thob des// 'gro ba mtha' dag mu lus par// lam 'das na brten byas nas// sangs
484a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// phyag na rdo rje thob par shog/ sleb dpe b+h+yo phyag rgyu'i dngos grub brnyas po phrag+sa na rdo rjes mdzad pa me lha'i phreng ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha swA
484a3(rgyud 'grel): nA pa tI nAM lAM bA ra d+ha ra bodz+nyA pA NI sA d+hA naM/ bong+ga skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagI na rdo rje gyos ston po can+da gyi bsgrub thabs/ dkon ma cho ga gsum khwa phyag 'tshalo// dang por d+ha shrIg rang gi snying kha ra rmA
484a4(rgyud 'grel): debusu yi ge hUM bsams te/ de'i 'odi zer gyis bla ma rung sangs rgyas la sogs snang bya ste/ mechod pa bya ba ni/ dkon ma cho ga gsum zhes bya bya la sogs pa'i tshigs su banang ba brjod nas/ byams pa dang snying rje
484a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom mo// de nas rang gi sems rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad gdod mo nas mya skyes pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas/ bdag me ba sems kyi sbrul po tsam ste/ 'di ltar
484a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas de nyid kyi sngags brjod par bya'o// de nas rnam pa lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje bsgom par bya ste/ sku gdog nag po yi go hUM las byung ba/ zhal
484b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ spyan gsum pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ gos ston brnams pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'dang dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs swAm+b+ha/ gAsang sngags las dzaM skad brjod dung
484b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'dzin pa bsgom nas/ ye shes sems dpa' skyon drangs te yang dag par mchod nas/ gzhug pa dang / bcing bu dang / rjes su mnyes par byas l-i/ lus dgra yid byin gyis brlab pa dang / phung po dang skye
484b3(rgyud 'grel): mched lha'i nga rgyal byas te/ dbang bskur nas/ yang mchod pa dang stong pa dang / bdud rtsi myong ba la thig pu byas nas// oM nI la byA ra d+hA ra ya// zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas par t+yA bzlaswa pas skyo ni cung
484b4(rgyud 'grel): zad bsgom par bya'o// de nas ldang 'dod nu gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te bsngos la// de nas ye shes kyi lho gshegasu gsol te/ bdag nyid dpal phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal dang ldan paso spyod lam bya'o// de la rnam pa
484b5(rgyud 'grel): lngas mngon par byang chub pa bskyed pa ni chos thams cang gdod ma nas skyes par byasams shing brjod pas/ sems tsam gyi rnam par dmigs te/ sems kyi bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor a yilnga gyi rnam pa can ba/
484b6(rgyud 'grel): le oM pra ti be do ka ro mo zhes brjod pa nas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas/ oM rdo d+hi tsiSh+Tod+d+ha dA yA mi zhes brjod pas/ ka yig gi rnam pa can gyi zla ba sgom mo// de'i steng du ya ge hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba
485a1(rgyud 'grel): ba stsogs pa ts+tsha ba bsgoms pa dz+dzas brjod par Sh+Ta/ As sngags kyi rgyun rgyas pa / rdo d+har b+hU s+yAsmA/ b+h+ya rmA rmu s+yAs bad+mod sh+ya d+d+ha gA sar+b+ba swA thA
485a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam pa'i 'od zer bsdus pa'i sbyor ba byas pas/ ji skad du brjod pa'i dpal phyug na rdo rjer gyur par byas la/ a ye b+hA badz+rI d+hA ra shU a he zhes brjod par bya'o// sngon du gnas bskrad par 'dod po rnams kyis stong ba nyid la
485a3(rgyud 'grel): bka'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa rab tu 'byur ba bsams taM/ dbusu khro bo gnod mdzes rgyal po// rtsib s+t+ra rnams la khro bo btsu rims bzhin bsam smA taM/ ts+tsha bzhi'i sngags parjod pas khro bo bcu'i 'od berarA gyis gdugus
485a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bkug ste sku gsung thugs kyi phur pa btab pas/ khro bo bcu'i 'od zer gyi thams ca brtu zhing sbyangs te na mkha'i ngo bo nyid du gyur par bya'o// de nas yang namakha'i la raM/ nying la gnas pa'i hUM las byung
485a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje re ba dang / sa gzhi dang dra bas bskor ba'i dkyil du khang ba rtsegs pa bsgom par bya'o// de yahA kha cig ni rlung gri dkyil 'khor nas ri rab la phru gi bar du rim pa bzhin bskyed nas de yAs
485a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las khang pa rtsegs pa ba zhes 'dod do// kha cig ni ri rab kyi steng na khang pa brtsigs pa 'dong ngo // kha cig ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dkyil du bskyed par 'dod do// 'dar ji ltar 'dod bzhin bskyod par bya'o//
485b1(rgyud 'grel): de yang gu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// tA ra na bzhis mdzes pa byas// dra ba dang dra phyed la sogs pas brgyan pa'i dbus/ sna tshogs pud+ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du rnam pa las mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pAs sku
485b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya'o// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang pa'i sngagasau nI dzaHhUM baM hoHwaMs bya bas mnyes pa lu thug pa rau bya'o// de la byin gyis brlab pa khams dang skye mched dag par bya ba ni ri gsum dang rigs lnga'i
485b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du'o// dbang bskur ba ni mi bskyod pas pa bu brgyan pa'o// mchod pa rnams kyi phyi rol dag gis te// phyi rol gyi mchod pa rnams ni ar+d+ha dang me tog la sogs rang gi ming gi dang po dang / tha ma'i rkyeg rgya dang bcas pas
485b4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya'o// bstod pa ni mi lnga'i shu lag gam/ ming bcu pa'i 'am ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa la sogs pas bstod pa ba'o// bzlas pas dus sku gsung thugs kyi lha dang / ye shes sems dpa'i thigs kAr gAdan dang
485b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin bsams te/ rang gi sa bon gyi mtshan mar byas la/ brtan nas gsad sngags kyi phreng ba rab tu 'od 'bar ba dang bcas pa spro bo dang bsdu bar bya'o// ye shes sems pa'i thugs kA zla ba'i dkyil la b+h+yo
485b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis mtshan pa sngags kyi phreng ba cano// slar gshegasu gsol ba ni sa bon snying po 'am/ de nyid gsum gyi sngags muHzhes bya ba dang ldan pa'o// lag ni rje ga sngon po can gyi sgrub thab slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad bI man ngag rdzog so//
486a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs//
486b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gnang sbyin gyi ste dpon chen po lak+Sha na rda rdza gos ston pa gyi sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das mthu
486b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// nyon mongs gdung pa sel mdzad pa'i// zla ba lta bu'i mthu mnga'o ba'i// thams cad sel zhing snang bar byung // mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo// las
486b3(rgyud 'grel): mtha'i rtsod pa'i dus su ni// las ngan rtsod pa zhi byed pa// nyi ma lta bu'i 'od zer ni// bdag gis pan+da phyir bshad par bya// las kyi dbang gis mo mthun pa'i// na la sogs pa sna tshogs 'byung // de nyid
486b4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms byed mthu yi mchog/ gsang sngags 'khor lo bshad par bya// dang por snod rnams brtan pa'i phyir// slob dpon sgrub po gnyis da // shes rab snying rje ldan pa dang // dam tshig sdom pa gnas pa dang //
486b5(rgyud 'grel): snod rnams dbye ba'i rim shes dang // 'gro don phan sems brtson pa dang // dbang rnams rdzogs shing man ngago thob// rgyud don gzhin rnams shis pa dang // pha rol phyin pa'i don la mkhas pa// bden pa rnam gnyis
486b6(rgyud 'grel): gtan la phe bos// nyon mongs chung zhing sems rnams thul// lus ngag yang gsum spyod lam mkhas// dus dang gnas skabs dbye ba shes// ba dang mi bya'i rim pa dang // gnang dang dgag pa'i rim brtson rnam/
487a1(rgyud 'grel): shes pa de ni slob dpon nyid// dang ldan bla ma la ni gus// g.yo rgyu med pa'i bsam pa yis// rdzas dang lus srog 'bul byed dang // yang dang yang du gsol 'debs pa// spyod lam la sogs mdzes
487a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// ngas ring du ni 'khor byed pa// maN+Dal me tog bcas pa yis// gus pas zhibs la btud byed pa// slob mar zhugs kyis shes par bya// phyag rgya mchog ni don du gnyer// mi rnams kun gyis dben pa yi//
487a3(rgyud 'grel): yid du 'ong ba'i yanas dag tu// yo byad rdzas rnams 'tshogs pa yis// dge pa'i la sogs sngoni 'gro bas// yid gnyis med pa'i brtson 'grus ldan// gus pas man ngag bdud rtsi 'di// glegs bam la ni brten pa
487a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsa mo// bad rtsi 'di// rna rgyung langs te thugs la gnas// zhal gyi sgor bton nas kyang // de bzhin sgrub pos blang bar bya// thabs kyi sbyor bla mya khas pa yis// dang po dus su rdzogs pa dang // rim pa
487a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ye nga // de ltar blangs pa'i don shes ni// gang 'dod pa yi don rnams 'grub// rgyud sogs gzhon nas 'byung ba yis// de lta bu yi don shes pas// sgrub po zhes nis btags pa yis//
487a6(rgyud 'grel): skud/ shes rab snying rje che brtson ni// dang po bla ma bsten gyur nas// de nas rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur// yang na nga tsam mi ldan yang // yul dang dus kyis bskal gyur na// cha rkyen rdzogs par tshang dgos
487b1(rgyud 'grel): pas// bla mu la ni gus pa yis// skyob byed mthu rnams mi 'dra bas// bsam gyis mi khyab mthu ldan pa// nges par shes tu rdzogs par bya// de rnams dgos pa'i bstan pa'i// dper na dpa' bo g.yul zhugs na//
487b2(rgyud 'grel): go rnams rdzogs pur ma gyur pasau// mtshon gyis phog ste slar log lhur// de bzhin bsgrub pa'i chu rkyen yang // mtshang skar la ldog nyon yod// yang na mthu rnams bsam mi khyab// sman gyi mthu rnamasI ji bzhin/
487b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ gang la gang 'phrod las dang rkyen// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// dwe yi don rnams shes bya ba// badre gshegs sras po mkhas pas su// rgyud du bya ba brgyad ces bya// dngos gru bo rnam gnyis thob byed pa'i// bskyed
487b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs shes pa'i gtso bo yis// de yis yan lag 'khor bshad pa// tshogs 'khor sbyin srego gtor chen po// 'khrul 'khor las rnams phran che gos sogs// de rnams las rnams thams cad rdzogs// da tshig
487b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa chur byung na// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bzhengs gsol phyir// dkyil 'khor tshi ga shes par bya// du ma nus pa'i rnal 'bor pas// maN+Dal me tog bcas pa la// brten nas sdig bshugs go cho ga/
487b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// dam tshig nyams pa chen po dang // dang po dbang yang thob pa'i phyiraro// dbang mchog cho ga shes par bya// bar chod myur du byung ba na// stangs stabs bgegs bskrad shes par bya// rnal 'byor 'chi ba'i rtags
488a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ma/ bsgra'i cho ga shes par bya// yid chus zad pa bskyed pa'i phyir// mkha' 'gro'i lung bstun shes par bya// dek+kAt+tartsu ba'i dam tshig yAn// ting 'dzin khyAs+dza su m+b+ha n+yA s+yA byAs+yA// bASh+Tas+yA/
488a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod byas pus don rnams 'grub// bdud rtsi la sogs rdzas rnams ni sgrub thabs sbyor thabs mkhas pa su// lus sogs lA su rung bar bya// de ltar cha rkyen tshang ba yis// phyag rgya'i mchog ni don du gnyer// dngos
488a3(rgyud 'grel): kwa phran tshegs zhar la 'byung // de lta'i gdeng ldan rnal 'byor gyis// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// chu sna grangs bzang po shis pa la// chos skyong bsrings ma la sogs lo// bsgo zhing bgags rnams zhi bar
488a4(rgyud 'grel): yi dmya lha dang slob dpon dang // mkha' 'gro rnams kyi spyan stA ru/ dam bce'u byas te sgrub par bya'o// yi ge brgya stsogs cho ga yis// nyes pa kun ni sbyangs nas kyang // sa gzhi legs pa'i gnas dag tu/
488a5(rgyud 'grel): met+pal me tog legs par bkram/ phyi nang mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kum/ bsags te ma lus brgyan rnams gramA// rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa'i// bde bar gshegs pa'i glegs bam de/ rin chen na bza'
488a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes byas la// ston pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu// gsung gi rtag su gzhag par bya// 'bur ram lugs sam ri su bris// shin tu mdzes pa'i sku mchog de// sku yi rtagasu gzhag par bya// rdo rje dri la sogs phyag
488b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rnams// lugs dang mthun pa'i mdzes pa de// thugs kyi rtagasu gzhag par bya// de dag kun la don dam du// rab tu gnas pa med mod kyang // yang dgra kun rdzob nyid du ni// rgyal ba lhums thugs ji bzhin
488b2(rgyud 'grel): no// de ltar byin brlabs mthu chen pa// ci byas thams cad rdzogs chen 'gyur// de bas brtson 'grus bskyed de bya// gal te rnal 'byor dbul gyur ni// thams cad mos pa'i spyod yul ni// dbul bar ma gyur ser sna
488b3(rgyud 'grel): yis// sog par dA ni mi byed par// chos dang mi mthun spyod pa yis// de bas gus pas brtson 'grus bya// nal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi ni// bskyed drang rdzogs la brten bya ste// dang po bskyed pa'i tshul tshims ni//
488b4(rgyud 'grel): skad ci gA sprul dang cho ga lnga// gsum gyi tshul du bstan pa dang // gnyis las 'byung byed tshul dang ni// gcig lo 'jug pa'i tshul gyi su// cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i gnyi su bstan pa la// thabs
488b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshul gyis 'jug pa dang / shes rab tshul gyis 'jug pa po// thabs kyis 'jug po'i tshul rnams ni// brgyad dkyil dgu'i bdag po la// man ngag stobs kyis 'jug pa drong // bcu drug bzhi'i bdag dkyil la// sbyor
488b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis 'jug pa dang // de dang de las khyad par 'phags// shin tu bskor ba'i gnas dag tu// rim pa bzhin du 'jug pa dang // dang po 'byung byed gnas dag tu// tha ma cig shog 'byung ba la// mgal me'i 'khor lo
489a1(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba yis// rim sogs man ngag shes par bya// shin tu 'jam pa'i spyan dag la// rnal 'byor ci bder gnas nas ni// snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ sa bon spros pas lha rnams gsal// bla ma'i sku
489a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod gzugs 'dzin pa// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la// dang paM lus ngag gus pa yis// phyag 'tshal zhabs la reg par bya// phyi mchod nang mched gsang mchod rnams// rim pas phul nas sdig pa bshags//
489a3(rgyud 'grel): sgyu mi'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// sangs rgyas la sogs bde ba la// dga' ba bskyed de rjes yi rang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// 'gro ba'i don du gsol ba gdab// dkyil 'khor lha la skyabasu mchi// lus kyang gus par
489a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// sems bskyod lam la gnas par bya// phyag rgya mchog tu bsngo bar b+ha// slar yang sdom pa brtan par gzung // dag par byed pa'i sngags brjod pas// mtha' dag stong pa nyid du bsgom// yod pa ma yin / pa
489a5(rgyud 'grel): de la sogs po'i tshig rnams kyis// mtshon te skyong nyid gton la dpapa// spyong nyid dngos pa'i gnas tshul maM/ gang du'ang bsam du med mod kyang // me rtog gi rtog the tshom tsam/ d+he rnams bsal ba'i don ched du// skye med 'gag med/
489a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs brjod// raM las stong pa'i ngang las ni/ 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim brtsegs 'phros// de steng sum las byung ba lo// ri rab chen po bskyed par bya// de steng hUM las rdo rje ni/ rgya gram ljang khu'i dkyil du ni// sa bon 'od zer
489b1(rgyud 'grel): lus 'bros pas// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsi bcwa bcu bsgred// skad cig rdzus skyes tshul dum/ dngas kyi gtso bos khro bcu bsgyung / d+hU bani gsang sngags brjod pa yis// dka' bsgo bas na sprul pa 'phres// gdum pa can ni ma lus bkug/
489b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phur bu'i sngags brjod pas// shin tu khros pos sprul nA sa ni/ brdeg pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdung bar bya'o// me dpung tshogs kyis thal por brlag/ na mkha'i mtha' klas tshun chad du//
489b3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo rnams kyi nang logasu// rdo rje gur dang rlo ba gtams// rdo rje gur gyi nang logasu// gzhal yas khang ni mdzes pa skyed// de steng pad+ma 'dab brkyang gang na// lte bar nyi zla'i gdan ni brtsegs// gdan dang rgyun rnams kun ni rdzogs// /
489b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub cho ga yIs// gtso bo'i sku ni bskyed par bya// dang po stong dang zla ba la// yig 'bru la sogs cho ga rdzogs// rdo rje la ni byin brlabs bsdu// sngags brjod pas ni sku bskyed do// gtso bo mthing nag sku mdog ni//
489b5(rgyud 'grel): zhul gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa 'dod dgur gyur// sku la sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum 'byung po 'dul/ phyag g.yas rdo rje khro bo bsdoms// g.yon na mkha' lding rgyal po spro/
489b6(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo de ltar bskyed nas ni/ shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// rnam rgyal sku mdog dmar po ste// phyag yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin/ g.yon pa dgra sta 'dzin pa ste// bar ma phyag gnyis gung mo dang / mthe bong ngos mdud gzhan rnams
490a1(rgyud 'grel): ga/ cung khar bad+d+ha nas na// 'og zhags pa la zla bzlams/ ya~M pad+ma mgon pa na// sgra mdag nas pa na lnga gtsug pa/ byug+sa nga bzhin gnas pA ste/ g.yas pa yan nAn+ta d+hA byang chum
490a2(rgyud 'grel): sa// nub kyi pad+mar lus ngan 'o// sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis mchod rten ne'i le bsnams// byang gi pad+mar bdud rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis brang bsnol sdigs mdzub
490a3(rgyud 'grel): shar lho'i 'dab mar gyanod mdzes bskyed// sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis gri gug cang te'u bsnams// lho nub 'dab myur ro langs me// sku mdog sngo skya zhu lo gcig pa// phyugu ni rdo rje lcags sgyur
490a4(rgyud 'grel): daTIng // lung mo smin lag la sogs rnams// mtheb me dzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang nas// spyi byor nges par bsnol ba rnams// nub byang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sku mdog dmar skya zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis spyi bor sbyar nas su//
490a5(rgyud 'grel): me lce phreng ba yongasu 'dzin// byang shar mtshams kyi 'dab ma la// 'jigs byed kha dog sngo nag ma// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa// g.yas kyi dang po glang po bsnams// g.yon gyis glang chen lpags pa bsdum
490a6(rgyud 'grel): de 'og dgra sta rdo rje bsnams// tha ma mi mgo lcags kyu bsnams// gru chang po ni la lha mo bzhi// 'od skyeng ma ni sku mdog dkar// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams// yid 'phrig ma ni sku mdog serare// zhal gcig phyan
490b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis spos phor bsnams// kun bzang ma sku mdog dmar po// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro mchog bsnams// glu sgra can sku mdog sngon mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgra spyan gar/ shar sgor khro mor srog gcod ma// zha ba
490b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // phag gnyis tho bzhags pa bsnamaso// lho sgor dbugs rngub sku mdog se ri// zhal gcig phyag gnyis lham gzar nags// nub sgor khrag 'thung sku mdage ngam ra// zhal gcig phyug
490b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gri gug zhags// byang sgor sha za sku mdog sngo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnon pa zhags// de rnams bskyed pa'i tshul rnams kyang // rnal 'byor spros dga' sems byeng phyir// sa bon dag las 'od 'phros pas// so sa
490b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi mtshan ma'i rtags// dang po gsungs te gsum pa dgu// las kyi 'khor lo myur brtson pa// bskyed pa 'am skad cig glog 'gyu'i tshul// cung zad zhigs gsal bar bltas nas ni// sngags kyi cho ga shes pas su//
490b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas rnams// srid zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis su// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs su gsol// mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya// gnod sbyin drag
490b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i sngags kyis ni// bgegs rnams ma lus bzlog par bya// rnam par rtog pa spang ba dang // lus ngag nus pa mthu bskyed phyir// lha rnams so so snyim par bya// yi ge rnams pa gsum dag ni// dag byed sku gsung
491a1(rgyud 'grel): cho gar ldan pa// dang por gsol 'debs cho ga yos// mchog rnams kun du bskul bas su// bde gshegs thams cad mnyes nas kyang // lha mo glu len gar byed mas// bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas kyang
491a2(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin dbang ni bskur bar byas// so so'i rigs kyi lha 'dzin 'gyur// mchog rnams kun tu bskul byas su// bde gshegs thams cad mAnyes nas kyang // slob dpon mi bskyod ya bA yum la// gnyis dang
491a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi man dag blang // de nos lha la mchod pa dbul// phyi mchod nang mchod gsang ba'i mchid// mchod pa tshul bzhin dbul bar bya// phyi ni ji bzhin gzhan dang mthun// nang ni lha yi bde bskyed pa// cig shos
491a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga ru byas pa yin// brtag pa ldan pa de dag ni// gtso bo lnga yang bya ba yin// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// gnyis pa la sogs sbyar ba dang // des ni dang po'i don kyang bya// rigs dang rtags ni ldan gyur pa'i//
491a5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid snyed pa de la byung // de dang dur khrod byung ba yi// snang ba med po mchod yin no// lnga dang bAtsu rA sbyar pa yi// yid du 'ong ba dpag med ma cho ga/ de ni nang gi don bstan to// gu h+ya don ni bstan bya ba// grol dang phyag rgya
491a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyisu bstan/ grol gyis yid kyi gzugs sprul to// phyag rgya rtags ldan dngos 'jug/ mi ljon byin gyis brlab par pa/ de rnams cho ga'i yan lag ni// rten dang brtan pa'i tshul nyid kyis// dang por byin gyis
491b1(rgyud 'grel): brlab par bya'o// rten nI as su byin gyis bAR+sha bA// brtan pasmai gis byin gyis brlab// rton dang brten pa'i gtso bo dang // ya nA la ga rnams la lha rnams kyis/ byin gyis brlab pa bsnam par bya// d+ha ra ma ai yi nang shing du
491b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum rtsa ma yi dkyil 'khor bsam// rin chen pho brang na de shed du// rtag pa nyid kyang bsam par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyis thabs shes rab// lnga lnga yis ni gnasu bstan// bskyod cing dgyes par byed pa nyid// de yi grogs
491b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gnyis dang bzhi// 'gyed par byed dang bskyod par byed// spro bar byed dang sdud par byed// de nyid spro bar byed pa yi// bde dang shin tu bde ba ni// khyad par mchog tu gyur pa ni// gosang don mchog tA spo ba'o// gnyis med ste/
491b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od zer sogs// de sogs cho ga rgyas par bya'o// rdo rje dril bu ljon pa yi sa// rdo rje glu dang ldan pas bstod // hUM gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pho brang mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma tshig/ mthun pa'i don rnams
491b5(rgyud 'grel): sten mdzad pa// rdo rje 'khor bcas phyag 'tsha lo bskyod // rdo rje mi 'gyur 'jigs byed pa// khams gsum rgyal bar byed pa'i mchog/ dpal ldan nag po yon tan mchog/ gsung gi sgra sgrogs rgyal po mcheg// 'phrin las
491b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'byung po 'jigs 'jigs byed gnod sbyin mchog/ dgra la rngam pa'i zang byed ma// rdo rje na mkhar 'gro ba'i mchog/ 'jigs par byed pa'i sku 'chang ma// 'od kyis gsal byed mdzes
492a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ yang du 'ong ba'i yon tAnA ma/ wA spyod byAH byur byung ba'i mchog/ sgra dang gar gyis mnyes mdza ma/ nAm+b+ha pAr d+h+r-ig bA gats+tshad pa'i mchog/ 'byung byinal d+ha d+hang+ga d+ho sa/ d+hAn/
492a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdog can khrags 'thung ma// sa bdag dang ni dri zla'i mchog/ lha'i 'khor lo cho gas rnams la// bstod cing gus pas phyal 'tshalo// drag po 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bstod cing gus bso phyug 'tsha'o//
492a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod cing mchod pa'i man ngag ni// nyid kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// sprul nas nyid la mchod par bya/ 'khor lo gzhan rnams kyang ni mchod/ bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni// dang po gtso bo brtan byos la// de nas
492a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rim gyis brtan// gtso bo rim gyis brtan pa dang / 'khor lo rim gyis brtan pa dang // rdzogs par lta ba gnyi su bya// drang por dbyul tshong phyed tsam la/ de 'og dbugs tshod cig tsam lo// de 'og 'phyo ba
492a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bya/ thun tshod nams kyang rims kyiso// de ltar brtan par gyur nas ni// che bur 'dod na che bar ro// chung bur 'dod na chung ba nyid// mang por spros nas nyung bar bsdu// nyung bar bsdus nas mang por spro// kha dog
492a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// ldang ba yang zhing gzi brjid ldan// yun ring btang yang mi 'chor la// rlung yang ji ltar 'dod par thub// bdud rtsi zas kyis 'tsho bar byed// des su bskyed pa mthar phyin te// bskyed pa mthar
492b1(rgyud 'grel): byon dus su no// mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzad spyod ston// mdzad spyod bstan pa'i dus dag tu/ mdzad spyod bstan pa'i las rnams bstan// de dus gsal zhing gsal gyur nas// yang nas yang du brtag par bya'o// ma
492b2(rgyud 'grel): ngog zab mo ston pa// gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya// do ru bzlog pa'i don ston yang // me 'jigs the tshom med pas su// man ngag bdud rtsi blang bar bya'o// lag ta bskyed pas skyo gyur na// bsgom pa ma
492b3(rgyud 'grel): nus las gzhan phyir// bzlas brjod man ngag rgyas pa rnams// gzhan du bstan pa ming mod kyang // bzlas brjod man ngag bdud rtsi 'di// rin chen lta bu'i gong zag la// rna ba brgyad do 'ongs pa 'do// bstan par
492b4(rgyud 'grel): bye yis gus paro nyon// snying kha'i 'khor lo'i man ngag la// sems dpa' gsum gyis man ngag rdzogs// 'od zer dkar po mdza' tshon tshul// yi ge 'phro ba'i man ngag dgod// 'khor zhing spros pas ljon
492b5(rgyud 'grel): du spros// lce yi rdo rje rtsa mo las// lha yi zhal du spro bar bya// mchod der gnas ni gang 'dod nas// slar la 'khor bas sgrib pa sbyang // sgra cher ma yin sgra chung min// yan lag ma nyams bzlas brjod byed// de ni bai
492b6(rgyud 'grel): yi tshul du bstan// nang gi bzlas brjod bstan pa ni// A d+h+r-i tI'i nang shed nas// kha dog lnga ldan rlung byung ste// de nyid rta yi tshul du bstan// phyir 'byung rta la oM ni zhon// nang du zhon pa'i hUM yin no// gnas par byed
493a1(rgyud 'grel): pa AHnyid yin// de ltar spro zhing bas+t+ra ba la// dang por bcu la bstan par bya/ de nas nyi shu la bstan no// de ltar gyur pa'i rim pa'i mthar// nang gi rims kyi bsdu bar bya'o// snying kha'i thig le'i
493a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas dag la// 'dzin par nus so mchog yin no// de nyid gtan la dbab na ni// nyi khyi tshig stong drug brgya ni// nyin mtshan gcig la rgyu ba yin/ de yang gnas kyi sde tshan bsdu ba ni/ dang por bcu drug gnyis par ni// sum
493a3(rgyud 'grel): tsu ru ni shes pa bya// bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyad du bsdu// bzhi dang gnyis su bsdu ba'o// phyir phyung sgo yi 'byed tshul ni// g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ka yang // shin tu phra ba'i tshul du byed// me dang rlung dang sa dang ni// chu
493a4(rgyud 'grel): bai rang bzhin dam ro dang sngo// ser dang dkar ba nyid du 'dod// pad+ma las dang rin tshan+da dang // rdo rje thabs dang shes rab ni// de yi nus pa de ltar snang // dang po 'byung byed gnas deng ni// longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang // rdo rje
493a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa nyid du 'dod// de yang bsdu na gnyis su snang ka gso bar byed pa srog 'dzin yin// phyi dang nang gi zhes kyang ba// 'chi byed cha rnams ma nyams par// rnam pa gnyisu bstan pa yin// de ltor spyod pa la sogs rnams
493a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po'i yanas lugs yin pas na// sngon du 'gro ba shin tu gtses// bzlas pa'i don la mi 'jug gi/ yang na sngon du song ba yis// rdzogs pa'i don la 'jug par bya// dngos po'i gnas lugs bstan pa ni// rtsa dang rlung dang
493b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems// de yi spros byas ma bstan yang // bsdus pa'i don ni gsung du 'dus// thugs kyi 'khor lo gnas ngag tu// rtswa yi 'dab ma brgyad yin te// de yi dbus su d+hU tI gnas// de yi dkyil na 'od kyi ni// kha dog lnga
493b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan dkyil shed nas// thig le'i rang bzhin byang chub sems// bzhugs pa de la phyag 'tsha lo// de nyid la ni mu stegs kyis// log par rtog pas bdud du 'gyur// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog gis ni// de nyid nges par rtog pas
493b3(rgyud 'grel): su/ dngos grub rnam nyid de las 'byung // dro bas rnal 'byor nan tan gyis// bla mo mnyes par byas nas kyang // bla ma'i zhal gyi sgo nas ni// de nyid man ngag shes par bya// kha dog lnga ldan de nyid la/ dang po bstan par bsdus
493b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// de nas rtags rnams byung ba dang / thig le nyid lo brtan par bya/ de la brtan nas spro bo dang / bsdu ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya// de nyid brtan par gyur pa na/ bod dang shin tu bde ba dang // bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur//
493b5(rgyud 'grel): de 'og na mkha'i dkyil 'kho la// zhag bdun bar du gnas pa 'byung // bdud rtsi 'dom gang lus khyab pas// bdud rtsi zlas kyis gso bar byed// de 'og sgyu ma lta bu yis// dpe brgyad dag la bltas pa su// de nyid nges par
493b6(rgyud 'grel): thugasu chung // de 'og stong pa'i man ngag la// man ngag stobs kyis zhugs pa su// de nyid kho nar nges par mthong / de nas 'gro ba gzhan don la// mos pa mi yin dngos su ni// 'jug pa'i stobs dang ldan par gyur//
494a1(rgyud 'grel): nyin mtshan phrugasu re dag la yang // bde bar gshegs mang po'i dkyil 'khor ston// de yi man ngag don rnams ni// mu lus shes par 'gyur ba yin/ de ltar gzhun don mthar phyin pas// rang don lhun
494a2(rgyud 'grel): grub phyag rgya'i mchog/ skad cig gcig la shes par bya/ phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i mchog/ khyad par phyag rgya mchog rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du 'grub pa ste// sras po tshul ni rdzogs nas kyang // yab kyi don ni rdzogs
494a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// de ltar rdzogs pa'i man ngag ni// rnal 'byor grol lom pa la bstan// phyag rgya'i lom la 'jug tshul ni// rtags dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ma// rtags dang ldan par btsal bar bya// de la btsun nas ye shes ni/
494a4(rgyud 'grel): skye ba thabs kyi man ngag kyang // dang por byin brla bo la sogs bya// de nas mAn drag thun tshod dang // gzung ba'i thabs ni shes par bya// de la brtan par gyur nas ni// dngos grub kyang ni thob por 'gyur// de la mngon par zhen
494a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs na/ mchog ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nga yi zhen po bzlog pa'i phyir// nang gi phyag rgya nyid la brlabs// dA lA brtan par gyur na ni// de yi zhen pa bzlogs pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i phyag rgya gtum mo'i mchog/
494a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid la ni brlab pa'i phyir// 'khor lo la sogs rdzogs byas la// dang po 'byed 'dzums sbyor ba yis// thabs kyi rim pa bslab par bya// dmar po chen po spros shes lo// rtags rnams rim pa lnga po 'byung // de
494b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis// dgug dang mnan pa'i rimA pa yang // dang po bslabs nas 'di la bstan// de la lobs par ma gyur ma/ 'di ru bzlogs pa'i man ngag bstan// de 'og lhan cig ma yin na// man pa/
494b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs la zhugs pa yis// na mkha'i bdud rtsi 'khor lo nI// rim pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rten med rnal 'byor ma// de nyid la ni 'jug par bya// yod dang med pa'i mtha' sogs kyi// rtogs pa thams
494b3(rgyud 'grel): tsacang 'jig pa'i mchog/ kun tu bzang po'i don rtogs pa'i man ngag ni// shes rab snying rje ldan pa dang // bla ma gus brtson 'grus ldan// g.yo sgyu med pa'i bsam pa yis// yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas kyi mchog/ dbul bar
494b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa bstan par bya// 'di ni rin chen gang zag yin// dang po man ngag thob bya'i phyir// g.yo sgyu'i bsam pa ldan pas su// shin tu gus pa sa tshul du byed// mAn ngag thob par gyur nas ni// bla ma la ni rgyab kyis
494b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs// dmyal po yis ni rtswa sogs pa// de ni rgyun du spong ba yin// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan na sa ni// skabs 'dir bsrung ba'i 'khor l-i ni// bsrung ba'i 'khor lor bstan pa yin// dur khrod kyi ni ras ma la// 'khor
494b6(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rim pa rtsom pa yin// de med gyur na gro ga 'am// shing shun dag la bya ba yin// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyud bris nas ni// dbus su snying po'i don bstan la// phyogs bzhi po don ni bsten// mtshams ni 'grub par byed
495a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// 'khor lo rdibs kyi mtshams su ni/ gang yin pa'i ming rnams ni// phyi rol mu khyud bzang po la// thabs dang shes rab yi ge dgod// de ltar 'khor lo brtsams nas ni/ maN+Dal mchod pa la
495a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs bshams// bdag nyid rnal 'byor rdzogs byas la// de yang lha yi 'khor lo bskyed// ye shes lho la mchod byas la// gsol pa btab ste gnyisu bsre// de nas bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas bya// so so ba'i rtsa
495a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di la// bar du ming rnams btsug nas nI// de nas bsrung ba'i sngags gdags bo// sngags rnams kyang ni bstan bya ste/ oM na mo nI lAM bA ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha saM nA pya ta ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM tAM lo kya bi dza
495a4(rgyud 'grel): yaM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la ro Sha Na hUM phuMT/ oM be shra bA Na ye hU~M phaT/ oM A mr-i tA kuN+Do li hi na hA na hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra yaMk+Sh+ma hUM phyiT/ oM badz+ra be t+ya li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta krI ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra be ri yAM hUM phaT/ oM bit+ta ya hUM/
495a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM na mo me ha ra ya hUM phaT/ oM sa myan+ta ta b+hA dri ya hUM phaT/ oM pa sha giN+Di ya hU~M phaT/ oM byU tAM sa ta mI ya hUM phaT/ oM sh+lo sa ga ba ye hUM phaT oM rA ga te br-i tA ye hUM phaT/ oM me sa b+hak+Shi ni hUM phaT/ oM nI
495a6(rgyud 'grel): ba re d+hA ra badz+ra pa Ni hUM phaT/ zhes pa ni drag po'i sngags bsdus pa'o// swA hA zhes pa ni zhi ba'i'o// oM zhes pa ni rgyas pa'i 'o// ho zhes pa ni dbang gi'o// rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa ni bsring ba'i'o// bsrung ba'i sngags ni 'di dag la/
495b1(rgyud 'grel): byar du ming ni gzhug par bya// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo de dag kyang // bzhi tshan bzhi yis bsrung bya dang // gtso bo nyid dang bcas te bsrung // yang na sde tshun so sor bsrung // gtso bo gcig pus bsrung ba yin// yang na
495b2(rgyud 'grel): so so re re res kyang // bsrung ba'i cho ga shes par bya// thams cad kun gyis bsrung ba yi// 'khor lo bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa/ dang po 'khor lo brgyad pa la// rim pa gnyis pa bcu gnyis dang // de 'o gla rim
495b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bcu drug bya'o// mtha' mA mu khyud gnyis dang ljon/ dang po gtso bo'i rim pas dgod// de 'og sde tshan gnyis pa dgod/ thA ma sde tshan gnyis bstan// mu khyud zlum po gnyis la ni// shes rlab thabs kyi yi ge
495b4(rgyud 'grel): dgod // 'khor lo rim pa mi 'dra'i gzhung // rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// zhi bar bya dang dbang du bsdu// rgyas dang drag sogs gzhan dag kyang // man ngag gris ni sbyor zhes bya'o// las bzhi yi ni 'khor lo la
495b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa khri tsho gcig gis 'grub// de'ang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis// bsrung ba la sogs gzhan dge lI/ de ltar bzlas na mchog tu bstan/ nyi shu rtsa gcig tsam bzlas kyang // sngags kyi nus pa mthu rnams
495b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// bsrung dang bskyab 'grub par gsungaso// lha yi 'khor lo 'di nyid la// brten na cho ga gzhan dag ni/ thams cad kun la 'grub par gsungs// de ltar 'khor lo'i man ngag sogs// gab pa'i don dang sbas pa'i
496a1(rgyud 'grel): don/ dgongs pa'i don dang dag bzlob don// nA brgyud 'ongs pa la brtan nas// mun ngag can gyis shes par bya'o// rnal 'byor bsdus pa'i don chang du// rang gi lkug pa'i ltar gyur rag/ las rnams
496a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la 'jug 'dod pas// bcu bdun lha yi dkyil 'khor las/ bcu gsum dag tu bsdud ba dang // de la dgu ru bsdub dang // lnga ru yang ni bsdu bor bya// gaunyisu bsdu ba bcu drug tshogs// yang na sbyin cig rnal 'byor gyis//
496a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu bdun du yang shes par bya// dI ltar bsnyen pa sngon song bas// phan+da gdagos pa dang tshar bcang ba'o// lus dang sgrub pa thams cad la// nges par 'jug par shes par bya'o// sbyor ba'i markyen gzhan dag kyang // dus skus
496a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te shes par bya/ da ltar the tshom med gyur na// mkha' 'gro ma'i stags ston pas// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// bsgrims te shes par ma byas na// rnal 'byor pa ni brlag par 'gyur// de bas mkhas pas na ni
496a5(rgyud 'grel): tan du// sngags kyi lte ba spyod pa ni// bla ma mkhas la mnyan par g+hisa?// mi mkhas tshul 'chos g.yon tsan+da gyis// gnyis ka birAg sde dmyal byar lhungo // mkhas pa rna brgyud thob pa ni// 'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang //
496a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu bzang po nges par bri// de bas bla ma mkhas pa ni// dang po nyid du btsal bar bya// man ngag can ni rnyeng nas kyang // tshul 'chis g.yon can phyir 'breng na// ngal ba don med 'bras bu med// las ngan dus kyi
496b1(rgyud 'grel): tha ma la// gang zag 'dod pa'i dbang gis ni// lta spyod sna tshogs ston pa 'byung // gsang sngags dngos grub ma thob par/ sgra dang tshang ma la brten nas// nga rgyal 'dod pa'i dbang gyur nas// nga rgyal 'dod pa'i dbang gyur
496b2(rgyud 'grel): nas// gsang sngags 'khor lo rtsom pa 'byung // des no yang dug don myi rnyed// la la mu stogs ngag dang bsre// des ni dmyal ba'i gnas su khrid// gusang sngags 'khor lo 'di dag la// de lta'i spyod pa mi
496b3(rgyud 'grel): byung yang // mthu rnams rje chung je chung 'byung // nang dang mu g+he la stsogs drug ni 'byung bar 'gyur// las ngan dus kyi blo ma la// slob dpon sku la badro ba dang / bstan pa 'jigs sogs 'byung 'gyur bas//
496b4(rgyud 'grel): de las bzod ba mi bsgom ste// gseng sngags 'khrul 'khor bskor bai r-i byaM// dwe lis gzhan du byas gyur na// dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar 'gro// dpal ldan rdo rje mthu stobs can// dus gsum bde ga sh+tsa
496b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi su// rigs sngags gsang sngags bdag po ru// dbang bskur mngo' gsol mdzad nas ni// gsang sngags 'khor la mtha' dgo ni// khyod kyis bsdus le khyod kyis bskor// bde gshegs rnams kyi
496b6(rgyud 'grel): bka' yang bsgo// 'khor lo rgyas par bskor nas kyang // de 'og rang gi 'khor lo ni// rtsod pa rgyas pa'i dus dag tu// bskor na las rnams 'grub pa dang // de las gus pa mang 'gyur bas// de yi dus su bstan pa/
497a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rgyal ba nyid kyis de skad gsungs// de bzhin bya dag ni rjes mthun pas// 'di la mos pa'i rnal 'byor ni// phyogs rnams kun gyis gsol gdab dang // bdag rang bsod nams bsags
497a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// 'di bstan pa yi sems paskyed// brtson 'grus dag pa'i sgo nas ni// lha rnams sgrub cing gsol gdub pas// gsang sngags don dang mthun pa yis// sems dpa' skye ba de nyid srung // dpar na nyi ma'i
497a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer ni// bye ba brgya phrag mang po la// gzi brjid khang po'i nang du shwar// de bzhin 'od zer phra mo gcig/ bdag blo yi ni mun par snang // snang ba de yang bdag gis ni// gzhan rnams kun la bstan par bya// nA ngag
497a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di bkod cho ga yis// bdag dang sems can thams cad kun// bsod rnams 'di la brten nus ni// thams cad byang chub thob par shog// slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs chen po rdzogs so//
497a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA bak+Sha sa nA pA ti nI lAM ba ra d+hA ra badz+ri pA tA~M sA d+ha naM/ skad du// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs// do/ na mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// rdo rje mkha'
497a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rgyud dag la// brtan nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di// bdag gis dran phyir bshad par bya// lho'i rnal 'byor yud tsam bsam// rang gi snying khar zla dadakyil bsaM// de yi steng du hUM yig bsam/ hUM las 'od zer 'phros
497b1(rgyud 'grel): pa las// phyi nang gsal nas 'od zer 'phros// bla ma drung ni gos sngon can// dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang // rje su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba gdag/ skyabs
497b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba song ga/ skyabs gsol lus dbul dag rtse bsngo// tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya// de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// de la 'od phung tshul du bdag rang nyid// de yi nang na hUM gnas la// de las tsom 'phros
497b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'gyur// lto bar nyi bsam hUM de nyid// de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur// de yi hU~M gi 'phro 'du yis// khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur// hUM bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis// khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa bkug
497b4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi phur bus yang gi/ btul zhi sbyangs nas namakhar gyur// dwe nis dz+dza gi 'phro 'du yis// rdo rje grur dang ra ba dang // dro ba nyid du gyur pa'o// hUM g+hi 'phro 'dus slar lA zhu// spyod pa nyid las 'od dpung b+h+ri // de
497b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi T+wAM kha sbyar gyur// A lI kI lIs nyi zla brgyan// dbusu a dang hUM sbyar te// kha dog dkararA dmar nyid du blta// 'od zer dkar dmar 'phye 'du las// zhu bas rdo rje pad+mar gyur ka pad steng rdo rje rked nub tsam// lte ba gnyis la
497b6(rgyud 'grel): sgyi la snying pos bskor// de gnyis las ni thugs dang gsung // gnyi gas sku bsdus byin gyis brlab// de nyid 'ong du zhu ba las// rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur// pad+ma las ni khro mor gyur// khro bo rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mdog
498a1(rgyud 'grel): mthing nag zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams// mche ba gtsigs pas 'dod dgur gyur// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril ba'i tshul// g.yon du rdo rje khro mo ni// sku mdog ljang dmar zhal
498a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig ma// phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug gtso lo 'khyud// g.yon pa ban dmar gtso la stobs// gnyis med 'khril ba'i tshul bsgoms nas// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te// phyi nang bdud rtsi mchod nas bstim// 'od zer
498a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'du byin gyis brlab// de bzhin khro chung lus byin brlab// dbang bskur bas ni mi bskyod 'gyur// de ltar bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya// de steng ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ma la sogs bsgoms nas su ka thugs
498a4(rgyud 'grel): kar 'khor ram yul 'khor ba// 'od zer lo ni yi 'obru basbyin// ma gsal bar du bsgom par bya// de ltar rab 'bring tha ma yis// 'bum ma ny+dzu 'dum sum 'bum 'grug/ the tsom med na dngos grub 'grub// dam tshig nyam
498a5(rgyud 'grel): samya sdig che bas// sbyin sreg la sogs mang du bya// mtshon ma gsum mam nus pa brtag/ de ltar byung na bsgrub pa brtsam// sngon du bsnyen po'i cho ga'o// / bsgrub pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni// mkha'
498a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'du ba'i gnas phyin la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por bya// rdo rje gri gug nang du s+t+waM// bar du mo ri gtang bar bya// gaT dang ngagra mdung dang gsum// me ri'i zur nas gtang bar bya// chub ma dur khrod
498b1(rgyud 'grel): sel ba dang // bdud rtsi bug zan gzugs brnyan bya// snying khur gru gsum gzugs brnyan gzhug/ kha gcad seng ldeng pur la btod// mtshan ldan ka pA la ru ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lngas dag // phreng ba bsgreng // rub da
498b2(rgyud 'grel): lho ru kha bltas do// bskyed pa'i tshul bzhin bsgom// thun mong sogs dang khyad par sngags// dgra 'am 'byung po klu rnams la// de ni gos sngon nyid la mchod// lcags kyi gru gsum nang du ni// bdud rtsi shrI lnga khra gsu
498b3(rgyud 'grel): dgang // de ni nag po'i gautor na'o// rnal gri'i snod du dug gtor gsugs// phyi ma gsum dang yungs kar gdab// slob dpon slob ma gnyis ke yang // gos sngon gos nag rgyan cha bo go/ rA ga sha rus pa'i phreng ba bsgrang
498b4(rgyud 'grel): nub dang lho ru kha bltas te// bskyed pa'i tshul bzhin bsgom// thun mong sngags dang khyad par sngags// dgra 'am 'byung po klu rnams la// bzlas pas gsang ba'i rim pa brtsams// snying kha'i mtshan ma la sogs

498b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi gtor mir gdab// yu ngas kar gos sngon can gyis so// phye ma dug nag 'od zer dgang // yungs kar khro chung nyid du spro// rtags byung nas ni gzugs brnyan bzhug/ de nas bsgrub khong them rtsa ru// gru gsu
499a1(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i 'brub khung du// de nyid bcug lnga kha gcad rI rab bri/ de steng mnan cing stang stabs bya// de ni mnan pa'i sbyor ba'o// phur bus gdab cing gri glug gtu // de nas gru gsum gtor mar
499a2(rgyud 'grel): dbul// nag po chen po nyid la bsdu'i// drag sngags bzlas pa'i gtor ma yis// gsang ba'i man ngag shes par bya'o// yang na sbyin sreg nyid kyis bya// de rnams gsung pa'i sbyor ba'o// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bskrad pa
499a3(rgyud 'grel): yis// lte bar gtso bo bskyed nas ni// klu chen brgyad po 'dab mar bskyed// rin chen snod du gtor ma bashram// chu gtsang sman la sogs pa dang // khyad par klu sman sna tshogs dang // dkar gausum mang gsum rnam
499a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bya// snang zhing byin gyis brlabs sogs bya// kA lA byin pas zhe sbyong ni// lhag ma 'khor la byin pa yis// glanod pa rnams ni zhi bar 'gyur// sngogs bzlos 'od zer phog pa yis// gtso do'i dam tshig rjes phyin
499a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ 'kho ra rnams zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur// yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya// bskrad dang bcing dong dgug pa yis// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni// sbyor ka chen por shes par bya// 'khor lo ser po'i lte bar gci
499a6(rgyud 'grel): mdun du rgyal po bskyed par bya// de yi g.yas su nor lha ni// sku mdog dkar po 'dzum bag can// nor bu'i sgrom ni g.yas g.yon bsnams// mchod cing bstod pa gsang sngags bzlas// gzugs brnyan 'di la
499b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen brtem// kha dog lnga dang gser gyis mtshon// kha dog ser po'i bzlas thams nas// ni 'dod pa yi nor rnams ster// de ni thun mong dngos grub po// bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal la// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya//
499b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar gsum mngar gsum nyid la ni// sngags bzlas ri lu byas te bza'// zas dang sman ni srang lA badz+re/ brjes zin zhag gsum 'bras bu 'byung // de gsum skye ba bdun pa dang // yum gyi cha sres smon
499b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams sbyar// de sgrub 'od zer btul zhing sbyang // rtags byung nas ni bza' zhing byugs// de yis thun mong dngos grub 'grub// mchog gi yang ni grogasu 'gyur// mchotshig gi dngos grub bsgrub pa yang //
499b4(rgyud 'grel): thubs ka yI ni dkyil 'khor du// rtswa rgyud 'dab ma brgyad du bsam// de dkyil rtsa ni lnga rta'i tshad// da yi nang du dbugs kyi lha// kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'o// de dkyil thig le byang chub sems// de la
499b5(rgyud 'grel): lte zhing bsgom pa ni// rtags lha'i mthar ni stong nyid 'gyur// de nyid spro zhing bsdu ba dang // dgug cing bskyil pa'i rim pa 'am// mnan cing bzlog pa'i man ngag gis// rim gyis ye shes skye bar 'gyur// /

501b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor lam pa'i don chen du// rgyud rnams kun dang mau 'gal ba'i// dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya// slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan po yis// sngon du bsnyen pa brdzogs byas te// de nas dkyil 'khor
