502a1(rgyud 'grel): ba rnam par bya'o// slob ma snod dang ldan pa yis// sgrub ma snang dang ldan pa yas// dang por gsol gsum btab nas nas ni// bsnyen pa rdzogs gting la gdab par bya// dang por swa ni brtag par
502a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ phyogs tshad dbyibs ldan skyon bral ba'i// mkhaskye pas ci nus brtag par bya// maN+Dal legs byas me tog dgram// lha yi gnas dang gdun du bsam// lha bskyed la sogaso byas nas ni// mchod dang
502a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod po tshul bzhin bya// dgongaso cig dus gsum mgon po rnams// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang // slob ma rnams la sman skad du// badrag ming 'i zhes bgyi ba yis// dpal ljon rdo rje 'dzin pa yis//
502a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa 'obyi bar 'tshal// rgyal sras dang bcas rnams kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol// zhes lan gri sum du brjod de// gsel ba gdab par bya'o// de nas chos skyong ba'i srungs ma
502a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// mchod dang gtor ma byin la ni// bstod cing gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas los thams cad pa'i thab khung du sbyin sreg gis sbyang bar bya'o// sbyin sreg grub par ma gyur na// las thams cad pa'i
502a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags chus// bgegs ni nye bar zhi bar bya'o// de nas ji ltar brtags dbus su// byin brlabs rdo rjes khru gang ba rko// skyon rnams spangs nas sa rin btsal// 'thas par bcags la byug par bya//
502b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin brlabs pa'i// ri rabA gzhal yas bskyed nas ni// lha bskyed la sogs rdzogs byas la// de nas skad cig myur du khros// 'khor rnams kyis ni gsol ba gdab// khro bo mig dang
502b2(rgyud 'grel): rkang sogs byin gyis baurlabs// rdo rje dril bu gnyis bzung nas// steng stabs sbyor ba la sogs kyis// bgogs rnams ma lus tshar gcad// de nas sa yi lha mo la// mchod bstod gsol ba btab pA yis//
502b3(rgyud 'grel): dpung po phyir ni sta gon gnas// bdud rtsi thig le la sogs bya// lha rnams cho go la sogs rdzogs// de nas gsol ba gdab par bya// bdug spos lag thogs pus btsugs li// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa
502b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor bdag ni bri bar bya// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchong pa'i phyir// bcom ldan
502b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gus pa la// de ni gnang ba mdzad par rigs// sangs rgyas 'gro don bya don gsol// byang chub sems dpa' gosang sngags lha// 'jig rten skyong dang mthu chen dang // gang yang rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'i//
502b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin g+hi dkyil 'khor du// yo byad ci yod pas 'dri na// dang bdog slob mar bcas pa la// thugs brtse bor ni dgongs su
503a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas// ra pa dra bas mtshams bya'o// gser la sogs pa'i bum pa yI//
503a2(rgyud 'grel): lto ba che ba mgrin ring ba// skyon spangs nyes pa bral ba dang // yon tan la sogs lha grangs bstan// rdzas dang kha rgyun mgul chings ldan// mtshan ma rdzogs nas byin gyis brla'o// rnam rgyal las kyi bum pa la// khyud
503a3(rgyud 'grel): byar cho ga la sogs bya// de nas slob ma blo ldan la// slob dpon gyis ni cho ga bya// slob ma s+thi yis drung du gnas te// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mogan/
503a4(rgyud 'grel): po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni bdug la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ dkon mchog gsum ni bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i phreng mchog tu// mgon po 'ad
503a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par 'tshal// de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas// slob dpon gtso bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs// tshigs bcad 'di ni gsang sngags sbyin// bu tshur theg pa chen po yis// gsang sngags tshul spyod cho ga 'di// khyod la yang
503a6(rgyud 'grel): dag bstan par bya// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // rdo rje gas sngags rab bsgoms pa'i// dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du// thams cad ma len pa
503b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med do// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dpung chen dag kyang de yi bcom// 'jig rten rdzus 'jug par rtogs nas// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan/
503b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di bgyi shog ces smraso// gnas skyabs 'gro sdig bshags la sogs kun// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor nyid du shes par bya// srog chags rnams ni bsod mi
503b3(rgyud 'grel): byadamya byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod pa dag kyang spyad mi bya// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi// chang ni myos par btung ma yin/ sems can gdul bya ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad spangs// dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing
503b4(rgyud 'grel): rnortsol 'byor can du bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnamo gsum dang // ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ci nus pau ru rjesu bsrung // sems can don la rgyu ba mi phyogs// theg pa dam+ba ni le
503b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod mo bAk+Sha'i khor bA dag kyang spyang mi bya// rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi bya// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de la brnyas par mi byi zhing // phyag rgya bzhon po mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o// de ltar dam tshig phog
503b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ blo ldan khyod kyi rtag tu srung // mdor na rtsa bo yan lag gi/ dam tshig nyin mtshan bgrang zhing bsrung // de nas bla mos gsungs pa yi// sdom pa legs par bzung bar bya// tshul khrims zhes bya sogs pa ni//
504a1(rgyud 'grel): dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ ji srid byang chub snying po'i byar// bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi// de ltar sdom pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma la/ snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba gsum du rdo rje khu tshur gyis
504a2(rgyud 'grel): dri'i thig le gsum du b+ha ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang pad+ma'i yi gyi gsum so sor bkod la/ sku gsung thug su byin gyis brlab cing las thams cad pas bsrung bar bya/ de nas mchod pa bya ste/ spyi bor me tog dang spros/
504a3(rgyud 'grel): mar me dang dri ni snying khar ro// lha bshos mdun du'o// de nas tshig ni 'dis su sbyin// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su// 'khor ba'i nyes pas mu gos parA/ mchod pa kun dang lhun par ni// dus kun du ni bde bar mnos
504a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas tshems shing la sogs sbyin par bya// 'jig rtenA du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ brgya lam zhes bya bA la stsogs pa'i chos bshad par bya'o// de nas thig byin gyi sde brlab pa la
504a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa shes par bya'o// de nas thig skung gradab pa ni// dkyil 'khor spyi dang mthun pas na// tshon rnams byin gyis brlabs nas ni// tshon rnams dgye ba'i las bya'o// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dkyil du// zla ba'i
504a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i gdan sta su// gtso bo bri bar bya ba yin/ 'dab ma brgyad la lho brgyad bri/ gru chad bzhi la lha mo bzhi/ sgo bzhir sgo ba bzhi bri'o// de 'og lhag chad bskod bya'o// ni mkha' 'degs par 'dod pa dang /
504b1(rgyud 'grel): yang bskyed yang spyad byed pa gnyis// gang ltar mos pa 'jug pa yis// gtso bo sngon du 'gro bya rdzogs pa yin// 'khor rnams sprul pa 'am cho gas bskyed// dbus su gtso bo sku mdog sngon po ste// zhal gcig phyag g.yas
504b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsnoms// gau yon ni gdul bya'i skabs dang sbyar// shar gyi pad+mar rnam par rgya le// sku mdog dmar po dbu gsum po// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// g.yon po dgra sta bor mA gnyis// gung mo mthe bo ngos mdud
504b3(rgyud 'grel): nas// gzhan rnams yongasu brkyang bo yin// de nyid snying khar bzung nas ni// de 'og zhugs pa ral gri bsnams// lho yi pad+mor mgon po ni// sku mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas g.yon tsan dan pad chen
504b4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa bsnams// nub kyi 'dab mar lus ngan po// sku mdog ljang khu zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis mchod rten ne le bsnams// byang gi 'dab mar bdud rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis
504b5(rgyud 'grel): brang bsnol sdigs mdzub 'phyar// shar lho'i 'dab maru gnod sbyin bskyed// sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis gri gog cang te'u bsnams// lho nubo pad+mar ro langs me// phyag gnyis rdo rje lcogs sgrog
504b6(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas su// gung mo srin lag la sogs gsum po rnams// dam por bkug nas yongs su bsdam// mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste// spyi bor nges par bsnol ba bsnamos// nub byang 'deb mar
505a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro mamA// sku mdog dmar skya zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis spyi bor sbyar nas su// me lce phreng ba yongs su 'dzin// byang shar mtshams kyi 'dab ma la// 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro gdong sngo nag
505a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa// g.yas kyi dang po glang po bsnams// gAyon pa glango chen lpags pa bsnams// de 'og dgra sta rdo rje bsnams// tha ma mi mgo lcags kyu bsgoms// gru chang bzhi la lce ma
505a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// 'od skyed ma sku mdog dkar mo// zhal cig phyag gnyis me tog bsnams// yid 'phrog ma sku mdog ser mo// zhi la rtsig phyag gnyis pa dri'i spos phor bsnams// kun bzang ma sku ma dog dkar mo// zhal gcig
505a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis ro mchog bsnams// glu sgra ma sku mdog sngon mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgra snyan gar/ shar gyi sgo ru srog gcod mA// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // phyag gnyis tho ba zhags pa bsnams
505a5(rgyud 'grel): nub sgor khrag 'thung ma sku mdog de mar mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri gug zhugs// byang sgor sha za ma zhal gtsug phyag gnyis rnon po zhugaso// du ltar gsel bar bskyed nas su// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
505a6(rgyud 'grel): nas// na mkhar bzhugs pa de nyid la// mchod bstod byas nasau dam tshig gis// dkyil 'khor dag la bstim par bya// de nasau bdag nyid shar sgo ru// dang po nyid nas mes po'i tshul// shar sgo ru ni gnas pa'am// yang ni phi
505b1(rgyud 'grel): nas sras kyi tshul// de nas byin brlabs dbang bskur bya// mchod dang byastod pa rdzogs byas la// sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod thim pa dang // slob ma dkyil 'khor gzhug byar bya// de nas yol bas bcad pa'i bar du/
505b2(rgyud 'grel): lngas kyi chu ge tor ba dang / gdong g.yogs bcing ba dang / yon phul nas ni mthong ba dri// chu blud bka' bka' bsgo byas nas me tog dor// mig dbye lha d+yo de ni rim bzhin bstan// dri nas dbang bskur
505b3(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin bya// yab yum snyoms zhugs 'od zer las// bde gshegs 'ong bskul bum par thi mi// ma 'dres pas ni 'od zhu nas// spyi bor chu yi dbang bskur ro// tshigs bcad 'dis nI sbyin par bya// sku
505b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung dam tshig las byung ba rI// ye shes bdud rtsi las byung ba'i// ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med// lha yi chu ni drag pa yis// mi bskyod pa yi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra A daR+YA dz+nyA nu a b+hi Shiny+tsau zhes pa so// dbu
505b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan man dragA shes byas laM// 'di skad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes de// dbu rgyan rin tshan+da dam bu ste/ dbu rkyen rin chen mchog 'gro bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// oM s+ya man+ta dz+nyA na rat+na nA ma hUM
505b6(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha a b+hiny+tsi zhes poso// rdo'i man ngag shes byas la// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang // mi phyed rdo rje 'od gsol ba// dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa// rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro// oM pra ta a b+hi She ka d+hI na
506a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra i b+hi Shiny+tsa/ dril bu'i man+ta ngag shes byas la// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'gro don mnyam med byed pa dang // mchod pa'i las rnams rdzogs byed pas// rdo rje las kyi dbang
506a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur ro// oM kri tA nud+d+ha dz+nyA na badz+ra a b+hI Shiny+tsa// ming gi man dog shes byas la// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas// byang chub snying po'i bAr du ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi g.yo blos// rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags
506a3(rgyud 'grel): oM pr-i ti sho d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tuM dz+nyA na nA ma A b+hi Shiny+tsA mI// de nas dam tshig gsu mau gyi dbang bskur bya ste/ dkyil 'khor phyi rgyud cho ga bzhin/ tshigs bcad rnams kyang bsgrag par bya// oM AHhUM/ de gsum man+ta ngag 'od
506a4(rgyud 'grel): zer ni// bla ma las ni shes par bya// de nis mi long dbang bskur bya// gong ma bzhin du mAn dag+ho gtso// de nas khyad par dbang bskur ni// phyag rgyu'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// goso sngon sgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba rdzogasaso//
506a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon 'dod pa yis// yon gyis bla mya mnyes byas lo// phyag 'tshal nas ni gsol ba gang bya// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas lo// ji ltar mchod cing gsol mdzad pas// bad ga lA bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/
506a6(rgyud 'grel): na mkha'i rdo rje bdag la gsol// zhes gsol ba gdob bo// de nas shar phyogasu dkyil 'khor chen po dang // ba ra du 'dom gyis mchod par ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bris la de'i steng du dbang stegs kyi
506b1(rgyud 'grel): khri byas la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa seng ges mtshan pa bzhag ste/ de la gdugs la sogs pa thams cad kyis klubs la/ rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha thams cad kyi bum+ba ba dang / las thams cad kyi bum
506b2(rgyud 'grel): pas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dbugs dbyung ba dang / dus dang 'khor la sogs pa'i dbang byin la/ de nas dkyil 'khor
506b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bstan de nyid bstan de nas yon phul la de nas gseng ba'i dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab bo// gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yang 'od dang / grib ma'i tshul du g.yon du bsems la// man ngag bzhin
506b4(rgyud 'grel): du byang sems dpab// phab pas sbyin par bya ba dang // yang na bdud rtsi rnam lnga ni/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag nas// sa bon lnga la rigs lce ni/ snyems bzhugs bdud rtsir zhu bar bsam// yang na
506b5(rgyud 'grel): dbab pa'i tshul du bya// yang na dngos su dbab pa dang / yang na gnyis kas bya ba yin// bcu gang gi ni lde gu sbyar// cha gnyis bsres pas gong bzhin no// tshigs bcad 'dis ni gsol bA gdab// rdo rje sems
506b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' khyod sangs rgyas kyis ni bde ba 'grub// rnam dag byang chub sems dpa'o ni// rgya cher sras su bcas pa rnams// yun ring stong nyid sgom gdung la/ dga' bas yid 'ong bde chen gyis ni dgyes par mdzod//
507a1(rgyud 'grel): kye 'dod chags dri med kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ste// dga' ba'i 'dod chags rdo rje'i dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas// dga' ba rnam pa drug po spyod pas shin tu gdung ba ni// rab tu dgyes dbang
507a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i bde ba nyid kyis 'jug par 'tshal// byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar 'byung ba'i// ma lus rgyal ba rnams ni lus skams la// rnam da rdo rje las byung ye shes chu// dri med rin chen spyir dbab dpung bsku
507a3(rgyud 'grel): ro/ mnyam dang mi myanyam 'dod chags tshul dog blas// pad+ma'i gnas su rbo r+d+ha g+hA t+to mdzad pa// sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can byurlag gyur pa// sbyor ba gzhan pa yin pa ma thogs bshad par byas /
507a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' khyod dbang mchog bde bar byed pa yi// rdo rje pid+ma dbye bya'i tshulce gyis sbyor mdzad de// rgyul b+ha kun gyi gzugs sku rab stan nas// thams cing bde grub nyid kyis byudag la dgyes par mdzod//
507a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis mcho byas la// mtshan ldan snang myos blangs nas ni/ rdo rje srin mtheb byin byirlabs la// oM a mr-i ta~M gu d+ha oM b+hiShi ts+yai zhes pos mgrin par gsung la dbul bar bya'o// skyob mas kyang bdud ni rgyun
507a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam la a ho su zhes pas btung bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o bstod pa yang bya'o// da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyag rgya la brten mi 'jig la// man ngag 'di ni bstan
507b1(rgyud 'grel): bAb+hah+lAs+ya/ smr-i nAm+b+ha pA ts+tsham+b+ha mangs / m+b+han+ta m+b+hab+h+yaSh+Ta byu byu / yA ts+tsha d+h+r-im+b+ha l+lA na/ m+bu'i mun dag skrun pa dang // yAt+ma s+yAHr+m+mA/ aT m+b+ha/ pyug+sang+gA sbyor ba bstan du nga // stsu n+d+ha r+dz+dza T+TaH/
507b2(rgyud 'grel): mthu chen gyis// byugs pas dga' ba skye 'gyur ro// slob maso yin dbul gsol ba gang po// mchod cing bstod pas mnyes byas la/ 'di skad tshig kyang brjod por bya// khamos kyu sum+b+ha la ni rnam grol zhing //
507b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa// 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// phung po rnams dang skye mche do rnams la me brten cing // phyin tsA log las rnam grol zhing // na mkha'i dang ni mnyam
507b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing // 'dod pa dag gis mA gos pa// dmyigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam rtag med cing kun rtog med// thugs ni rab tu mi gnas pa// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi thugs// dmigs med khyod la phyag
507b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// ji ltar na mkha' gnas med cing // spros med dge slo pa med pa ltar// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' bo'i// dmig sde med khyod la phyag 'argya le// thams cad spyod pa'i rang bzhin tson// mngon
507b6(rgyud 'grel): par byang chub blta bar 'tshal// dga' mchog ske nas bstod mdzad pa/ lhan cig ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas sngags 'di brjed par bya'o// oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ zhes pa lan bdun nam ti
508a1(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// de nas dbang bzhi bstan pa ni// bzhung lugs mi 'dra mang mod kyang // dang po'i tshig rten man ngag ni// rna ba dag tu brgyud pa yin// tha ma lhan cig dga' ba yin// drang po bum pa'i
508a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis nI// man ngag rnams ni bstan pa yIn+da/ dwe nas gsang b+ha yi bstan l-I// khyud par+ya sngags rnams don dang bcas rnams ni// rna ba brgyud byar bya ba ni/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+hi rA badz+ra b+hU Ni hUM hUM phaT// oM prAd+d+ha ti sa ta na
508a3(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT// oM sha s+t+ra gA ba yi hUM phaT/ oM ga ti pri ya ni hUM phaT/ oM maM s+ya b+hak+Shi ni hUM phaT// oM trai lokya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM mo hUM kA l+yA ro Sha Ne hUM phaT/ ma~M badz+ra pA ta liM hU~M phaT// oM baM shra ba NA
508a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki yai hUM phaT// oM a mr-i tA kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+ha re ya hUM phaT/ oM pra bit+sa na ye hUM phaT/ oM ma nA ma hA ra nA ya hUM phaT/ oM sa man+ta b+he drA ya hUM phaT/ oM shad+d+ha gI tI ya hUM phaT/ oM nI /
508a5(rgyud 'grel): bai ra d+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yauk+Sha se na pA tA yai hUM hUM phaT// sngags kyi don rnams mA shes na// dag gi sgrib pa mi bdag phyir// de na slob dpon na brgyud kyi// man drag de laM nan tanA b+hi/ de nas shes rab ye shes kyi// man ngag
508a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni bstan par bya// dga' ba bum pa'i don bston la// mchog dga' gsang ba'i bstan no// khyad par shes rab ye shes bstan/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ni// bzhi pa kho na bstan pa yin// yang na bum pa'i dbang bskur
508b1(rgyud 'grel): nas// bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin/ de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur nas// rdo rje bzlas pa bstan par bya// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur nas// sems dben par ni bstan par bya// de nas sgyu ma la gnas pas
508b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'i man ngag bstan par bya// de nas 'od gsal la gnas pa sa// zung 'jug ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// zung 'jug ting 'dzin mthar phyin pa// chos kyi sku zhes de la bya// de ltar bzhi pa'i rna brgyud bstan/ dpang
508b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur rdzogs nas tshogs 'khor bya// gtor ma btang nas mkha' 'gro bskang // sbyin sreg gis ni lcug chad bskung // yi ge brgya pa zlos byed cing // dkyil 'khor bskor zhing sgra rnams brdung // ye shis gshegs
508b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ting 'dzin bsdu// rdul tshon chags la chu la dor// maN+Dal zhal bsil dga' ston bye// rnal 'byor lam pa'i don chad du/ rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal ba'i// dkyil 'khir cho ga 'di byas pas// 'di
508b5(rgyud 'grel): byas dge ba'i ba yis// bdag dang mthu' yas sems can rnams// thams cing byang chub thob par shog// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad po rdzogaso//
508b6(rgyud 'grel): lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
509a1(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa bzhug so//
509b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tsha'o// lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di// rgyud rnams kun las mi gsal ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yis rgyus btab la// rnal 'byor blo dman don du ni/
509b2(rgyud 'grel): yang nas yang du gsol btab nas// yid tshes brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir// man ngag rim pa bstan pa la// bla ma la ni mnyan par gyis// gsang sngags sgo ni dpag meng nas// thabs kyi rim pa mang gsungs pa//
509b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can las ni sna tshogs pas// so so mos pa mi mthun phyir// dbyer na snyun rnams nus pa yis// nang rnams so sor sel ba bzhin// man ngag thabs rnams so sos kyang // dug gi nang rnams 'joms par
509b4(rgyud 'grel): byed// dper na sman nus gcig gis kyang kaphrad pa tsam gyis nor 'joms pa'o// yang na gnyis 'joms gsum 'joms dang / bzhi 'joms lnga 'joms la sogs dang // mang po 'dus nas 'joms pa dang //
509b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun gyis ma choms pa// sbyor ba gzhan log 'joms pa dang // gzhan pa kho nas 'joms pa dang // sman dang sbyor ba de dag kyang // mkhas pa yis ni 'joms par 'gyur// mi mkhas pas ni gnod par 'gyur
509b6(rgyud 'grel): sman pa mkhas par gyur kyang ni// brtson 'grus nan tan ma byas na// nad rnams 'joms par mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin mthun pa'i dpe rnams kyang // mkha' 'gro ma yi lung bstan na// zhib pas 'di ru ma phye'o//
510a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nyon mongs 'joms// bsgoms pa las byung dngos grub kyis// mchog gis dngos grub thob par 'gyur// ting 'dzin thob par ma gyur pas// tshogs 'khor tshogs
510a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod dngos grub po// de ma byung na sbyin sregs gis// dngos grub bsgrub par gsungs pa yin// de ma byung ba bzlas brjod do// de ni mi byung gtor mas bye// de rnams kun lA ma byung ni// las ni phran tshegs gzhan lnga
510a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan// yang na dri dag thams cad kyang // gcig 'dus gnyis 'dus gsum 'dus dang // bzhi 'dus lnga 'dus la sogs pas/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba gsungs pa yin// yang na mchog 'dod pa la ni// thams
510a4(rgyud 'grel): cad rdzogs par dgos par gsungs// thun mong dngos grub bsgrub pa la// che chung gis ni rim pas gsungaste// sbyor ba re res kyang ni 'grub// gsang sngags le lA'i bzhed kyis ni// dper na sbrul nI gshu bur zhugs/
510a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bar 'gro dang tse tor 'gro// de bzhin rnal 'byor sngags pa yang // rig 'dzin sa dang rdo rje dmyal// la la dag gi gzhong gis ni// bar ma ngo nas 'gro ba'o// le la skye ba phyi ma la// la la ngag gi bzhi da kyis ni// gnyis
510a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gsum pa dag la'o// bzhi pa 'am lnga par 'dod pa'ang yod// la la skye ba bdun pa l-i// phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'dod// de ltar gzhung lugs mi 'dra ba// mang du gsungs pa de dag kyang / 'gal ba
510b1(rgyud 'grel): med de kun kyang bden// gsang sngags kyi ni gzhung gis kyang // skye ba bdun gyi tha ma la// ma bsgoms kyang ni sangs rgyas sa// zhesu rgyud las bstan pa yin/ skye ba bdun zhes bya ba yang // sngags pa'i byang
510b2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' yin// sngags dang sman la stsogs pa yi// stobs kyis lus sems las rung ba// sha drang thod pa la sogs pa// byasten cing zlos pas dngos grub tho'o// de bas sngags mthu'i yon tan
510b3(rgyud 'grel): no/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa le// skye ba bdun pa 'od srid kyang // de ltar 'ong ba shin tu dkon// skye ba bdun pa zhes bya'i kan/ phal tshar dur khrod chen po yi/ mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas su skye// rig 'dzin sa
510b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bA yang // gcig ni de la 'ang bya ba yin// rigs 'dzin sa la'ang gsum yod de// dur khrod rin chen sa dang nAM// bar snang lha gaunas lha rten sa// mkha' spyod 'og min stug po'i s+ya// gnas ni de
510b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum yin par gsungs// skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni// yul dang gnas ni khyad par can/ sngags spyod pa'i gnas dag tu/ 'ga' tsam 'byung ba dag kyang yod// skye bye gcig sogs gzhan pa ni// /
510b6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams gnas kyang de bzhin no// skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni// de de dang snying rje la sogs ldan// pha rol phyi ni bcu'i chos la spyod// mthun 'jug spyong pa kun la mkhas// bzo dang rig pa gnas la mkhas
511a1(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha 'am nor gdang du gyub/ spyod pa la dor thabs la mkhas// mAn ngag mthong bla tsam gyis maM/ the tshom med par 'jug par byed// man ngag bsgoms ma thag tu ni// ting 'dzin sgra 'gyur/
511a2(rgyud 'grel): radwa glu ni// khams dang dus kyi bye brag shes// rgyad lung mtshon gyi man ngag la// bos pa tsam gyis dgu zha byas kyi// man ngag rnams ni khrod du chud// bshad po'i rgyud dang 'grel pa dang // mngon rtogs pa yi rim pa
511a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// ma thos pa ru shes par 'gyur// dper na shIng 'dzar sprul pa tsam+b+ha// rgyud lung man+ta ngag mdo mAdo yi// mkhas pa la ni brten pas smra// thams cad don rnams khod chung nas// skabs phyed spyi
511a4(rgyud 'grel): don shin tu rgyus// da/ 'grel mngon rtogs rim pa ni// rtsom nus don la shin tu ma khas// mig ni yun rings mi 'dzums shing // yings lha bsgoms dus su ni// skye ba bdun pa'i grib ma snang // skyo ba la
511a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs gzhan po la// grib ma'i rtags kyang de bzhin no// bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi khyad par gyis// zhag bdun zla gnyig zla bdun du// mkha' 'gro masna ni lung ston zhing // chos bshad rtags rnams ston par mdzad// chos
511a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis ni mdze spyod kyang // dngos su sprul nas ston pa dang / yang sprul sum sprul la sogs su// sprul nas ston dang yid na ni/ sku ni mi snang sgra yi su/ nam mkha' las su ston pa dang // yang na phyag
511b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan la sogs la// sgra byung nas ni ston pa dang // yang na rmi lam mtshan mas su// dus bzhi dus gsum dus gcig tu// yang nas yang du ston pa'o// ma thos pa yi man ngag rnams// sgron myor byung na skye bdun
511b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs// sngags kyi drangos grub thob pa yi// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin byang chub sems// yang ni dang po skyes nas ni/ theg chen chos la mos nas yang // mun ngag sgom la shin tu dag la/ slob dpon lo ni min
511b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi/ rna rgyud gcig tsom thos pas su// bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ de nus gong bzhin du byung nus su// gzhan la yang ni ston par nus// yang ni skye bdun gang zag ste// skyes ma
511b4(rgyud 'grel): thag tu yi dmau lhas// rmi lam nA ni tshwa se bstan nas// man ngag de bsgoms dang sa grub ni// phra myomo dag ni thob nAs kyang // gzhan la chosaM naM ston par nus/ de naso rim gyis gzhan yang 'byud/
511b5(rgyud 'grel): yang ni skye bdun gling zag de// rkyen ni gnyis po 'dzem pa las/ bsgom pa la ni dga' bar 'gyur// sngon gyi bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni/ 'bad rtsol drag po ma byas par// thun cig la ni sbom bai rlud//
511b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas rims kyis bsgoms pas su// zhag bdun nas ni lung ston 'byung // de nas rim gsum gong ma bzhin// de nas mngon shes drug ldan nas/ phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sngags pa'i
512a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub thams cad kun// skye ba 'di la phyag rgya thob// de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pa// gong ma bzhin du skye bdun du// len pa'i rtags ni gong bzhin 'byung // skye ba 'di thob tshul rnams kyang // theg chen snod du
512a2(rgyud 'grel): rung ba lnga// dbang bskur man ngage thob pa yis// dem chog ma nyams bshugs laM brtson// bskyed rims bstan par gyur pas ni// lus kyi rnam rtog bzlogs nas kyang // rdo rje bzlas la brten nas rba// sems dben pa la brtan par bya//
512a3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi 'khrul rtog bzlog nas kyang // sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas// 'od gsal la ni 'jug par bya// de nas spos med man ngag la// lhun gyis 'grub 'gyur phyag rgya'i mchog/ yang na bskyang rim la brten nas// tshol dbang po'i
512a4(rgyud 'grel): rig 'dzin sgrub// tshe la dbang sgrub rig 'dzin gyis// rdzogs pa'i man ngag bsgom par bya// des su phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob// yang na bskyed rim brtan pa yis// rdzogs pa'i man ngag gang bsgoms kyang // zla ba drug gis phyag rgya
512a5(rgyud 'grel): 'thob// rdzogs rims bskyed pa la brten nas// de nas rdzogs pas rdzogs pa'i ni// phyog rgya'i dngos grub thob par gsungs// de ni slob dpon chen po'i gzhung // spyir na lta ba gding 'gyur gtso// lan cig ldog bya'i tshu lo du ni//
512a6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas the tshom mi skye zhing // ldog par mi 'gyur 'byung pos kyang // tshugs par mi 'gyur 'bras bu myer// de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pas// man ngag nyam su lon por bya// man ngag bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni// mkha 'gro ma
512b1(rgyud 'grel): yis lung ston pas// lung ston pa'i dus su ni// lta ba man ngag zab mo ni// bstan pa bsgoms pas phyag rgya 'thob// yang na rnal 'byor rim pas ni// blo yi rab 'bring khyad par ni// bag chags rkyen la stsogs pa yis// rab
512b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bring dgu dang gsum dang nI// dbye bar bya ba'i don shes gA/ rgyu rkyen 'dzem pa'i gang zag ni// skye ba 'di la lung ston pas// phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rkyen ni rab tu mang gyur pa'i// rab kyi 'bring sogs ldan pa
512b3(rgyud 'grel): can// bar ma do la lung ston no// rab kyi tha ma ldan pa ni// skye ba phyi ma lung ston no// 'bring gi gsum po'i rigs ldan yang / gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi ru sbyar// tha ma'i rigs ldan gsum po yang // lnga dang drug dang
512b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun du sbyar/ yang ni rkyen sogs ldan gyur kyang // rgyu la sogs pa'i nus pa rnams// drag gzhon gyi ni rim pa yis// rkyen gyi tshul bzhin sbyor shes bya'o// rgyu rkyen gnyis ga 'bring sogs kyi// rim pa dang ni ldan pa rnam//
512b5(rgyud 'grel): gong ma gnyis dang mi mthun pas// gsum dang bdun du sbyar shes bya// gnyis kwa zhan par gyur pa nA// gsang sngags snod du mi rung bas// dbang bskuro mI byA 'jug pa tsam// dge ba'i sa bon chung gyur kyang // smon lam
512b6(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'i dang ldan de// gsang sngags la ni mos gyur nas// yang nos yang du gsol 'debs la// phyi yis dbang bskur tsam byas la// mi zab dbyibs kyi man ngag bstan// de las bstan pa'i gang zag la// lhag ma
513a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni rims kyi bstan// yang nA rnal 'byor rim pa ni// yi dam lha tshogs so so ruH/ so so byug chags bzhag pa dang // mos pa la sogs rim pa yis// the tshom la sogs med myong kyang // dngos
513a2(rgyud 'grel): grub 'grub par ma gyur nA// sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du shes kyi// tha mr-i dad par bsgoms nas kyang // mun dag+na yang yang spros kyang nI/ 'gal ba med de pos grub 'gug/ de ltar byas kyang ma byung na// sgrib pa shin tu che gsungs
513a3(rgyud 'grel): bos// sbyin sregs 'khor tshe gas 'khor tshogs bzlas brjod dang // gat+tor ma la sogs cho ga yis// bdun nas stong gis bar du ste/ mkhas pas ci nus rgyud brtagaso la// cho gas sdig pa sbyang ba gsungs// lus
513a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la ni gnod pa yi// tshe rA ma'i phung pos lam+ba rnams 'gags// me yI sbyor bya mkhas pa yis// bsregs pas thams cad med par byed// de nas la mi ni rnyed nas ni// gang du phyin par 'gro bar byed// de bzhin
513a5(rgyud 'grel): stegs sogs mthun rnams kyis/ sgrib pa la sogs bcom nas kyang // ti 'dzin gyi lam rnyed nas// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// dngos grub khyad par ma thob kyang // phra mo la sogs thob par 'gyur// mtshan
513a6(rgyud 'grel): mo'i lung ston phra mo 'byung // gal te ltar ma gyur par// tshe dbang ma tho ba rnal 'byor pas// // sgrib pa rnams ni byang gyur nas// skye ba phyi ma la sogs
513b1(rgyud 'grel): su/ dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// yang na sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis// sdig sgrib rtsad nas mchod kyang // che lcong rags pa mgo bcom nas// gzhan dag mi skye mgo gnon zhing // dam tshig ma nyams
513b2(rgyud 'grel): blashags la brtson// smon lam dag rtsa bsngo legs pas// skye bye 'di rjes gzhan dag tu// dus dang gnas dang slob dpon dang // grogs dang phyag rgya man drug sogs// skye ma thag tu rnyed par 'gyur// daM ru dam
513b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig ldan sogs pas// rims kyis skye bdun rgyud nus su// 'bang rtsol drag po ma byas par// sangs rgyas sa la 'gro bar gsungs// de sogs lung bstan sbyor ba rnams// mkha' 'gro ma'i lung sngon du// rnal
513b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mkhas pas shes par bya// 'di ni blo da min don ched du// cung zad bsdus te bstan pa yin/ mkha' 'gro ma yi lung ston kyang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ 'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod de//
513b5(rgyud 'grel): sau nAs rigs 'dzin mkha' 'gro dang // bde gshegs byin rlabs mkha'i 'gro'o// mkha' 'gro de dag gnyi ga yang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang mi mdzes pa'i// gzugs ni sna tshogs sprul nas stom/ de la 'jig
513b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mi 'jigs dang // re dang ngogs pa'i sems spangs te// phyag rgya brda la sogs pa yi// ston pa'i dus su las rnams ni// ston par shes par ma gyur na// dngos grub med de nyams par 'gyur// de bas nan ta marba/
514a1(rgyud 'grel): skyeng la// man ngag zlos pa che ba gces// thos pa che bar m+b+ha gyur srung // gang sgrub rgyud skor la sogs la// slob dpon la ni yang nas yang // the tshemachod par mnyan par bya// rgyud rnams thos par mi nus pas//
514a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i cha rkyen badron po// shes rab de ni ma byas na// dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyuraro// slob dpo na l-i ni brten pa yis// ma tshung yang ni 'grub par gsungs// 'jig rten pa la gnyis yod do// rgyal bas bka' la brtags
514a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang // bdud ni nag po la sogs pa// dam la ma logs par chod mkhan/ de ltar gnyis su ma shes na/ dngos grub thob kyang slar la 'tshor// de gnyis gzugs dang rtags sogs pa//
514a4(rgyud 'grel): gong ma bzhin du ston pas na// de yi rim pa gong bzhin bya// de dag brtag pa'i cho ga yang // zhag gsum zhag bdun rtsa gcig tu// re dogs la sogs thams cad kun// spangs nas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la// nan tan du ni brtson
514a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grus bya// tshogs 'khor la stsogs yang dang yang // byed pa'i dus su rdo rje g+hu// len cing phyag rgya sogs bstan pas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang // mtshan ma la sogs gsal 'bar zhing // gzugs dang sgra dang dri la
514a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs// thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur na/ lha yi mtshon mar shes par bya// de las bzlog pa thams cad kun// bdud kyi rtagasu shes par bya// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na// 'di
514b1(rgyud 'grel): ni sgrub po'i don du bsdus// sgrub pa'i cha rkyen man ngag rnams// sgrub po nyam su len pa la// brtan zhing spel na bsod nams 'phel// nyams su mi len ser sna can// rdzas dang lus srog la sogs pa// bla ma la ni
514b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru la mi nus// de li man ngag bstan mi bya// de la man ngag bstan pa na// dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel// dam tshig nyams nas mkha' 'gros gsod// tshwa rkyen le sogs bcu bdun pa// ston pa phyag
514b3(rgyud 'grel): na rje dza yis// sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la// rna ba brgyud pa'i gdams dug de// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstan// des ni ro langs ma la bstan// gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje dang // slob dpon phyag ni rdo rje yis// brgyud
514b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdams dag rim pa rnams// nan tan gyis ni brtsal bar bya// de la brtsal ma shes ni// dper na yid bzhin nur bu ni// klu rgyu lnga gtsug nas rnying nas ni/ 'dam rdzab nang du stor pa bzhin// de bzhin mAn
514b5(rgyud 'grel): drag rin chen 'di// lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi// sgo nas slob dpon la brtsal nas// dam mang rmongs pa'i lag shor na// dngos grub mi theb nyams par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed de btsal// lung bstan pa'i
514b6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i sbyor ka'o// slob dpon chen po b+hA bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / lo tsA ba tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o//
515a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las kyi tshogs rim par phye ba'i cho ba slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa bzhug so//
515b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra su twa tsakra karma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje las kyi tshogs rim par phye ba'i cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams pa la dang cing gus pas phyag 'tshalo// sam
515b2(rgyud 'grel): can la ni phan pa'i phyir// las kyi tshogs ni bdud rtsi mtshungs// rgyud rnams kun las btus nas ni// bdag gi so sgrub po'i don du bshad// las rnams thams cad ci byed kyang // gtor mo'i las 'di
515b3(rgyud 'grel): grogs su 'gyur// dra bas gtor ma ston la bai shad// gtor ma'i lasi rnams kun+da la yang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang // tshig bcad rdzas kyi nus pa'i mthusau// de lnga tshogs na las rnams
515b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// de yang ting 'dzin rgyal po'i tshul// bram ze sngags kyi nus mthu can// rje'u rigs phyag rgya nyid dang mthun// tshigs bcang tha ma la spyod pa 'dra// rdzas ni kun gyi bzhi rten 'gyur// de yang spyi dang khyad par
515b5(rgyud 'grel): ro// spyi ni kun gyi nu mthu can// nus pa drag po 'byin pa yin// khyad par so so kun la yang // nus pa che chud rim pa 'byung // de yi rnal 'byor rim pa yang // las dang po ni mos pa 'jog/ dngos grub
515b6(rgyud 'grel): phra mo 'phrin las dbang / ye shes phra mos 'phrin los rdzogs// ye shes can ni de nyid theb/ yang dag pas ni bya ba rdzogs// rnal 'byer do lnga'i rim pas kyang // gtor ma la sogs las rnams la//
516a1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin la sogs 'jug thabs lnga// man ngag can gyi shes par bya// de bzhin las rnams kun la yang // man ngag can gyis sbyar bar bya'o// gtor ma dbul ba'i rim pa yang // mgron+da gyi lha ni gnyisu bya
516a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// 'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod de// bde gshegs sbrul dang sa la gnas// de dag gnyis la'ang spyi dang ni// so so 'i khyad par shes par bya// 'jig rten pa la gnyis yid de// spyi dang
516a3(rgyud 'grel): so so'i khyad par ro// spyi ni khams gsum sems can kun// khyad par chos skyong gsungs mi rnams// de la khyad par so so la/ dpag tu med pa yong mod kyang ngo // dgos pa bsdus pa bstan par bya// gtor ma'i rdzas rnams
516a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa no// thun mongs rdzis dang khyad par rdzas// thun mongs drugro bcur sbran zhes bya// khyad par bdud rtsi rnam lto dang // dkar gsum ba mar gsum sogs dang // sha sne khrug la sogs pa dang // ma kr-in spyi skabs dang sUR+ShA bar
516a5(rgyud 'grel): byas ting 'dzin bstan pa'i rim po yang // bdag nyid lhag pa'i wA sbyang lo// mo tshun dang ldan pa'i snod mchog du// nyi zla'i gdan bsam bdud rtsi bsam// saM bin las skyeng des su mtshan// de liM gI me dang rlung ni
516a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de yi steng du rdo rje bsam// de yi steng du ri bo can/ yi ge oM gyis mtshan pa yin/ hUM bskyod pas ni rlung byung bas// me 'bar bdud rtsi dros par 'gyur// oM gyi ye shes bdud rtsi phab// rdo rjes dkrug cing sku gsung
516b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas// dri med dag pu'i bdud rtsirA g+hur// dI ni thun mong ting 'dzin yin// khyud par so so'i skabasu bstana?// thun mong gi nI sngags bstan pa// oM bud+d+ha DA kI ni sarba bA li ta khA kha khA hi/ e badz+ra DA ki nAM sarba ba
516b2(rgyud 'grel): lo ta kha khA khA hI// oM rat+na DA kiM nI sarba ba lI taM kha khyA khA hi/ oM pad+ma DA kr-i nI sUr+b+ba bA lA te kha khaM khA hi/ oM bai shra DA ki nI sarba ba laM te kha kha khA hau/ AM sarba DA ki nI s+yAr+b+ba bA li tA kha kha khA hi/ khyid par gyi sngags
516b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni/ oM badz+ra DA ki byi ba khyer rtsi yupa kA k+ShA s+ya tsi la kA la r+yA pa/ i maM ba liM grih+Na tu sa ma yaM rakra n+tu ya theSh+Ta sarba sid+d+him+me pyA yats+tshan+d+ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ tshigs bcad kyi ni rim pa yang // smr-i dang khyad par gnyis
516b4(rgyud 'grel): baM stan// spyi yi tshigs bstan po ni/ mkha'i dbyings rnam dag klong dkyil nas// smon lo mi thugs rje dang gis nA// mkha' 'gro mi zad b+h+rUM sprul nas// 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i sku mtshang mi// skyo la sgribs pa
516b5(rgyud 'grel): mi mnga' yang // 'gro ba sems can don skad du// bdud rje las gsogs gsol mdzad ma// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// bud+d+ha mkho' 'gro dpal 'bar ga/ smug nag 'brar ba'i
516b6(rgyud 'grel): ral pa can// stobs ldan drag shul sku 'chang ma// sku yi stobs ldan mthu chen las// sku yi lha mo'i sprul po 'gyed/ bud+d+ha mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams// yang sbrul smug mo 'bum gyis skor// dges pa'i tshul
517a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ralnga pa tsan+ta/ thugs mchog 'bar ba'i rigs ldan ma// mi 'gyur thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// thugs
517a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha mo sprul pa 'gyeng // rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams/ 'khor du nug mo 'bum gyis bskor// dwagyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// rin tshan mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma/ ser nag 'bar
517a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ral po can// yon tan rgyas pa'i rigs ldan ma// rin chen 'bar ba'i mdzod spu nas// rin chen rigs kyi sprul pa 'gyed// rin chen mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams// 'khor du ser mo 'bum gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i
517a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// pad+ma mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma// dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// gsungs mchog 'bar ba'i rigs ldan ma// dri med gsung gi bum pa nas// gsung gi lha mo sprul
517a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyed// sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i mkha' 'go ma// 'khor du dmar mo 'bum gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// las kyi mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma// ljang nag 'bar po'i
517a6(rgyud 'grel): ral pa can// las rnams mdzad pa'i rigs ldan ma// phyag zhabs pad+ma'i 'khor lo las// las kyi lha mo'i sprul pa 'gyed// drag shul las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor du ldeng nag 'bum kyis bskor// dgyes
517b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ mkha' 'gro bAl+li 'gro myak+Sha/ rdo rje na mkha' 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// sa la 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro mA// rdo rje sa 'og 'gro ma dang // bar snang 'gro ba'i mkha'
517b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro me// mkha' 'gro ma dang shugs 'gro ma// ma mo'i tshogs dang sring mo'i tshogs// nag mo dbang phyug tshogs rnams kun/ dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ gnod sbyin tshogs
517b3(rgyud 'grel): rnarnams ma lus dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa klog 'phreng nas 'byung ba'i rgyud bzhin du gtango // khyad par so so'i tshigs bcang ni// mkha' la spyod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// bya rogs gzugs can 'jigs pa'i
517b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// pad+ma las gnas ba' gdong ma// thod pa kha T+wAM ga yis brgyan// gri gug gcong mdzad thong khrag 'thung // phyag bzhi de bzhin rol pa mdzad// zhal gyi nga ros bdud rnams rgyal// stan gsum smin ma'i dkyus
517b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan mA/ spyan gsum 'od gyis khams gsum gsal// rol pa'i 'dug stangs gar dang ldan// sgeg pa la sogaso ro ldan pa// gar gyi spyod ldan mkha' 'gro ma// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams// sbyor ldan
517b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis 'khor gyis bskor// 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyang // dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// mkha'i 'gro chen mos spyod ma// khyi yi gdong can 'jigs pa'i gzugs//
518a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan mig glog 'gyu stong mdzad ma// zhal gdangs pas ni khams gsum rdud// phyag gi gar gyis dgyes byar mdzad// sku yi sgeg pas rol pa ldan// zhabs kyis 'byung po zil gyi gnon// drag po
518a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas rnams// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// sa 'og gnas pa'i mkha 'gro ma// gau ri nag mo chen mo ni/ nya yi gdong can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// spyan gsum 'od zer
518a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba yis// khams gsum ma lus skrag par byed// zhal gyis sa 'og sems can gsol// phyag gi dri yis nyams rnams btub// zhabs rnams rol pas sa 'og gnon/ gar gyi 'gyong tshul la brtson pa//
518a4(rgyud 'grel): ha ha hi hi sku sgrogs ma// drag po'i 'khor dang bcasngo pa rnams// dgyes pa'i tshul gyi 'drir gshegaso mchod pa byazhes// phyogs skyong gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// thod pa 'bar ba'i gzhal yos nas// rdo rje
518a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM bdag gtso brangag mdzad// sdigs 'dzub rdo rje 'gying bag tsam/ shin+da tu mi bzang 'jigs mdzad ma// spyan ni sngon po'i mdog dang ldan// 'bar bar sngon por rab tu khyab// bskyung bskum tshul gnas ma mo nr-in//
518a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor phyogs spyod mkha' 'gro ma// shar gyis phyogs kyi tshangs pa mo// zhal gcig spyan gsum gar li brtson// rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las// phreng ba spyi blugs bsgoms po'i mkha' 'gro ma// dgyes
518b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// lho na gnas pa'i khyab 'jug ma// zhal gcig spyan gsum gaR+Sha la brtson// rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las// 'khor lo pad+ma bsnams pa'i
518b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma/ dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhiso// nub na gnas pa'i gzhon ma~M// zhal gcig spyan gsum gar lnga brtson// rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las// rtse gsum
518b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba rnams pa'i mkha' 'gro me// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'drir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// byang na gnas pa'i gshin NAM ma// zhal gcig spyan gsum gare la brtson// rngub dang skag dang 'dzin
518b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las// byug pa mi mgo bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegaso mchod pa bzhes// me long yi phyogs na gnas pa'i tsaM muN+Di// zhal gcig spyan gsum grar la
518b5(rgyud 'grel): brtson// rngub dang sgeg dang 'dzin pa'i las/ 'khor lo seng ge bsnams pa'i mkhe' 'gro ma/ dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// srin po 'i phyogs na gnas pa'i tsi muN+Di// zhal
518b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson// rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las// ral gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ dgyes pa'i tshul gyi 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ dbang
519a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan mtshams na gnas pa'i dbad+ma ldanA ma// zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brda na// rngub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las// mdung thang thod pa bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// dgyes pa'i
519a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// rlung gi phyogs na gnas pa'i rlung lha ma// zhal gcig sprin gsum gar la brtson// rngub dang g+hesmai dang thod pa bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// ma ma mkha' 'gro
519a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas rnams// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// mkha' 'gro chen mo thang spyod ma// khyung mchog rdo rje 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de yi thugs las sprul pa mo// mkha' 'gro
519a4(rgyud 'grel): drag mo mthu mo che// ro langs ma nI ze la dga'// gtum mo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs tsam/ sing ge chen mo 'tshong byed ma/ stag mo chen mo 'khrug byed me// 'ug gdong chen mo mun po 'joms// lce spyang mA na
519a5(rgyud 'grel): khrag tu za// mkha' 'gro tshan mo 'khor bcas kyang // dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// mkha' 'gro chen mo gzhonu ma// sku mdog ser mo 'od zer 'bar// 'od zar phreng ba stong phrag 'phro//
519a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// rnam snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can// mya ngan med pa'i me tog phreng // dbu la mdzes pa'i rgyan du byas// zhal gsum phyag drug mthu mo che// sgeg cing rol dang bcas pa maM//
519b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu chen mo 'khor bcas kyang // dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ mkha' 'gro tshan mo lhag sdud ma// dur khyod brgyad kyis dbus gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'khor ba sgrol ba'i mchog
519b2(rgyud 'grel): dur mo de yi nang gnas pa// ljang khu'i mdog 'gying bag can// gru gsum nang gi phyogs dag na/ ye shes can dang mkha'agro ma/ skyon ma gos pa'i gos dkar mo// nyon mongs 'khru byed mA mA kI/ 'bar ba'i
519b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas khyab cing drag/ mkha' 'gro chen mo khyed bzhi yang // lhag sdung rnams kyi gtso mor grags// mkha' 'gro chen mo lhag sdud rnams// dur khrod brgyad kyi phyogs dag na// kha T+wAM ga dang mgo la sogs// thod pa
519b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis yongasu brgyan// shing gcig dad ni ldan pa nyid// khyu dang khyi dang sgying ku dang // seng ge stag dang bI la dang // bya rgod la sogs 'khor gyis bskor// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshegs kyis// mnyes par spras pa'i
519b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'dzin ma// mkha' 'gro tshan mo keng rus ma/ drag po gri gug snod thogs pa// gri gug gcod pa'i las mdzod tsog/ thod pa'i khrag ni 'thung bar byed// skra bshig pa l-i spyan gsum pas// yi dgas zhal du
519b6(rgyud 'grel): rngub par byed do// drag po mi bzod gsum pa 'phyang // thod pa 'bar ba'i rgyan dang ldan// rgyu ma'i phreng bas nges par brgyan/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ me yi rus pa'i phreng ldan pa'i// ska rags
520a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag gi thig le can/ yi dgas klung ba'i tshul dang zhag/ lus la byugs pa la dgyes pa// lag 'gro tshan me'i rna cha can// brang 'gro'i rkang gdubu 'jigs rung ba/ kha do ga dkar po rab
520a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshogs// ga ni brji thub pa dag pa yi// shin tu mi zad khros pas ni// gnod sbyin la sogs ji sdigs par byed// hA ha chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa// mkha' 'gro tshan mo drang sol gdo // de 'dra'i mkha' 'gro dpag kyang
520a3(rgyud 'grel): drang // sha za la sogs 'khor gyis bskor// 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyis// 'dir gshegs lkog ma'i gtor mu bzhes// lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di bzhus la// las rnams ma lus myur du mdzod//
520a4(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi las rnams mdzad tshul ni// rgyal ba shAkya thub bstan pa la// gnas pa'i rnal 'byor bsrung ba dang / bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba dang // nang rnams ma lus bzlog pa dang // de la sogs pa'i las rnams
520a5(rgyud 'grel): kun// myur du mdzad cing bsrung du gsol// gzhan yang bcol ba'i las rnams ni// rdo rje slob dpon spyod pa dang // sangs rgyas bsnyen pa bshig pa dang // rgyal khams yongs su smod pa dang // dge 'dun 'du ba'i
520a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo 'phrog dang // gsang sngags thig chen smod pa dang // rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar gyur rnams// mkha' 'gro khyed kyis myur du sgral// sha za mo ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dur khrod gnas pa'i shing gcig la// rtse mor gnas
520b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas kun tu lta// gcer bu skra bA shig sha za ma// rtag tu shwA ni za bar byed// sha za 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes// mkha' lding rgyal po gser mig n+dan// gdong gcig pa la
520b2(rgyud 'grel): lag bzhi pa/ kha dog dkar po'i 'od chen ldan/ gser gyi gshog po'i dbu rgyan can// nor bu bai DUr+ya yi mchu// rkang gzer byi ru las byung ba// shel ltar dkar ba'i mdog dang ldan// skye ba'i gnasu bdud rtsis
520b3(rgyud 'grel): bkang // phyag gi bum 'dzin phyag 'tshal bstod// 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis ni/ mkha' lding dbang phyug 'khor bcas spros// gshog zur brgyab pas rgya mtsho skams// klu rnams ma lus zas su za// mkha'
520b4(rgyud 'grel): lding rgyal po 'khor bcas rnams// 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes// klu yi rgyal po gzi brjid can// klu chen brgyad du sku sprul pa// klu chen rgyal po nor rgyas bu// sku mdog dkar po skyon ma gos// shar phyogs
520b5(rgyud 'grel): klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa// sbrul mgo can la phyag 'tshal bstod// klu yi rgyal po 'jog po ni// sku mdog ser po sbrul mgo can// byang phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa// sbrul zhags bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod//
520b6(rgyud 'grel): klu tshan rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu// sku mdog dmar po sbrul mgo can// nub phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ mthu tshan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// klu chen rgyal po pad+ma'i rgyal// sku mdog sngon po sgrol mgo can/ lho
521a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa// yon tan rgyus la phyag 'tshal bstod// klu chen rgyal po pad+ma che// sku mdog dkar skyer sbrul mgo can// dbang ldan klu rnams 'dul mA dz+nyA ba// skyon ma gos bya
521a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal stong// klu chen rgyal po dung skyong ni// sku mdog dkar spyi sbrul mgo can// shar lci'i klu rnams 'dul mdzod pa// dug rnams 'joms la phyag 'tshul bstod// klu chen rgyal po rigs l-I ni// sku mdo
521a3(rgyud 'grel): sngo dmar sna go can// lho nub klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa// stobs po che la phyag 'tshal bstod// klu chan rgyal po pad+ma 'khyil// sku mdog dmar ser sgrol mgo can/ nub byang klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa// nad rnams
521a4(rgyud 'grel): sil la phyi/ 'tshal bstod// oM mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni stobs kyi r+g+ha/ pad+ma pad+ma chen po dang / lha mo lha myo tshun mo dang // zla ba skye dang gtsug spyi gtsug tshi// be con 'dzin dang be con che// snying
521a5(rgyud 'grel): po med dngos gu la taM// dga' bo dang ni nyer dga' dang // rgya mtsho dang ni rgya mtsho che// gdung ba dang ni gdung chen mo// dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che// rin chen 'od dang gzugs bzang dang // gzugs chenu sbrul bzangs lte
521a6(rgyud 'grel): phye che// smig rgyu dang ni smig rgyu che// klu chen rgyal po 'khor bcas rnams// 'dir gshegs mchod sbyin gtor ma bzhes// dpal ldan mgon po nag po che// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa// g.yon brkyang g.yas
521b1(rgyud 'grel): bskum 'byung po 'dul// mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal bstod// na mkha'i gos can mthu bo che// stag gi lpags pa'i shums thabs can// sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng bar ldan// mthu chen thob la phyags 'tshal
521b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod // mtsha ba gtsigs pa mi zad pa// thod pa'i phreng ba bskod pa yis// mgrin pa rkang pa rnams brgyan pa// mi bzang thod phreng can la bstod// smin ma kham pa'i sbyin 'khrug can// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam pa
521b3(rgyud 'grel): smras// khams gsum la ni gzigs pa'i rtags// sku gsung thugs ldan khyong la bstong // dang po spyan ni nag po mtshungs// g.yas pa srin por snang ba ste/ g.yon pa dmar por shin tu mdzesaM// grasal bar
521b4(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen la phyag 'tshal bstod/ ye shrIs sman+da ni gsum po yang // myi 'gyur phrin lus rgyags pa'i rtags// nyi ma khri dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'od gsil khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// pha rol phyin bcu'i mthu ldan
521b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// phyug bcus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// shes rab ral gri rnon po yis// nyon mongs gcod mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs rje 'bar ba'i tho ba yis// rlog dgegs thal bar rlog mdzad pa// rtse gsum
521b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar po'i 'od zer gyis// dug gsum rtsang gcong khyod phyag 'tshal// rgyud sbeng la ni brtson gyur pa// mkha' 'gro rnams ni skul ba'i rtags// g.yas kyi thabs kyi phyag rnams ni// las rnams mdzad pa khyod phyog
522a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// g.yon gyi thod pas khrag bkang bas// dgra dgyegs zhal du rngub mdzad pa/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams pa ni// 'byung po 'joms mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// pi wang sgra snyan bsnams pa
522a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nyon mongs gdung ba sel mdzad pa// gur gyi thabs kyi phyag rgya ni/ les la bskul mdzod khyod phyag 'tshul// mi yi lpags pa khrag 'dzag pa// steng gyi phyig ni gnyis nA bsnams// drag po'i las la
522a3(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i rtags// drag po'i las mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// de yi bka' sdong pho nya mo// mkha'i 'gro chen mo mi sdug gdong // khyed kyis drag po'i las mdzod cig/ drag po'i las mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal//
522a4(rgyud 'grel): seng gdong chen mo N+ye// 'byung po thams cad 'dzegs mdzad ma// 'byung po bsgral ba'i las mdzod cig/ sgrol mjing khyod la phyag 'tshul bstod// mkhya' 'gro chen mo glang po'i gdong // khyod kyis stobs kyis
522a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rnams 'dul// bdud rnams ma lus khyod kyis 'dul// bdud 'dulachen myo khyod phyug 'tshal/ mkha' 'gro chen mo drang mo'i grwa drung // rdo rje brag kyang 'gas par byed // brag 'ogs chen mo mthu rdul
522a6(rgyud 'grel): can// mthu rtsal can la phyag 'tshal bstod// mkha' 'gro tshan mo sbrel gyi gdong // gsod byed gsod byed mthu mo tsha// sman dang dug gi sbyor mkhan ma// sbyor mkhan ma phyog 'tshal bstod// mkha' 'gro
522b1(rgyud 'grel): chen me byi lu'i gdeng // mgyogs byed rtsa la dang ldan pa ma/ gang la bya ba'i don grub ma// don grub ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// mkha' 'gro tshan me khyi gdang ma/ gtsang smre med par za ba'i mchog/ sha khrag dus
522b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsol mdzad me// gsol mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ mkha' 'gro chenu mo stag gi gAdong // dpal brtul chen mo mthu mo cha/ gsong la dga' ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ sod bdag chen ma khyod 
522b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang // 'khor du yang sbrul 'bum gyis bskorau// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shing // slongs pa rnams ni skrag byed cing / thod pa'i nang du blugs pa'i khrag/ 'thung bar byed pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// skad cig yud
522b4(rgyud 'grel): la sgrol bar byed// 'khor bcas khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal ldan mgon po nig po la// mchod pa dam pa 'bul ba ni// me tog spos dang mar me dang // dri la sogs bla dbul gyis bzhes// mthun pa'i
522b5(rgyud 'grel): gtor mA 'bul ba ni// thug pa nag po'i 'o thug dang // sbyar ba la sogs mi bzang dbul/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i las mdzod cig/ rlon pa dang ni bcos pa dang // bsreg pa'i sha yi bye brag rnams// mi bzang de bul
522b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzhesu gsol// bstan pa bsrung ba'i las mdzod cig/ zhag dang klang pa'i tshil rnams dang / khrag dang glo ba la sogs pa// nya la sogs pa mi bzad dbul// bsten pa bsrung po'i las mdzod cig/ rgun chang
523a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni sgyur ba'i chang // 'bru yi chang la sogs pa dang // 'breng bu'i chun po mi bzung dbul// sgrog pa'i bye brag bdun rnams dang // snam+ba khur 'bru la sogs pa dang // zangs lcags la sogs mi
523a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang dbul// bstan pa srung ba'i las mdzod cig/ gzhan yang mkha' 'gro chen mo rnams// sbyang gdong ma dang seng gdong mo// glang po'i gdong dang d+mad kyi gdong // sbrul gyi gdong dang byi lI gdong // khyi gdong ma
523a3(rgyud 'grel): dang sta lnga gdong ma// mkha' 'gro chen mo 'khor bcas la// sha khrug gtor ma mi bzung dbul/ mchod pa dam pa 'di bzhes la/ khyed la bcol ba'i 'phrin las ni// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan
523a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bshig pa dang // rgyal khams yongs la gnod pa dang // dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog dang // theg chen chos la smod pa dang / rnal 'byor s+thi ye dgur gyur rnams// ma thogs myur du sbrul du gsol// phyi ning
523a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul du sku sprul pa'i// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnam sa ni// so so'i phyogs kyi 'khor skyong ba// drug po'i las mdzad rgyal po bzhi// yul 'o khyor skyong gi rigs rnams kun// chang sbra dus pa yi gtor ma long //
523a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras// gnod sbyin stong la mnga' mdzad pa// khyod kyi mthun pa'i dom rdzas ni/ sha chang la sogs gtor ma long // rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/ grul bum stong la mnga' mdzad pa'i//
523b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu khrag la dgyes pa'o// khrag gis bkang ba'i gtor ma long // rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang // klu rnams stong la mnga' mdzad pa// 'o ma dag la shin tu dgyes// 'o mas bkang ba'i gtor ma long // rgyal
523b2(rgyud 'grel): po chen po 'khor bcas kyang // 'dir gshegs mchod sbyin+d+ra gtor ma bzhes// dri za'i rgyal po zur phud can// spos dang ldan pa'i rje la gnas// dri rnams zhim posaM lus la byugs// me tog phreng bas lus ni brgyan//
523b3(rgyud 'grel): dri za'i bu mo lus la 'khrul// sa 'dzin la sogs k+Sha yi nI// bye brag bdun gyis sgra rnams sgrogs// zlos su dri rnams zla ber byed// dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// 'dir gi shugs tshul bzhin gat+to rI ma bzhes//
523b4(rgyud 'grel): shrIshA za'i rgyal po mthu bo che// shin tu 'jigs pa'i ji ro sgrogaso// zhal gdangs pas ni sha rnams gsol// shi za 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// 'dir gshegs tshul bzhin gtor ma bzhis// rnal 'byor chen mo 'phrog
523b5(rgyud 'grel): mA'i gdong // mche ba gtsigs pa'i 'jigasu rung // kha nas lce 'dri la mthu mo tsha// gar gyi tshul du mchod mdzad ma// gnod sbyin 'phyog ma dang bcas rnams// 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes// lha dang lha min rgyal po
523b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// rgyu ba dang ni tsher rgyug/ yaM dgas rgyu bi nyi ma zla// das grib gdong dang rgyal po dang // rta'i rgyal po zla ba'i rgyal// lha mo klu mo 'ga' 'ga' dang // gzugs mdzes skar ma 'dus pa dang / bza'i rnams kun
524a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtso// karti ka dang dpal ldan ma// lha mo ri bo 'dzin pa nyid// lcu ka mA dang ni lhag ma che// lha yi rgyal po lha min rgyal// pu ka si dang sbom chen mo// lha dang lha min+da rgyal po che// 'khor bcas ma
524a2(rgyud 'grel): lus thams cad kyang // 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes// gnod sbyin rgyal po chen po ni// norA pu bzang dang gang ba bzang // rgyal po bzang po dga' byed phur// phur bu cha dang pad+ma'i gtsug/ dung gi gtsug phung
524a3(rgyud 'grel): par dang ni// gA ra chen 'bigs par byed pa drang // gcod par byed dang gang ba rau byed// nor dang nor min shin tu nor// gzugs bzang rol pa chen po// rgod dang rtse ljon rnam par sbyong // dpal bzangs su ni gzugs mdzes rnams// /
524a4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po'i bka' 'di yis// gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo 'dir shog/ gnod sbyin 'khor bcas ma lus kyang // 'dir gshegs mchod sbyin gtor ma long // mkha' 'gro nog mo chen myo ni// oM shing gcig dang ni dur
524a5(rgyud 'grel): khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni// khyad par du ni khang stong dang // sems can gnod dang blang dang ni// khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po chen po drag tshan po// lha sbyin mnyam du ston pa dang //
524a6(rgyud 'grel): nag po gtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan byad mo dang drag mo dang // 'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // mi thub gzhan gyis oM thub ma//
524b1(rgyud 'grel): nag mo bzang mo nag mo che// nag mo sgrom dang rnal 'byor ma/ dbang mo dang ni zla ba che// drag tu sdang dang 'chang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma// 'jigs byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs
524b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang zong chen ma// thong 'phreng phreng can khaM T+wAM ga/ sbrul chen ril gri dgra sta can+da// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can+da ma// de nyid chen mo mkha'i gro ma// lus kun rjes grub byed ma/ sbyor ba'i
524b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rgya chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen to// rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mi// rdo rje dbang po'i bka' 'di yis// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cing // mkha'i gro
524b4(rgyud 'grel): nag mo 'jigs pa'i gdong // nag mo chen mo tshogs kyis bskor// dUr khrod kun tu rgyu gri mdzad mA// dpagro tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong nas// skad cig yung la phyin mdzad me// khrag gi dri snom phyin mdzang ma//
524b5(rgyud 'grel): khrag gi dri snom mthu mo tshe// 'khor bcas 'dir gshegs gtor ma long // khyed la gtsil ba 'i phrin las ni// rdo rje slob dpon skyong pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jog pa dang // rgyal khams yongs su gnod pa dang
524b6(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog dang // gsang sngags thag chen smod pa dang // rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar gyur rnams// me thogs myur du bsgral du gsol// rnal 'byor lcam dral bsrung ba dang // rims nad yams nad
525a1(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa dang // mi mthun rkyen dbang bzlog du gsol// de nas gsang sngags bstan bya ste// sngags rnams nus pa'i mthu yis ni// dug rnams 'joms shing thams cad sbyong // sngags rnams so so'i tshogs
525a2(rgyud 'grel): bcang dang // sbyar ba ru ni shes par bya/ yang na sngags rnams phyogs gcig gtang // tshigs bcad kyang ni phyogs cig gtang // de ni sa man ngag skabs shes bya'o// skabs rnams de ni ma shes na// nus pa'i mthu ni nyams
525a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// yang na tshigs bcang gcig pus kyang // gang yon don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje'i tshigos bcad don ldan mi/ sngags dang 'dra ba nyid du gsung so// rdo rje tshig gi khyad par gyi// sngags kyi lha yi yon tan gyi//
525a4(rgyud 'grel): don rnams kun ni brjod pasA su// don dam kun rno naM brnob las mi 'da'// daun+ma drAm kun rnob brjod tshig du// sngags mtshon byed rdo rje'i tshig/ de la sngags zhes bye ba yin// oM na ma shrI badz+ra DA k+ShiM yai// au ka kA s+yai hAM/
525a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM e yan+ma yaM du DA ki byaM shwa na rbag tra ma haM/ grab+hI ma wa/ i sha i ma bi li/ d+hAny+dzi dz+r-i dze g+hA pAM pA gri h+Nata/ I ta mA kaM puSh+TiM ku ru/ sa mA ya ma nu smai ra a hUM phoT swA hA/ a shwa na se b+hU tsi ri ye i maM ba lI/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/
525a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi me hA pA la bir+ya pa ra kra ma yo dza na sa ha sra pra laM barba pu shaM/ ti li te moM gi li ma hA ti ming gi li br-i b+hI te ya~M ma hA mi na a d+hi pa ti ya a sa ni na hi ta b+ha ban+d+ha/ ma ma a baM bye ta wa sid+d+hi ma
525b1(rgyud 'grel): tAhAr+yA na tu swA hA/ oM A A I I u U r-i r-I lI lI e aM oM aM.oM AHswA hA/ oM na mo b+ha ga pu te badz+ra hUM kA ra/ hr-i Sh+TAM sarba b+hU ta ni staM b+ha swA hA/ oM pra h+ma hraM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ba sha bi hUM phaT/ oM kau mA nI ya hri hUM phaT/
525b2(rgyud 'grel): oM ya ma~M hU~M hUM phaT/ oM ko b+hi nI yai hU~M phaT/ oM tsa mud+h+ye ye hUM phaT/ aM ai shAn+tiM hri hUM phaT/ oM a U aM a/ oM kA ro mu khaM sarba d+her+m+mA NAM ad+hi nut+pang+ga trIdaM oM AHhUM phaT swAhU~M/ oM tA re tut+tA ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/
525b3(rgyud 'grel): oM tA mA ri ts+yai bai ra li b+ha d+ha lI bA ra hA mu khaM sar+b+ba duSh+TaM naM mu khaM/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ si maM ba le pA tIts+tsha sa ma yaM ma nu skA ru ma hUM phaT swA hA/ oM mA hA kA lA a ya hAM a A hi/ me hA bi he ra pa lan//
525b4(rgyud 'grel): barba TA kI ni yak+Sha rak+Sha sa pa ri ba ro// ad+g+ha san+ni hi ti b+hA ba swAhA/ au a daM sha dr-ikaM tri Ar+yA saM byA bya pa twoSh+Te taM/ sarba da sha daM kai lo ka d+h+r-i tu pa re me n+yA pa ran ta ba ra tidA/ sar+b+ba tig+ma lo ka pa ya/ ma hA kA la byAH
525b5(rgyud 'grel): A yu d+ha mA ya badz+ra/ badz+ra na ma badz+ra ga lA badz+ra mu sa la nA gI badz+ra/ badz+ra a ni la/ bedz+ra sho na Da~M/ badz+ra kro d+ha/ badz+ra pra pa/ badz+ra ka na d+ha laM/ mon badz+ra/ me ma tsi tA/ pr-i thi bi ba d+h+waM ba hA/ sarba i d+hu pe sai ra go ba
525b6(rgyud 'grel): shin ti ye/ sarba gan+d+ha puSh+pa d+hu pa/ dI pa/ nai bi t+yaM/ sarba pa tA laM kA ra d+hi nash+na pra tIts+tsha u pa du dzi/ sarba duSh+TA nA/ kA ya bAk+Shi taM/ staM b+ha ya staM ya/ ma ma sarbA shi pa ri pu ra/ yau thA ya b+h+ra/ hA sI sa raM ma sarba
526a1(rgyud 'grel): saM sa taM naM tsa/ sang+ga kha sid+d+ha ye sAhA/ yA kU b+ha ban+na hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM badz+ra DA ki sa ma sma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra DA ki tA naM pa tiSh+Ta DI D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+hA ba/ A nu ra ga to me b+hA ba/ su po
526a2(rgyud 'grel): D+ho me b+hu ba/ sar+b+ba sid+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tse me/ tsit+ta shrI yaM ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ti thA gA tA DA ki ma me muny+dza/ D+ha krI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya so tra aMHmuHau dr-i ta ra Sh+TA ya ga gan d+haH/
526a3(rgyud 'grel): saMs nA d+hi pa ta ye i maM lI pr-i tIts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu s+phA ra ya hUM hUM phaTaHswAhAHoM bai sh+tsa rA pa Na ya yak+Sha sai nA d+hi pa ta ye i maM bi laM pra tIts+tshi si ma ye me nu sma ra AHhUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bIrA DA kA ya ma hA kum b+ha d+ha d+hi
526a4(rgyud 'grel): ba taM ye/ aM mr-i bi laM pra tAMts+tshi sa ma ya mA nr-i smr-i ra AHhUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bAM ru paMk+Sha ma hrIn+thi gU d+h+r-i pA ta ye aM maM bI l-i pre tots+tsha/ sa ma ya mai nu s+phu raM AHhUM hAM phaMT+ra swAhA/ oM gr-i d+hAr+b+ha a d+hi paM ta yiwau
526a5(rgyud 'grel): tsa tra/ a g+han+na yo/ mA ma kar+yaM sa tA ye/ i hai yin tu/ b+ha gra b+h+r-i badz+ra d+hi ra sha sa ne tiSh+Ton+tha/ a d+yA saM nr-i hA tI b+ha bAM swA hA/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+haH/ \u0f7fswa b+ha pa shud+d+ho haM/ oM aM kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NAM Ung+ga/
526a6(rgyud 'grel): nut+pan+mahwA au AHhUM phaT swAhA/ i a ra la ho dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHbadz+ra DA kI n+ya sa ma ya staM dr-i sh+ya ho// oM bi tsaM bai tsi smai shan \u0f7fsaM b+h+yo/ me hr-i bi shA tsi b+h+ya/ oM maM ba mo g+hit+ma ta b+huny+dza tha bi ba tha/ ma mr-in+tiHsaud+d+har+m+ma
526b1(rgyud 'grel): prA sam+b+ha drA srAH/ oM d+hi pa k+ShI r+yA dzA ya/ A gats+tsha sarba duSh+TA na srA kha b+hAn d+ha ku ra ma hA kA ku ru ma k+Shak+ShA ya ku ta bi sha ba d+hi ri b+hUM gra sa m+b+ha saM tiSh+Tha/ sUs+t+yA b+h+yA sa s+yA s+yAts+tsha d+hat+su/ ya phaT phaT swAH/ smr-i sar+b+ba twAthA ga
526b2(rgyud 'grel): baibi tre sA ma yaM saM mu drA/ s+pha ra Na shrI ye hUM au na mo b+ha ga ba tai Ar+ya pa ra ma A sh+tsa ya/ tA b+hU taM ga tA ya/ a ra hA te/ saMmya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ o tA re tut+tA re tu ruM swA hA/ oM grid+d+hig+h+rih+Na buSh+pa d+hU ba bA l-i i mAM sarba u ba
526b3(rgyud 'grel): tsarA saM pran+taM/ kha g+ha d+hi pa twe kha kha khI hi sA ma ya ma nu smA ra ar+d+ha huM phaT swA hA/ oM e dz+re h+ya dzA hi sh+ma shA na lAM se ni mA ma sa pa rI pA ra ra k+Sha kuM ru i ha san ni[:]hi ho b+ha be sA pA swA hA/ oM ku ru wa de tra li/ sid+d+hi mu khi sh+ma sha naM
526b4(rgyud 'grel): kha si ni/ br-i tany+dza tAM nI tsaN+Di ka ra li/ rU d+hi ra pri ye/ saM ma ya rak+Shi ti/ go gat+ti/ ki li kI li/ ra bi badz+ra pri ti wa na mi d+ha b+hAny+dza ti/ b+ha ga ni guM h+ya na du ta/ b+hU maM gu ri/ tsan Da kA ra li/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+TaM/ i maM u n+d+haMSh+TaM/ ba liM grIh+Na sarba
526b5(rgyud 'grel): duSh+Ta bak+Sha ya/ hUM phruM pre phaT swA hA/ oM ba lAM pa ta lA ma hA pa ta le hUM hUM dz+ha swA hA/ hUM hUM ho ho A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ saM ma ya a d+hi ba ta hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ma hA nA ga a d+hi pa te sarba b+hur b+hu baHhU~M phaT/
526b6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ hUM e ba ra di raM/ oM pa ta le b+hak+Sha pri ya/ oM ki nai ma d+he hUM hU~M swA hA.oM d+ha na a d+hi pa ta ye pa ta la bruM swA hA/ oM ga ka ka ta ba b+ha ban d+ha na/ kha ga kha nah+na/ sarba duSh+TaM naM/ ha na ha na/ ga ga ga ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya/
527a1(rgyud 'grel): shAn+tiM ku ru hUM hUM phaT dzA swA hA/ oM tiSh+Tha hUM bak+Sha bak+ku dz+nyA dz+nyA swAt+ma/ de ltar sngags rnams bstan nas ni/ khyad par byin brlabs bstan pa ni// de nas blo dang ldan pa yis// gal te sbyor ba gzhan dang
527a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas// tshon chen gyis ni gos dag gam// ngar la sogs pa grin nas ni// rdo rje dril bu de bzhin du// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes par brgyan// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su// las kyi
527a3(rgyud 'grel): skabs dang bstun ste blta// 'dug stangs la sogs de bzhin sbyar// bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom// myur bar 'dod na rdzus skyes tshul// mchod bya sbrul dang spyan drang ba// gang 'dod pa ni bya ba yin// gnyis
527a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bya bar 'dod pa'ang yod// thun mong byin brlabs gong bzhin no// khyad par byin brlabs bstan pa ni// zla ba oM ni bsams nas su// 'od zer stobs kyis rnamo rtog sbyong // nyi mar a ni bsams nas kyang //
527a5(rgyud 'grel): med par bsams par blta// gnyis ka'i hUM gis 'od du 'bar// haM suM bdud rtsi zhu bar bsam// yi ge raM gyis mtshan ma bsregs// yi gyis bsregs pa gtor bar bya// khaM gyis bdud rtsi dri med 'gyur// oM gyis
527a6(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod don rnams 'grub// hUM gis sbyangs nas a su 'bar// oM gyis rtogs par bya ba yin// ha su gzugs bcom hri yis na// ro la sogs pa bcom pa yin// hos su bdud rtsi 'bar bar bsam// yang na
527b1(rgyud 'grel): hri su ro dang ho su dri// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin nyid du blta// rI rab rdo rjes dkrugs nas kyang // ye shes bdud rtsi bstim pa 'am// hUM ni gcig pus sbyang zhing bsreg/ ye shes kyang ni des su dbab// so so rtsa ba'i//
527b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis ni// lan gsum lan bdun brjod pas ste// sbyang zhing byin gyis bau rlab pa dang // sngags rnams so so'i nus mthu mi/ rgyud rnams so si dag nas ni/ 'byung ba dag gis brlab pa 'am// sngags ni gong ma
527b3(rgyud 'grel): len zhes bya// so so lha yi yig 'bras kyang // lan gsu mo lan bdun spyad pa yin// de ltar byin brlabs man ngag rnams// 'jig rten 'das 'jig rten pa'i// byin brlab man ngag skabs dang sbyar// byin gyis brlabs pa'i
527b4(rgyud 'grel): las rnams so// phyag rgya bcings pa'i sbyor ba ni// thun mong phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje thal+lo mo'i tshul du ni// bcangs nas kha nI dbye ba dang // rdo rje sa gol gautogs la'o// lag pa g.yon po'i grong mo bsgreng // mtha
527b5(rgyud 'grel): chung mtho bos so sor bkug/ mdzub mo srin lag cung za do dayu'o/ mkha' lding dkrug pa'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa gsum phyag rgyas byin gyis brnab// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyub d+hu sbyar bar b+h+yo// pad+ma sa
527b6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs spel nas su// dkar po dadzi ni 'gi ting bsgre // dkar po cung zad pa kuge pa yis/ lho min dgug pa'i phyog rgyo yi// zla bo snod la reg nas ni// nyis rdo rje khu tshur bcing // rog zi rdo te byin gyis brlig/
528a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba khu tshur bstan bcings la// rnam shes kyang ni sa gdugs brkyang // nyi ma lag pa legs brkyang ste// gdengs pa'i tshul du steng du sbyar// phyag rgyas snod la reg par bya// khu tshur gnyis nI sbyar
528a2(rgyud 'grel): nas su// snying khwa'i phyogs sbyar bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis sbyangs nas// rgyu ba dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// padad+ma mo dgra ni sa gdugs sbrel// dkar po'i 'igr-I hu sgrog tu bya// de bzhin phyag rgyas byin brlab cing //
528a3(rgyud 'grel): dag yid hU~M shes byar+yA g+h+r-i/ pyug+sa rgyu men dag+h+r-i gzhan sogs kyang // bas pas par bya/ gter ma'i rdzas rnams so+o dru / s+'uN+Da la sogs tshog+sa dang // de la sogaso de'i smin dag nums
528a4(rgyud 'grel): thubs rnams thob pa'i slob dpon gyis// sna tshogs gtor mas rgyas par bstan// de dang mthun pa shes par bya// gtor ma'i las sna tshogs pa'i cho ga ste dang po'o// // tshogs kyi las kyi
528a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ka bstan pa ni// tshogs kyi bya ba'i rim pa rnams// tshogs kyi 'khor lor shes par bya// cho ga'i las rnams 'di du bstan// 'khor lo phyi nang gsang ba la// cho ga'i rim pa skabs dang sbyar// phyi mchod
528a6(rgyud 'grel): nong mchod gsang ba'i mchod// phyi mchod rim pa bstan pa ni/ phyi la yang ni gnyi su bstan// mi zad dbyings kyi mchod pa ni// rnal 'byor rgyud du shes par bya// mtshan ldan dri med snod mchog tu// byang chub
528b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi dri med chu// dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa'i lnga la dbul// thugs rjes dgongs la bzhi su gsol// zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtang ngo // oM na mo nI laM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba ta nan// a hA pU dza med
528b2(rgyud 'grel): g+ha swa mu dra spre rA na saM ma ya hUM/ d+hu pa nir+ye ta yA maM hUM/ a ro l-ig nair+b+r-ita yA mi hUM/ puSh+pe/ d+hU pe/ AM lo ka/ gan+d+ha/ ni bi d+ye/ shad+de/ nri t+ye/ na ma pa sa/ spar+Ya/ nan rAt+na/ sarba pastu/ gan+d+har+b+ba/ badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ badz+ra mA le hUM/ badz+ra
528b3(rgyud 'grel): gI tI hU~M/ badz+ra nri t+ya hUM/ badz+ra dz+nyo paM hUM/ badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ badz+ra A lo ka hUM/ badz+ra gan+d+he hUM// r-i re l-i yung rdo rje'i klu gsum gsum brjod la// lha mo dpag med sprul kyang // dkyil 'kho lha la mchod po dbul// de nas
528b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa nyi shu no// dzA r+d+ha g+hA ni pra mi yis// hUM gI glu dang sbyar bar bya// de nas pad+mi kor ston+da 'gro ba'i// sgeg bya'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang // pi wang tshul gyis 'bud pa dang / gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bung bA dang //
528b5(rgyud 'grel): sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang // brdabs pa'i tshul gyis rdebaso pa dang // gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod// rlung yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang // bla res tshul gyis bre ba
528b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // bi dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // cang te'u tshul gyis rdebs pa dang // gdugs kyi tshul gyis dbub pa dang // rnga yi tshul gyis brdung ba dang // bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang // gar gyi tshul gyis gar byed dang /
529a1(rgyud 'grel): khro ba'i tshul gyis khro ba dang // sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang // 'gying ba'i tshul gyis 'gying ba dang // mnga' 'dren tshul gyis 'khyud pa dang // rdo rje gsor zhing phyag 'tshal ba'o// tshul gyis
529a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jud par byung ba ste/ drug rgyu'i mchod pa rkyen / rdo rje hUMg po rlol bas pa'i// \u0f88\u0f90 yoM sgra yis dga' bar byed// wA mA~M dbug mod sbrel nas ni// d+h+r-i l+lIr mnyes bye'i mchod pa dbul// de nas byu rje lha
529a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid// lha gsum gyis ni bsgrubs nas kyang // mtshan ldan snod mchog bkram nas kyang // ny+tsA maM pad+mar bzhag par b+h+yo// rdo rje srin mtheb sbyar nis kyang // thigs pa'i gtor mA kun la dbul// rnal 'byor shes rab grwar
529a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams bskor// yang na bzlog po sa thabs kyang de// lan gsum mchod pas gnas gsum gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi lha gsum mnyes// rdo rje glu dang ldan pa yis// sngags ni lan gsum brjod par byA// so so rtsa ba'i
529a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags mtha' dang // bdud rtsi'i sngags ni gdab par bya// de nas lcags kyu lnga po ni// grong ma bzhin du dbul bar bya// lha mo drug gis mchod pa ni// gzugs kyi rdo rje'i lha mo ni// gzugs brnyan bzhin du rgyas mdzad
529a6(rgyud 'grel): mekha dog dbyibs ldani mchod pa 'bul// bde gshegs spyan mchog rgyas gyur cig/ sgra yi rdo rje lha mo ni// gsung dbyangs yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i// sgra snyan yid 'ong mchod pa 'dul// bde gshegs
529b1(rgyud 'grel): snyan mchog rgyas gyur cig/ rdo rje lha mo dri ldan ma// dri zhim bdug spos dang bsung ldan// dri zhim yid 'od mchod 'bul bas// shangs kyi mchog rnams rgyas gyur cig rdo rje lha me re ldan ma// ro mchog brgyad ldan
529b2(rgyud 'grel): mdza sa 'di// yi de 'od dpag mau mchod be 'bul// bde gshegs ljags ni rgyas gyur cig/ rdo rje lha mo reg ldan pa// na bza' ling ka mdzes pa rnams// yid ling dpag meng mchong ba 'bul// bde gshegs sku rnams
529b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gyur cig/ rdo rje lha mo chos ldan ma// rin chen 'bar ba'i chos sgrog ma// yid 'ong dpag med mchod pa 'bul// bde gshegs thugs mchod rgyas gyur cig/ sems dpa' chen po dang po mchog/ de gyis
529b4(rgyud 'grel): tshon rnams kyi dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i bdag/ thugs kyi sems dpa' ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje'i rdo rje stobs po che// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog/ bdud kyi bdud sde
529b5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa po// sems dpa' kun gyi sems byang chub// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog skyes mchog/ rdo rje hUM ste hUM mdzad pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug nor sbyin pa// 'dod chags chen po badre ba che// 'dod dang thar pa
529b6(rgyud 'grel): nor che ba// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// mi rgyu ba ni mchog tu gsal// shin tu phra dang sbom po'i tshogs// rgyu ba rnams kyi rab mchog brnyes// sring
530a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo sbyong mdzad pa// thog mtha' med cing gsal ba min// shes rab sdung la rnam par gnas// thugs kyi phyag rgya snyoms zhugs pa// de nyid sems dpa'i che bas che// rdo rje khro bo kho
530a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po// 'jigs pa'i me ni 'dul mdzad pa// gdugs pa'i mchog ni 'dul ba che// drag po'i drag mchog 'jigs byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che// chos kyi las chen 'dzin pa po// dem ches
530a3(rgyud 'grel): la ni bzang ba'i lam// byang chub sems ni sbyong bar mdzad// thams cad yang dag tu pad ma che// shes rab thabs kyi noro che ba// 'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs chags pa'i dbang tsha// nam
530a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' mtha' las rtogs po'i don// sems can kun gyi gnas chen po// dpal gyi 'byor pa 'byor pa'i rgyal// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'du // phyag
530a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud // dad bsu khyed la 'dud bgyis pas// byadag sems rdo rje sems ngopa'u grub mdzod// rdo rje lha mo'i mchod pa dang // te na t+ye te hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang gtong //

530b1(rgyud 'grel): nI sbyin par bya// ltos sh+log mdzes pa dam pa'i chos// 'di la the tshom byur mi rung // khyi dang bram ze gdol pa gsum// rang bzhin cig pas lhan cig bza'// pad+ma'i las skor sngon 'gro bas// gzhan gyis do//

530b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// gzhung bzhin ma gyur 'khrul pa bshags// rnal 'byor lam cig spun rnams la// brtsod pa la sogs bgyis pa bshags// snying rje'i yul gyur sems can la// snying rje la sogs spangs pa

532a1(rgyud 'grel): drug drug tu 'dus// de'ang bzhi ru 'dus pa na// bzhi po re rI dag la yang // rgyus dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// gsum gsum dag tu shes par bya// dang po sa yi cho ga ni// brtan pa la sogs
532a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa yang // cho ga la sogs gzhan dang mthun// bsdus pa'i cho ga bstan pa ni/ lcug pA'i lha yi ting 'dzin gnas// sa yi bdag po rnams la nI// gtorA ma phula~M bas+ye sa rnams blang // khro bo'i las rnams
532a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad pa'i// phyag rgya bcas nas sngags rnams brjod// thugs kyi 'od zer dag gis ni/ sa rnams sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab// shin tu bsdus pa'i cho ga ni// 'od zer stobs kyi byin brlabs kyis// thab dung gang
532a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod byin gyis brlabaso// mtshan ma le sogs dga' ba dang / rgyas par spro ba'i gang zag dang / las dang po yi gang zag gi/ thab rnams bru ba rgyas par bstan// mtshan ma l-i sregs mi dga' la thabs

532b1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i gzhung dang mthun par bya// thabs kyi dbyibs rnams bstan pa yang // zhi ba la ni zlum por ro// rgyas pa gru bzhi 'am rin chen dbyibs// dbang la zla gam tshul du'o// drag po gru gsum rnam par bstan// mdor na dbang dang

532b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyibs bstan pa// rgyud rnams kun tu shes par bya// tshe bsring la sogs las la sngags// thab kyi rgya yi tshad rnams kyang // khru bzhi khru gsum khru do dang // khru gang khri phyed sum cha'o// de la sogs pa'i tshad rnams kyang //
532b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dang mthun par shes par bya// tshon rnams bri ba'o rim pa yang // gzhan dang mthun te khyad par ni/ zhi la dkar te rgyas la sir// dbang la dmar po drag la gan ga/ las ni thams cad thab khung la// kha dog lnga char
532b5(rgyud 'grel): tshang ba 'am/ yang na las kyi skabs dang sbyar/ l+yasa? ni thams cad pa yi dbyi bas/ a shAng lo ma lta bu dang // pad+ma 'dab gcig lta bu 'am/ pad+ma kha phye lta bu 'am// kha yi ge ser lta bu 'am// dwe sogs

533a1(rgyud 'grel): brko ba 'am// sor gnyis brko ba so so'i gzhung // de ni rab yin 'bring ni phyed// tha ma de bas cung zad chung // khung bu che chung mtshan nyid do// yu ba'i tshad ni mnyam zhes bya// rgyud gzhan dag la brten

534a5(rgyud 'grel): nu la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la sar+b+ba \u0f7fsmi ku ru sarba duSh+TAM hUM/ sa me ya s+t+waM so ma ya s+t+waM AHhUM/ lce la rdo rje rtse lnga bsams la// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM zhes brjod cing bsam par bya'o// rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar bsams nas/ phyag mtshan

534b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa yang yod// thams nad chung bar 'dod pa yang yod// rgyus 'debs gcig tu 'dod pa yang yod// thA dang rtog pa med pas// ji ltar mos pa gtso bor bya// dab bskur la yang de bzhi// me lha'i bstod pa tu

535a1(rgyud 'grel): par ni// dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par 'gyur// drang ba'i don ni mya yin no// de ltar mi byed ser sna can/ bdug 'dzin dam po gzung nas su// slob dben mnyes par mi 'gyur te/
535a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mnyes par ma gyur na// dbyung dang min ngag thob mi 'gyur// yang na man ngag thob nas kyang // slob dpon lnga ni rgyab kyi phyogs// dam tshig med pa'i nyams pa ste// rdo rje dmyal bar 'tsho bar 'gyu
535a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang gi rgyud rtags la// skyon dri yod na spang bar bya'o// bdag go 'gro ba'i don du ni// cho ga 'di brtsams dge ba yis// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// bla med byang chub thob par shog
535a4(rgyud 'grel): rje lus kyi tshogs rim par bya ba'i cho ga/ slob dpon b+ha ba bas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // lo tsA nga khro ba bi ra ya dang
535a5(rgyud 'grel): dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa lagasaso// / san mAng+galaM/
535a6(rgyud 'grel): stelas sa sa gsas ba su ma ma rgya mamasas sa canag/ yang pa ga ma tham ##
